title: You get what you pay for!
body: I've noticed alot of people pay Rs12,000/- for this phone and expect the qualities of an high end Samsung galaxy Z; that should'nt be the case, you get a reasonable phone at a reasonable price of Rs.12,000/- It got 6GB ram and 128GB storage, the display is large, the build is sturdy, the processor is octacore, it comes with side fingerprint scanning, has a amazing battery life, has Dolby for sound, its made in India, the only drawback would be the camera, its not great...but it's not bad...bad per se. I think a samsung in this range is fantastic...its user interfaces is amazing...better than oppo and vivo that come with hundreds of chinese apps that acess your data back to China. I've used a samsung for years...the phone never caps out,  if you have a good cover and screenguard...you can use one phone for over 6 years easily.

title: Not So impressive,okay okay.Little over price
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 #m12,#m12unboxing,#samsungm12 ,#unboxing ,#Samsung, #Galaxy, #M12,#SamsungGalaxyM12M12 unboxing videoNot so impressive Mobile from Samsung, currently direct compete with LGK42, Moto G30/G10To All people who want to purchase mobile DO NOT go on Mobile Marketing and Actors endorsing Mobile.:Remember 5G is coming hence you are getting so much discount on all 4G mobile. Mobile manufacturers are clearing stocks, Need to inform 5G mobile support 4G band but all 4G mobile will not support 5G.Take example, if you purchase 20,0000 mobile today, after 20 months you may need to change to 5G mobile hence it will cost you 1000 per month (costing matters) and you will not get High exchange value (not even 50% cost), Currently 5G yet to come in India, may be yearend or come will be high cost.Points to Remember while purchasing Mobile:1) Mobile band support, Dual Wi-fi Support is better.2) Graphics PPI matter hence check PPI value of mobile. It directly related to Mobile display and colour quality, Higher is better.3) Check Mobile camera F value (lower value, higher picture quality) if less than 1.8 is best. Mostly camera quality depends on Focal Value not on pixel4) Android upgrade support. This is important as your mobile will useless within 2 years, remember you don’t want any mobile who cannot upgrade to Android 11.5) Item Weight and height of mobile. Lower is better, it really matter as you will get pain while holding mobile for long time, specially  old people.6) Mobile resolution, Higher is better7) screen refresh rate, Higher is better8) Clean Android installation. This is also important as manufacturers cannot force you to install or retain any app.M12 /Pro6000 battery (not fully tested yet)Android 11, v11.0 operating system, One UI 3.1with 8nm Power Efficient Exynos850 (Octa Core 2.0GHz)90Hz screen refresh rateSamsung Brand (Non-Chinese)Galaxy Store supportDolby Atmos support. Currently Audio testing is going onM12 Cons720p screen resolutionNo AR support, ARcore Absentresolution with 720 x 1600 pixels resolution, low Graphics PPI 269 PPI with 16M colours221 Grams Dimensions 1 x 7.6 x 16.4 cmLCDpre-installed Bloatware some of cannot uninstalled but need to disablehigher Mobile F value (F 2.0)No headphones, no backcover ,no extra accessories.Uodate after three days:Battery still going on at 15% with 1 hour daily voice call , some whatsapp  and mostly standby.So it is power monster in battery category

title: Very poor performance

title: Value for Money
body: I bought it @10,499 INRDisplay is TFT but not that bad irl unless ome is switching to it from an AMOLED display. 90Hz doesn't feel so good and I don't expect it to, for the price given.Rear Camera is excellent for this price. 48MP mode catches very good details. Dynamic Range is exceptionally good. Portrait mode is sometimes hit or miss.Front Camera is decent. Not too bad, but can't say good either.Battery is obviously very good as this is 6000mAh. I bought it for my uncle and he only use it for Calls, Banking Apps, Streaming Music(Wynk) and 1-1.5 hours YT. It easily lasts him 2 days on a single charge of above 90%.OneUI has all the useful features and very responsive. The UI feels so nice while navigating through. System apps open without any delay. Best thing is that it comes with Samsung's own Dialer. I used it for few days before giving it to my uncle and it never felt like it's slow or laggy(I don't play games). RAM Management is very good. I'm a rough user who doesn't care about closing apps and I use many Social apps at the same time. It never felt like it's being slowed down and never faced any lag or delay even when using multiple apps at the same time. For instance, if a system app opens in 0.2s when there's no background app and if there's a lot of apps open in recent, even after that that system app will open in 0.2s unlike other UIs which generally start to delay app openings. That's the consistency and stability of OneUI that I love.But not everything is good in OneUI. First of all, the setup process tries every possible way to push ADs & bloats, like hiding the option to untick recommendation and promotional services in such a way that one can't even imagine where it is if he doesn't know already. Then it asks to install some bloatware on the name of recommended apps. They all are already checked and the tick mark appears dull as if it can't be unchecked. One has to manually untick all and click next. After all this, the setup process is complete. Even after doing every possible way to avoid ADs & bloats, I got welcomed with a bunch of bloatware like Moj, Josh, Takatak PhonePe, DailyHunt, and many more already installed. After uninstalling them, two permanent notification appeared. One was from Samsung side and other one was from Google Play Store. They both were asking to complete the setup using wifi on the name of Configuration update. None of them mentioned what will they do. I clicked "Use Cellular Data" and they both started to install more bloatware. Play Store installed 9 apps (most of them were Microsoft apps like LinkedIn, Office, etc.) while Samsung again started to install Moj, Josh, Takatak, BYJU's and many more crap. Most frustrating thing is that there's no option to cancel it. If mobile data is turned off, they start again when connected to it. After half an hour, the notifications disappeared and I uninstalled them again. Next day, a Software Update was available to be downloaded (Security Patch). It again installed 3 bloatware. This is so annoying about OneUI. Initially, MIUI was known for ADs and bloatware and OneUI was clean. Now it is just the opposite. ADs are frequently pushed in the notifications through Galaxy Store which again, asks to install those short video apps.I'm rating it ⭐⭐⭐⭐ only because of this. Otherwise, it's really a very good phone in other aspects.

title: It's a budget package. A good phone to buy in the ₹ 10k bracket.
body: A very satisfying  experience with the device so  far.Pros:1. Long battery life-  I am a moderate  user who does everything  except gaming. That said , the battery lasts up to 2 full days.2. Decent cameras for the price. Pictures are satisfactory but could be better.3. Very responsive finger print sensor.4. Good sound quality, although dolby's impact  is not much pronounced5. UI is great and snappy. Lots of customization options.6. The display is good and smooth with 90hz refresh rate. It does make the difference.7. Fast charging works fine.Cons:1. The weight of the phone is on the heavier side @ 220 gms2. The display could have been a full HD+ @ 1080p3. No led notification light. All though there are apps that can do the job on an AMOLED screen.Overall, a good package.

title: Budget Samsung Phone
body: I am using this phone for the last one week and i noticed few positive and negative things about it.Positive points -• Fingerprint sensor is so fast and i loved it• Battery backup (6000 mAh) is amazing even after using it throughout the day• Camera quality is really good and the pictures are amazing on day light• Large display having a size of 6.5 inches and can run games smoothly on low graphic settings• 90Hz refresh rate feels so smooth• The phone doesn't lag or get heated after using it for a long time because of Exynos 850 (8nm) high-end processorNegative points -• Not made for hard-core gaming because the processor is not strong enough to run games smoothly on high graphics• The weight of phone is heavy• The brightness level is somewhat low as compared to other phones• The display that you will get is around 720 x 1600 pixels• The downloading as well as uploading speed is also low as compared to other phones within this price range• It is not water resistant and does not have Gorilla glass for screen protection .~ I am satisfied with this phone because of it's camera quality and battery backup √

title: Phone is ok but can lag alot at time...
body: Camera - sensor is ok, ppl writing the reviews do not know how to take pictures (i have taken some sample pictures for proof).Performance- after an year of use the phone seems to have periods where they hang alot.Finger print reader:. Pretty good, i have not faced any problems so far(been more than a year)Ui- keyboard bugs alot where it appears over the writing bar... That gets inconvenient at time.Overall verdic- for 12k this is the best phone i have used... Don't expect too much extra crispy perfromance from it...😶 If u broke like me go for it

title: You will be disappointed
body: Amazon hid all reviews for first few days till most of the stocks are sold out. Then after that it is not allowing to write negative reviews. I wrote my experience with so many negative points and it rejected. Still I am writing the pros & cons again.PROS:▪︎UI 3.0 is amazing. I like it a lot. It is better than Redmi, Moto, Nokia UI. (Subjective)▪︎Amazing battery life. I am getting more than 24hrs of usage after fully charged.CONS▪︎Worst camera ever. True 48MP is all bulls**t. Low light pics are also worst.Front camera is also not good.▪︎Seriously??? No Slowmotion, Timelapse & other basic features in camera.▪︎It doesn't support Camera2Api which means I cannot download GCam.▪︎Worst Screen resolution. While everyone is giving Super Amoled display & Full HD display, what happened to you Samsung??▪︎90Hz refresh rate is just gimmick.▪︎8nm processor is also waste.▪︎While all others are giving Snapdragon processors, Samsung is stuck with its Exynos which is basically useless. Phone is hanging sometimes.▪︎Phone is a bit heavy and you'll have a hard time with its weight. It's like holding a powerbank.▪︎15Watt charger?? Samsung...upgrade bro.▪︎Wifi only supports 2.5GHz band and no 5.0 GHz bandFinally dont get decieved by True 48MP, 8nm processor, 90Hz refresh rate and other gimmicks. You will be disappointed. I am very much disappointed. The worst thing is there is no return option in Amazon. Amazon bro...you too planned everything so well. Good job.

title: This is my honest opinion

I am just using it for basic social media and calls .. rest of my heavy work is done on my primary device .CAMERA is average , My ipad's 5 MP camera shoots better than the so called "true" 48MP.My advice-- go for 6gb variant as 2.5 gb is acquired by the system .Overall - 4☆

title: Better buy a brick!
body: Don't know if I could get more disappointed by a purchase!!The phone did look okayish in the spec sheet. But it is a very  stupid buy.The first thing you notice is  the IMPRACTICALITY of the phone.It is too heavy(220g) and too thick (about 1cm) to carry. The display is the worst anyone could get at this price point.The processor is reasonably slow. Face detection is a joke. Battery is 6000 mah but will take forever to charge. But the side fingerprint sensor was good .Camera was okayish. Add a few more bucks and buy a better phone with OLED display.

title: Regrettable purchase
body: They have conveniently skipped mentioning it is not an amoled display while mentioning 90 Hz refresh rate. Touch response is faulty on these phones and SAR value is high despite having exynos processor, which also they have conveniently skipped mentioning.

title: Poor Quality..MONSTER FOR BUYERS??
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 I had received this phone on 09th May 2021. For first two days it worked ok. (OK because this phone is very slow)BUT on third day, 12th May 2021, it was hanged very badly. It was neither getting switched off nor restarted..!!Immediately I have contacted the customer care for its solution. The Amazon representative has responded well and helped me to book technician's visit, which has completed on 15th May 2021.Amazon is ready for its replacement according to their 7 days replacement policy and hand to hand replacement.It was a traumatic condition for me as I have bought this phone in this COVID pandemic in very urgent condition and I badly need a phone always working 24X7 as my family was admitted in the hospital.Also, people who wish to buy it for its Camera then please beware as Samsung is advertising it as TRUE 48MP QUAD CAMERA but its result is like 8MP blurred one.Second thing is the phone is very slow and its UI is frequently NOT WORKING.Third thing is its speakers are giving old radio kind of noise.Luckily, there is no option for rating it ZERO or NEGATIVE star, else I would definitely give that rating to this product.There is "No Return Available" and only replacement option is given by Amazon.Only positive thing in this entire incident is that I have bought through Amazon and got their prompt support.I am very much thankful of Amazon as they have replaced this faulty device with new one on 16th May 2021, means within one day after technician visit.Now, I am only hoping that replaced SAMSUNG M12 mobile may perform to atleast "OK" level, if not to "GOOD or BETTER" standard.Dear Samsung, I will edit my review with positive points if I found the replaced product upto the mark..!!

title: Pathetic customer support
body: I bought the phone for my mother. Her usage is limited to making calls, the phone stays idle all the while. She had one more requirement that I shouldn't have to recharge it regularly. Hence choose this 6000 mAh battery phone. I was happy first few days, it gave 4+ day battery life but then an update came and spoilt everything. In 12 hours it would discharge completely. I approached the customer care and the customer care took remote access and checked logs and said, I see everything healthy in device. I told even though your log shows everything right, that doesn't translate to what I physically see. I probably had conversation for almost 10-15 mins but he was always coming to point he is not seeing problem. This was my first experience with samsung phone and this will be the last. And reason is not because product was bad but the customer support is pathetic. If I get into this kind of situation with their other products as well within a week or few weeks, I would simply waste my money. I am feeling lucky that I did not buy any of their exorbitant product and learnt the lesson at lesser cost.

title: One of the best value for money phones
body: Good- got it for 9999- decent phone for this cost with all the necessary gizmos and bling- finger print sensor is good. fast and sensitive. Haven't tried the face unlock.- display is top notch on any good Samsung phone for this price- quality pics/ decent ( note - I'm a normal user of camera )- battery is very good. its really a monsterBad ( depends on perspective )- slightly big for small hands- it has all the dumb samsung apps inbuilt ( you can uninstall a few )- slightly heavier when you have a good solid case ( read as spigen branded )Overall very happy to have a good ( more than decent ) phone for the initial offer price.

title: Some marketing gimmicks...
body: This phone has 90hz display, but I see a lag while browing or navigating in apps, doesn't feel like 90hz at all48MP true cam when option selected gives noisy images , otherwise in normal mode works above averageBattery is excellent works for 2 daysHeating issues occur on heavy usage, in normal mode you won't notice itFront cam 8 mp just averageOverall I took 6gb 128 gb version for 13k and doesn't seem as good.Above average phone for the price....

title: Average phone with bloatware : Samsung India forces to write review
body: Good phone in decent budget .Display could've been better , 90hz is not true to my usage . Since i use op7T it's clearly evident this display lacks the precision which it is said it has .Samsung India : they call me daily to inquire whether i have posted a review and what star rating should i give to the phone . This has become a headache .Dear samsung team , please do not force customer to write reviews and try to reduce the bloatware and unwanted app installations . I am starting to think MIUI was better than this .Display : not that they said / averageCamera : average / specs doesn't meetPerformance : ok for normal useBattery : good .Call quality : goodUI : Poor ,  I will not recommend samsung , this is not the one UI it was when i purchased M30S . Now this is full of bloatware and unwanted apps are getting installed by samsung store . I am puzzled on how to stop this.Overall : Very average phone . Better go for redmi note 10 or any other better phone in this price segment .Not a value for money dela

title: Best Phone @12499 for 6 GB RAM/128 GB ROM Variant
body: Pros:1. Best Battery i.e. 6000mAh.2. Good Back camera.3. Good and very necessary features by Samsung One UI. (I bet you'll like it)4. Good Performance (I use a lot of apps in multitasking but I don't play games so can't review gaming performance).5. Supports 15WT fast charging.6. Display is good according to the price range. (Don't get confused on poor display reviews.)7. Side positioned fingerprint sensor is good. (In starting you can face problems if you are currently using a back fingerprint sensor)8. Low light image from the back camera is also good. One attached in the image.9. Currently(11/04/21- 15/04/21) this phone is available @11700 (effective price)using Indusind bank cards so it is a loot deal for now. (Lowest ever price for this phone)Cons:1. Very bad front selfie camera which is 8MP (If you are a selfie addict then avoid it)2. Phone is very heavy and big in size.3. Adaptive brightness is not up to the mark.4.Animations are a little bit slow.5. Contact searching speed in the contacts app is very slow.(Resloved after update)6. After every update they install MX Takatak, Moz like apps which you can uninstall anytime. ( I think to make this phone that much affordable they are trying few methods of Mi and other Chinese brands.)Result: Best phone with all the latest features in this price range. @ 11700 - 12500Important(For those reviews who are saying the phone is slow): Got to developer options(Search Google for how to enable it ) and then Set Windows Animation Scale to .5x, Transition Animation Scale to .5x, Animator Duration to .5x. (Earlier all 3 developer options are set to 1x that's why the phone seems a little bit slow).Update: After update Contact searching speed became very good.

title: It is USB 2.0 enabled device and not MHL compatible
body: I bought this phone mainly for my kids online class during this pandemic. We thought to connect the mobile with our TV through HDMI adapter so that our kids can see the class directly on TV. When we tried to connect this mobile with HDMI adapter we came to know that this is not compatible with the adapter since it's USB hub is 2.0 (Don't know why Samsung configures the old USB hub for it's new mobiles). We also checked whether this mobile is MHL compatible or not? but it's not.If you are buying this mobile only for personal use then it's a good mobile. But if you are looking this mobile for your kid's online class then PLEASE DON'T BUY THIS.

title: Phone 📱 overall review
body: Very good phone. Camera display speed very good. Weight is little heavy.  But worth compare to the price

title: Below Average product from Samsung
body: Except battery life.. rest other options like camera, display , software are all useless. If Mobile size comes under 6 or 6'4 inch then it will be preferable for elder people(above 50 age). Over all it fails in all segments. Micromax in 1 is far better than M12

title: mediocre laggy device
body: I bought this for my dad who is currently using M21 1st edition. Let me list down pros and consPros:1. 6000 mah battery2. Branded device. Current M21 is already running in android 12 from android 10. So future updates is not an issue. Atleast we can expect 2 major updates.3. Charger included in box (15w)Cons:1. Lag lag lag. Even the UI transition every thing is lagging like hell. I dont know how it passed QC. Basic operations like going to contacts, app view , setting everything lags like hell.2. Device feels heavy due to 6000mah battery3.  very very mediocre camera. Okaish output. I am not expecting output like iphone or samsung premium mobiles. But atleast equal to the competitors like redmi at same price range.4. They should move out of 15w charger to atleast 25w qualcomm support. Due to large battery capacity takes long time to charge device to full.5. Loading web pages with lots of images is going to be a problem. For e.g., some people have google news as default home page. For them its going to be really slow.6. Missing amoled which is thr in current m21.Verdict: If you need a branded device at 11 to 14k budget then go to this device. If not go to redmi 10s or iqoo or poco mobiles as they offer better value of money. As soon as I held the device it felt little bit heavy.

title: Excellent Battery  and budget
body: I have been using this phone for more than a week and below is my feedback.1. Excellent battery and its lasts for 2 days at least on normal usage.2. Phone performance is good for normal usage such as YouTube,  Facebook or watsapp and usual games.3. Look and feel is good, easy to use.4. Phone is quite I feel probably due to battery  capacity.5. Front camera is not good but back one is good. This maybe great for selfie  lovers.6. Phone doesn't hang when multiple apps are opened.7. Worthy product  for this price based on spec and quality.I have attached  the photos taken and also same pic taken using both front and back camera  to show  the difference.  Overall it's a good budget Phone with all nice features and excellent battery.

title: Good phone 🤳📱 at reasonable price .
body: Initially i given 4 star and after few months of usage can see the sound quality degraded and very feeble .. camera outcome is not that much quality as they promised in d specs ..Samsung average phone at average price to meet out china companies competency..My old reviewI have bought 6GB Ram phone as I am long time user of Samsung and downgraded from high end series to this M series. D main reason u need to go for Samsung compared to China model phones is the SAR .SAR for this phone model is 1.19W/KG which is within the 1.6 range .Sound quality okayPicture quality is okay and not badBattery draining not that muchEase of navigation good 👍Performance is goodThis phone comes with backside Matt finish and not glossy finish ..tats s only cosmetic changes compared to M31 series ..Over all okay 👌🙂 ..head set won't be there which they mention in the items that they will provide..Overall decent price 👌

title: Best smartphone under 10k
body: key specsexynos 8nm exynos85048mp main camera6000mah batteryTYPE C - 15w fast chargingHD + display (but best in segment )UFS 2.1 (storage is high speed in this segment )RAM -4gb DDR4XFinger print scanner (super fast check vedio)face unlock (not fast as fingerprint )Android 11 One ui 3.1dual 4g volteSamsung has nailed it by reducing the price from 11499 to 9499 its the actual price for this beastprice - 9499 - its a value for money for this pricedisplay - its a HD + display but we cant make a disfference between FHD and HD + as samsungs displays are best Good display in this price point , i have used Redmi 9I , Realme c11 , Moto g8 power lite and samsung have the best display (check sample )battery - 6000 mah is not a gimmick it surely lasts for 2 days (not tested gaming - as this is ultra budget under 10k iam not a fool to test pubg in it  🤣camera -48 mp main camera - seen may reviewes that camera quality is poor but there is a dedicated option to switch on true 48 mp (one photo above 10 mb  😢) but best quality and its not a gimmick but in normal mode (without switching on 48mp mode its shit )macro - not a useful one but serves what it is for - if it was a 2x cam . thenpotrait - best as compairing its a budget under 10k , some areas blur is not perfect 4/5 markswide angle - iam not a fan of that and its a shitBuild - super quality - even though its 220 gm but the weight distribution is mind blowing and it doesnot feel uncomfortablecharging - the main thing attracted me is the Type C charger and it too the best in segment (9499) and this is the only phone with type c in 9000 to 10000 range and charging is fast considering its 6000 mahHeating issues - no heating as i said its a budget one and not for gamingExynos processor - its an efficient one as its the only chip in segement with 8nm means its highly efficientdonot consider it for gaming daily activiies like call,whatsapp, web browsing , watching youtube , etc are super coolUI - software experience - Its the best in segment as ONE ui is the best UI in the world as Oxygen os is killed by OPPO (RIP o2 os ) , So its the BEst one followed by Color os AKA new Oxygen os and its sibling Funtouch os , And the worst one is MIUI (not because of UI but software update and bugs )Samsung will provide updates regularly and Donot consider MIUI over ONe ui if you donot get a perfect phone in ONe ui consider colour OSMIUI has lots of bugs and it increases day by day and they will not provide any updates even for their flagship XIomi 11 ultra So donot choose MIUI until there is no other optionsVERDICT - Best phone for daily use for 9499 and its VFMdonot consider for 11499

And finally amazon is not replacing phone although we complaint on the first day of receiving it, they simply arrange a technician visit in the last 7 days they arranged visit for 3 times . But no technician visits simply they call from Gujarat when mayne is Hyderabad and simply say we will replace mobile but to amazon they say everything is fine and close the ticket. So finally understand that these technicians are nothing but amazon employees only and Amazon I'd dragging till the replacement deadline ends . They never gonna replace mobile also leave about return.And finally this is my first mobile bought in Amazon. Till now I used to buy in Flipkart. I never had any issue with Flipkart. title: Did Not Meet Basic Expectation
body: The phone doesn't meet the basic expectations from at a 10k budget segment and I was surprised to find that the MRP is INR 15499. The camera is a false 48MP and not at all true and the sensor has a very poor performance. There is no support for 5Ghz Wi-Fi which is strange to find at this age of mankind. The speed and performance of this octa core processor is sloppy.The only thing good about this phone is the battery backup and the storage provided in the higher configuration. If you are buying this phone for a standby purpose, then it is fine and worth the money. If you are considering to buy this as a primary phone, take deep breaths and look further for better options in the same budget segment.Always check the manufacturer website for specification details before buying the product.

title: Worst product from Samsung
body: I bought this phone for reputed brand, 128GB memory, 6 GB RAM.But my bad nothing is working :- It buffers every 5 seconds in each and every audio, video including downloaded videos/audios.- Does not have 5GHz wifi singal acceptance. It shows only 12 Mbps for a 200Mbps fiber comnection for 2.4GHz wifi signal.- Mobile voice network is always low. Voice break always happens, where as all my other mobile works fone.- All applications are very slow and crashes. (Faulty software even after updates).- Sound system including ring tone is very low.- Hotspot goes off multiple times without any reason.- Battery backup 12-14 hours and takes too long to charge- No support from Samsung (Closed 3 tickets without responding)Please don't buy, you will waste yor money.

title: Sir, I am really sorry however, M12 supports only 802.11 b/g/n 2.4GHz.
body: "Sir, I am really sorry however, M12 supports 802.11 b/g/n 2.4GHz."- This is the response from Samsung customer service when I inquired why not able to detect to my Router 5G. Even 6K Chinese mobiles have 5G detection - so before you buy think and check as the mobile has very limited features. The battery life is not great while it is 6000.... and camera is very normal standard. The mobile as a whole is a big compromise to the cost and is not a value for money product.

title: processor,  battery are ok , Fingerprint sensor,camera and UI not good
body: After a long span of time say 3 years, im back to Samsung. Now, Samsung realise that selling their name is no more working and reduce the price at the level of other company to success in the market . I bought 6 gb one and very happy with it now.However,  as before, many of the inbuild apps irritating me which are not uninstallable.After using it for 3 months plus, let me give my fair opinion:1. Battery life makes me happy, but fast charging needs 2 hrs plus is little bit annoying.2. Camera must not be more than 12 Megapixel. As compared to my previous phone MI Note 6 pro, I dont see any better snap here.3. Finger print sensor is absolutely annoying. Most time i have to enter my password manually as FP sensor do not detect my fingerprint. How my previous phone MI Note 6 pro nicely detects my fingerprint and easily open phone has been missing here.4. As MAH is more, thr weight of phone is bit heavy. I dont know why Silicon cover of around Rs 99 approx cannot be attached here in the package!! I bought silicon cover from Amazon but lately arrived which cause my phone screeen crack due to fallen from my bed. If it was in Silicon cover, the Lcd must have been intact till now. MI 6 Pro had come with one extra phone safety cover but Samsung cannot.5. After two years , I come to Samsung again hoping much UI improvement. However, i found Samsung do not compete with even MI in certain ways. I need to put Alarm clock on, i can easily go directly to all clock setting by clicking wall paper clock in MI while this phone need me to go to the clock in menu and so. When a turn on torch, i can easily turn it off by pressing power button in MI while this phone needs me to open screen and tap on torch icon in menu manuallyAs off now, i can point out these points to ascertain my judgement. I will comeback after using a year if get time

title: Nice product

Awesome phone on this price range.Thank amazon & its seller partners, once more thank for courier partner too which help to delivery my item on time & safty.  Thank all

title: Samsung m12 better backup experience it's excellent
body: I'm writing this review after using few days I must say samsung m12 is great phone  in  budget segment  compared to vivid v17 and realme 6pro that I'm already using  samsung m12 better backup  is excellent after 12hr using only 30% 0f better  used but I'm requesting  samsung  to do some important on all cameras  in next update  actually need some improvement  but  I must say in Rs.10999/  this the best samsung m12 phone if anyone thinking to buy samsung m12 please go for it ...but befor that few things I'm not happy with phone is1) network connectivity need updated as soon as possible2) Amazon, Amazon prime, flipkart and eew more apps not working bugs is their.3) YouTube also buffering after connected 6mbps speed network4) In the software I think lost of bugs are their need updat as soon as possible. from my side I like it very much thanks samsung for this budget phone  thanks Amazon for one day delivered

title: Not worth the money spent.
body: I bought Samsung Galaxy M12. Initially, the mobile worked good but for the past 3-4 days the mobile is geting heats up even without using and while charging it hets heats up.Since this mobile carried 1 year warranty for manufacturing device and 6 months warranty for in-box accesories including battery.I request Amazon or Samsung(manifacturer) to replace the said mobile at the earliest.

title: Good purchase!
body: Although i ordered this mobile for my dad. He uses it and i can't give my reviews.But i did setup the mobile app in the beginning and he is using it happily.One thing stands out here is that its 6000mAH battery, that means 8 hours of standby time.I would love to own a mobile with 6000-8000 mAh battery.And there is no easy way of replacing the battery, once it has reached its age.So its a good purchase, really good battery life. Good.

title: Performance & price
body: In dis price u can afford M12 ...no doubt...overall excellent performance

title: Worth for Money
body: Good and worthy for the money, camera is not that much better, other features are good but too much advertisements in the phone which iritates users. Some mandatory features from Samsung which can't be disabled permanently.

title: Good Features, okayish Phone
body: I gave it 4 Stars for the features that do work and not because it's a great phone. Considering price I paid for It I am reviewing it.Pros: Good Battery Life, Great Fingerprint sensor placement, Speakers are good as well for the price, Widevine L1 support with Dolby Atmos too. Storage is plenty with Expandability. Form factor I found good Too.Cons: Performance; sometimes it lags and the 90hzs is a gimmick, the UI itself is too laggy to notice it's smoothness. They went wrong in cameras too, just because they can afford to put a 48 megapixel camera doesn't mean it's good. The ISP is bad and makes even the bayered photos look noisy. I would suggest to use a GCam mod, then again I didn't find one that works perfectly for Exynos 850. Also other 3 cameras are just as bad if not worse. Shooting raw helps if you have the time to edit it later on Lightroom or snapseed.Also Noticed that the software adds background blur that looks unnatural, at f2.0 this should not happen at all.Get it for you parents.

title: Good phone for a great price. Not a snapdragon chip, but that is not an issue.
body: Amazon did a great job with the delivery of this product. Ordered and received on the same day.On the phone: I am happy with it. Have been using this phone for 3 days. The battery lasts for 1and half days with gaming and binge watching videos.The screen is comfortable. No issues on the screen, though  it is not amoled for an average user it is not a big difference.For the price this is a great buy, of course there is no snapdragon chip. But the exynos 850 is 8nm and at this price point is comparable to most snapdragon 6series chipsets.Camera is decent. As long as you are not a professional photographer,  this will be good enough to take atleast average if not great pics. (Some  pics are really great).This is definitely not an iPhone or one plus. But for the price it definitely is great.

title: Great mid range Phone !!
body: This phone is amazing for the price. Phone runs smooth considering it's a Exynos 850 Octa core processor. I like the 90Hz screen and I keep it ON all the time.  The fingerprint recognition is extremely fast and reliable. It has a decent camera, the battery is long lasting. The only deal breaker is that it doesn't support 5GHz Wi-Fi. Android 11 with One UI 3.1 is clean and very responsive and runs smooth without stutter or lag. One can avoid ads and bloatware if you setup the device carefully. I haven't seen a single ad on my device and I have been using it for almost 3 weeks.It's the best budget phone for the features you get. Doesn't look or feel cheap.

title: About Samsung M12
body: Mobile looks good, battery is good,Camera better,Not good for gaming continue usage of gaming get heating issue.Normal usage of mobile is awesome

title: Overall good product..
body: Pros :6 gb ram128 gb storagePlus 48 mp back cameraHuge 6000mah batteryLooks are pretty good as wellFingerprint sensor is on the sideCons :Front camera is horribleScreen is not upto the markDue 6k mah battery it is little bit heavyOnly 15 watt chargerNo slow mo or other features in cameraConclusion:If you use it for general use, storage, binge watching it is a great phone but if u are gamer, photo addict, looks then it's not worth it.Although great phone by Samsung in this price range.

title: Highly disappointed
body: I got this M12 (4 / 64 gb and 6000 battery) as an upgrade to the M01 Core (1 / 16 gb and 3000 battery) phone, in the hope that it would be better ... BUT:1.  battery despite being double the size does not last any longer ..... 50-60% after only1 day of light use (I dont do any social stuff, only 3-5 talks and 1-3 messages per day);2. the ringtone and message notification choice is very poor .... had to import from the old phone;3. could not download ringtones directly to phone, but this may well be more of a problem related with Google;4. software is not friendly, even after 1 full day of struggle, have not been able to locate / access storage card;5. was very happy with the 1 / 16 gb in my earlier phone and never had memory usage beyond about 60%, but this guy eats up more than 2 gb out of the 4 gb RAM even to start with even after i have uninstalled most of the "apps";6. one of the reasons of purchasing this was for its USB teethering, which works fine.Bring back the good old button phones (with proper software as 15 years back, and with some improvement in screen / pixels) and get rid of the bloatware.Think.

title: Awsome phone with brick size.
body: Recently I bought this galaxym12 for Rs.11k. Overall ok. But onething have to remember thst is thickness of the phone. Its 10mm THICK. Just like a brick in your pocket. Overall dimension of the phone also big. Hight , width, especialy thickness. Before i bought i didn't noticed the sizes of the this piece. Thats my mistake too. But u guys please concern about this review before you buy. Otherthan size completly ok at this price.

title: Good Budget phone
body: I gifted my mom this phone in November 2021 and got a better discount for 64GB. Overall it is good, even i feel the size is big but its not that broad while holding it in your hands. Screen quality is good, Camera performs really well in daylight, in low light it suffers a bit and pictures are not that clear and color is also not that accurate. Battery is very good, it goes for more than a day and half (As usage is off-course not that much) but considering the price i believe this is a good choice, Samsung has some bloat ware which you can avoid by unchecking the boxes while setting up at the first time, or delete the apps after your first setup. Rest no major complaints, charger is not turbo charge but it does it work as expected. Thx

title: Budgetary Phone for Frequent Callers
body: Look, feel and finish of the phone is good and up to the standards of Samsung. I am a frequent traveller and caller so was looking for a budgetary phone which has most of the features along with good battery backup. This meets my requirement.Pros:- Fit and finish is very good- Good battery backup- Performance is good with fast response- Storage and ram is sufficient as I opted for 6 GB RAM and 128 GB storage variant- Responsive finger printing sensor- Loud and clear sound with and without speaker for calls- Clear voice callingCons:- Heavy weight makes it difficult to hold and use- The screen is HD only. Not even FHD but supports 1080 p video viewing- 4 K videos will never play in 4 K mode. Only can be played in 1080 p resolution- No gyroscope and magnetometer sensor which means, compass application and some games which use these sensors will never work- No Corning Gorilla class. Screen is prone to scratches without cover- Sound is below average for music listeners- Double tap doesn’t work to wake up the screenConclusion:Only go for this if you are using for phone calls with good battery backup. Not worth for entertainment purpose. I can still survive on this as I have an iPad for entertainment. Samsung is marketing it in such a way where none of the sensors specifications and entertainment features are mentioned clearly on the website as it is not having any of them. It’s a true calling phone !

title: Deficiency in service
body: I have focused only on deficiencies of service and breach of commitment of your organisation. It may be noted that yours is a service organisation as defined under various statutes of Indian law. You are obligated to be abide by the Indian laws. Accordingly, a customer has every right to question deficiency of services rendered to him in meeting requirements of consumer durables. You cannot impose any restrictions on the comments. Your guidelines are may be for your internal administration. My comments are neither profane nor obscene. I have only expressed my anguish and helplessness in not getting redressal of my grievances.

title: Worst camera phone ever and worst customer support from Amazon
body: Most third class camera quality . I had phone in my young days which was 5 megapixel it clicked better photos than this 50 megapixel camera . Samsung as well as Amazon is just fooling people by their publicity . I will request everyone never ever think off this phone absolute waste of money . And amazon is not taking care of customers grievance . Amazon has become one of the most  thirdclass in customer satisfaction  50 megapixel shoots photos like 5 megapixel or even lower quality.phone heats up during charging. Never buy product from Amazon I requsted for a return but amazon denied it. I am never going tobuy anything from Amazon in future .

title: Good for general use
body: Bought this for my Dad. Its good enough for general use.Pros:1. Performance : Its fast enough for general use. Did not notice much lag in UI.2. Features : Has more features than my Samsung F41, like camera macro mode.3. Battery : Lasts long.4. Weight : Has some weight but it doesn't feels so when in hand.Cons:1. Software : Somewhat buggy. The keypads in Upi app doesn't show up completely.2. Camera : Average quality. Indoor photos have noise. Also, its takes a bit time to process the image after capture.Overall, its good budget phone for general use and not for extensive use.Recommended!

title: Good phone but front camera is not upto the mark.
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 Phone is good at this price. Battery life is long. It will lasts upto 2 days if you are doing simple tasks on it.Processor is good.But one thing here is to mention that, if you are looking for good camera quality phone this is not it. Its front camera is not good. Picture quality ruining when you zoom in. So Overall good phone 🖖 except camera 📷

title: Average Phone
body: Cons-Camera is average.Display dosent feel as smooth as 90 hertz it feels just like normal display.Battery life is ok but not as per 6000 mah only last 1.5 days with moderate usage.Also samsung does not provide any back cover with this mobile so if u buy this mobile do purchase a backcover.Pros-Customisation of samsung is good...lot of themes to change the look of your mobile screen.Buit quality is ok.Sound quality is good.Fingerprint reader is fast.Don't trust Youtubers who are just marketing this mobile for sake of money....These people are biggest frauds.

title: Good for this price range except no dual band wifi support
body: Camera picture quality not up to the par! But considering the price range, it is acceptable!But no 5GHz band support! Unacceptable in 2021!!90Hz screen refresh rate does not feel like 90Hz!Lot of lag is present! Don't know if that is a software bug!Battery performance is good!!Speakers are good, as expected.Overall, except the WiFi dual band support issue, rest is acceptable in this price range!!

title: Slow loading of all apps and poor response even for making calls
body: Received my M13 4G phone yesterday. This is 6 GB RAM/128GB phone but is so much slower than my previous Redmi Note 7 which is only 3GB RAM /64GB phone. I use only social media and calls. I don't use any games etc and uninstalled all unwated apps and games.  I am very dissatisfied of the long time taking to load even the Amazon app or time taken to  making a call. And the worst part is you cannot return it as they have only replacement policy. Redmi Note 11 is a far better, faster and lighter phone at the same price range

title: Value for money....
body: Superb..... Great speed.... and photos clarity. Loving ...... Battery last 100% charge, using since 2 days... Yet at 23% . Banking , payment security 👍. Camera 😘🥳, Speed ❤️❤️, All quality of phone , as name Samsung is Enough 👍❤️❤️❤️. Brand is Brand. Price range 👍🥰🥰. Finger print sensor 💪🏃⛷️⛷️⛷️superb. I will rate phone for this price range 95. As only 2 colour options available.

title: Sheer Jank + Maniplative Refund Policy
body: Don't buy. I have no idea why this product has so many positive reviews, but it scares me to think that so many people may actually find this phone an improvement over their previous devices. What have y'all been using?The camera lags worse than a VGA. Camera quality is OK at best, but the stutter! Omg the stutter! Especially the front cam! It's worse than nearly all of the phones I've used in the past decade or so. Absolutely nacceptable in a phone released in 2021.Right out of the box, everything lags. Want to open your contact list? Lag. Your message box? Lag. Playstore? Lag. Camera? You know it. Lag. Swipe left, Lag. Swipe right, Lag. Unbelievable!And then there's the return policy. Which is to say, there is no return policy. If your product arrives damaged, they'll send you another one. But if you're unsatisfied with the level of jank this phone has to offer (like I don't know, maybe you wanted a phone that doesn't go through F1 racing levels of motion blur if your pupils so much as dilate), you're told we don't take back our clearly terrible product. You're stuck with it until you can find a decent phone, accept that you have to take a loss of over 50%, and exchange this thing for a much better phone. Samsung, what were you guys on when you cooked this up? It's bad enough to make me swear off your products indefinitely and find more honest purveyors.

title: Good for average usage; no wifi calling, speaker volume very low
body: Good phone for average daily use. I am slightly disappointed as wifi calling feature is missing. My old M30 had wifi calling two years ago. Also, the call volume is very low, I have to press against my ear to listen to calls.

title: Not as expected
body: Samsung is cheating people with marketing big numbers for a product. All the specifications are just on paper.In reality, every specification is just sub-par.Camera quality is same as what you see in phones that released in 2012-2013, like Galaxy Grand 2.Battery is advertised as 6000mAh, but in actual, it gives the same result as a 3000mAh battery.Processor is just utter crap.Seeing a phone for the first where the initial setup itself lags like anything.Display quality feels same as resistive touch era phones.Screen shows bleeding symptoms.I wish they had a return policy instead of replacement.

title: Best Budget phone in last few years and it’s so smooth
body: No need to underestimate exynos 850, with 90Hz refresh rate.it’s not disappointed me. I bought it as second phone(I use iPhone SE 2020).With normal use more then 48hrs still 44% battery leftFingerprint sensor is unbelievable it’s so quickCamera is decent enough to capture picturesDisplay Quality is GoodOverall I felt good for buying it for 9999/- with ICICI credit card offer.It’s worth buying, it’s far better than other MI with same price (10999-12999 in 4GB -64GB ) as Samsung don’t irritate with adds and also more secured

title: Good phone at budget!!!
body: Samsung M12 has a good battery life, average charging speed with type c and moderate camera quality. Side mounted fingerprint scanner is fast and responsive.While setting up for first time do not accept optional terms and conditions, otherwise it will show ads and load unnecessary apps, watch YouTube videos on how to disable ads and stop apps from installing. A good backup smartphone if you already have costly smartphone.

title: Do not buy this Adware phone!
body: This phone comes with a ton of garbage Apps pre Installed. Samsung appears to be partner with IronSource which is a mobile app advertising company and they will keep bugging you to install tons of non sense apps. Over 10 apps were installed on my phone without my permission or without me asking or agreeing to anything. I did not expect this from Samsung phones, I know this is the case with most chinese phones such as Xiaomi but figures even Samsung comes with such Adwares. I wouldn't have bought this phone if I knew it was an Adware phone. You have been warned.

title: Monester battery back up and great product from Samsung
body: I had procured this phone for my Dad, who had a 5 year old Motorola G5Plus phone. He was adamant that he dont want to replace the phone, as he got so used to the old phone user interface. Thanks to Samsung's better user interface, he was able to adapt to an easier to use phone. Let me get to the advantages and disadvantagesAdvantages1) Ease to use Samsung interface that is self intuitive for senior citizens. I was a bit apprehensive but Dad himself said it is easy to use2) Monester battery back up, one of the reason for shifting from the old phone is that the battery backup offered from a 3500mah battery v/s 6000mah batteryDisadvantages1) It has only a 2.4Ghz wifi connectivity, which is really bad. However for my Dad, he just uses the phone for Whatsapp and basic purpose and the incremental 5Ghz band wifi would have been good. The earlier phone had it.Thanks to Amazon for shipping the product express fast to a tier 3 city and delighting my Dad i.e. ordered placed on Sunday early morning and phone was received by Monday morning... super fast. The associate who done the exchange was patient as well (Dad did not allow me to remove the SIM and the SD card until the new phone arrived). Had to go through the Amazon device validation etc.  Highly recommended.

title: Worthy product 10k
body: Purchased and used for almost +3 months.Overall review is good. It's a best phone if you purchased below Rs11,000. I purchased on Rs10499Pros-Camera 4/5Battery 4.5/5UI 4/5Cons-In-Hand experience 3.5/5

title: Por quality of parts and an overall disappointment
body: The build feels flimsy and cheap, I got one with a bent display. Unfortunately I never realised this defect until I went to pick up a back case and it wouldn't fit.Back at the Samsung service centre they said it isn't covered under warranty, and I should've returned it at the time of delivery.Camera is nowhere close up 48MP as claimed, pictures clicked with it are mediocre, to say the least.The only saving grace is the decent battery life.It's a good phone to stay away from though

title: Good device with some major issues.
body: This phone is mostly suited for multimedia, video, internet, office work.Pros-1. Good battery, 2. Connectivity, 3. Knox Security, 3. Design, 4. Price(because samsung mobiles are costlier), 5. Camera, 6. Durability, 7. Side mounted fingerprint, 8. Quick finger print reading, 9. Display (although it's a tft panel but picture quality is quite impressive), 10. Type c, 11. Fast charge, 12. Ui.Cons-1. Heavy weight, 2. Quiet thicker, 3. Processor (heating issue, sometimes heats up without any reason maybe because of background process), 4. Ui lags, could be more optimized, 5. Display (samsung could have given atleast ips panel), 6. Charger(15w charger is not sufficient for a 6000mah battery) 7. Because of ui and processor the battery service becomes very bad which could be good although.

title: 🗣️ONE WORD👍 '📱KING'
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 🤡Good camera, 🔴Nice Build Quality and Excellent Ram Management. 👀Performance of 6000🔋 Mah Battery Life For 2 Days Enough With Single Charge. Its Really Monster. 🗑️Overall It is Perfect 📱Smartphone for Every One. Finger Print Senser and Face Lock is Very Fast. 👍🔴Excellent work by samsung in 2021.🎱

title: RAM PLUS FEATURE NOT WORKING
body: Im not able to expand the Ram memory using Ram Plus feature...as promised in the phone description by Samsung.Only 2 options are present in Ram plus: 2GB and 4GB. In website it is clearly mentioned, that the phones Ram can be extended to 8GB. Dint expect this type of FRAUD from Samsung

title: Good phone but could have been better. Rating 4 stars
body: Although the overall experience is good but few basic things missing:1. You can't take screen shots by swiping on screen. You have to juggle with volume and start button which is not user friendly.2. You don't have option of "always on display " to just tap the screen and see time.Good things:1. Back cover is good. Specially the blue one.2. Light weight and sleek.3. No lag while playing games.To summarize, it's a value for money.

title: Good value for money - (12/12/21) - Samsung Galaxy M12 (Blue,6GB RAM, 128GB Storage) - .
body: 16/12/21Re-review, after one week of usage, ( learning the product better). I recall my review on12/12/21.Good value for money.  After learning the product and it's  features, I find my choice is worth.I have no idea how the picture quality is coming different & good to first few pictures.I am happy with my purchase.Thanks.__________12/12/21 - not the value for money - Samsung Galaxy M12 (Blue,6GB RAM, 128GB Storage)Review is based on first three days use.Reason for this purchase - switching from MotoXForce, due to irreplaceable exhausted battery & incresed ROM need.Rating for Amazon as market place - 4/5. (good display of available options, window shopping, product information, product comparison, communication)Rating for product - Samsung Galaxy M12 (Blue,6GB RAM, 128GB Storage):One star out of Five - Utter poor camera quality - 48MP quad cam image quality is damn inferior than my previous 24MP MotoXforce image. So unimaginable from Samsung. I find Galaxy S3 images are so fine quality.Battery charging not as fast, as the listing claims.Battery life (6000mAh) - not in tune with expectation, ehausts sooner.Fingerprint reader -  not always recognising. (perhaps the narrow finger print sensor limitation)This is disappointing.I encourage you go for a better option than M12.Thanks.

title: Worth the price!
body: 1. All calls can be automatically recorded without announcement to the other person.2. Images, videos from dual WhatsApp also can be downloaded on laptop.3. Battery lasts very long.4. Phone cleaner app (like Redmi) is not available. It is essential.5. Network speed (like Redmi) is not available. It is essential.6. Fingerprint reader is ok type.7. Overall value for money, as I hardly play games on mobile.

title: Great phone ...great value
body: You won't regret buying this phone, unmatched quality. Quality of calls, screen and sound is superb. No annoying pop ups or apps. Safe and secure for banking and transections, no spying or peaky apps pre-installed.  Unlike other, no fake marketing or unessassry promotion of featuresThis is a great phone, looks premium, offers more then value, and very promising.  don't even consider other phones, specifically Chinese brands.

title: Overall Basic Phone by Samsung
body: Its like a pure Samsung stock Android phoneEverything is customisable ,its easy to use no lags or glitchesGames run smoothly COD , Asphalt 9 etcCall Quality is goodThere is no wifi 6 feature ( not everyone has wifi 6 at home yet)Overall a great simple phone must buy!!!! Just Rs 10,000/-

title: Worth buying product from Samsung
body: Apart from all the negative reviews, still I bought Samsung M13 . Everything is perfect in this price segment. There is no doubt  when it comes Samsung and Apple.Good mobile in this price rangeTrust worthy sellerAmazon service is always bestGenuine seller with genuine productBattery life is goodOverall worth buying the mobile.

title: PERFECT FOR DAILY NORMAL USE
body: I am writing this review after 5 month usageI own the version with 4gb ramI use for daily normal work(internet email whatsapp music twitter etc).  it runs totally fine , no hassle. also battery life is good, it is enough to run 24 hours after 1 full charge.I like the user interface as there is minimum pre installed app, also samsung now allows to remove pre-installed apps, thus making the phone faster.so for normal daily usage, just go for it without a second thought. it is a perfect budget phone.

title: Faulty device
body: The phone delivered had issues with connectivity.The mobile network would abruptly go out of reach and you can then not send, receive calls or use mobile data. This started happening after 2 days of light usage. ( I still had my old phone intact).Amazon customer care support was even worse. They imposed having an engineer visit to diagnosis the phone and that never happened. Someone just connected with me over phone and told me to install some app and then run some tests of touch, sound, etc. I mean I never complained about the touch and audio.The issue was with the network connectivity...Later they said that they had no way to check the connectivity issue of the phone and hence marking the phone as  "Ok". Now I am being offered a replacement. But I don't trust this model anymore and I am being denied the refund. What a mess !The other cons with this model:1. Very heavy2. The display is very very dull3. Have lagging issues (it's still just 4-5 days old)Update:Amazon customer care acknowledged the device fault and have initiated the refund process.

title: Good for the price but unwanted apps installed without permissions
body: I got it for 8999 with bank discount, very good phone for the price. Battery is awesome,it lasts for 9 hour continuous video Play and 1.5 day nirmal use.15W charger charges fast.Fingerprint on side is fast and it's easy to unlock then phone on table. Other phones have fingerprint at back side which is useless.Camera quality isnt that good but it's okay.Only problem is Samsung installs unwanted apps without permission. It installed the paisabazaar app without my permission. The "paisabazaar" and "policybazaar" are the biggest scammers in India.

title: Already opened or used
body: So far I ve no issues regarding the producr quality and delivery,it was gud...further comenting after using the product for a week or so...but as revealed above in the pictures,I think I ve got a used or already opened product,I mean whenever I ve bought the product from the store,I ve got it well packed and sealed(in a transparent plastic cover)but here....it is without any covering or seal.Thats why our family never likes to buy such stuff from amazon....flipkart is best for electronic items and gazettes

title: Good one with powerful battery
body: Good one. Serves the purpose. Good phone in budget. Powerful longlasting battery. A bit bulky and a bit slower (compared to higher mid range phones) considering 6GB RAM but you can turn off the animations (by activating developer mode) to make it faster. Still very few apps r a bit slower but that is quite acceptable as it doesn't irritate. Getting 6GB RAM for INR 11500 is awesome. It is not that slow also. Camera is good but shutter speed is slower. Hence, u need to be very steady while clicking pictures in low light else they turn out to be shaky. Nonetheless, a very descent camera in this range. Very difficult to get 6GB RAM Samsung in just 11500. Overall happy about this purchase. Good if u want a phone around 10K. Much better than simply spending 20-30K for few added features. Good if u want a secondary phone for office use (checking emails, etc.). Good for kids online classes. Sturdy enough. If u want non Chinese phone and r getting 6GB RAM in 11500 nothing like it. Just go for it. No regrets. Loving this phone.

title: Good budget phone
body: I got it delivered yesterday. So these are my first impressions after initial setupSize:This is a huge phone. So if you have small hands this phone cannot be used single handed. If you need to use it single handed often, better go for a grippy case with a string or a ring case so it doesn't fall out. Or go for a small phoneSpeed:It is a bit slow, but you can get used to it. For the price range, it seems to have a decent performance.Audio:This phone is advertised as supporting Dolby Atmos but that's only for bluetooth or other audio devices. Not for the phone speaker. Which is kind of a shame. But the audio is not bad.Video/Screen:Blacks are not exactly black. But again, for this price you shouldn't notice those things.Colors are bright***The phone is country locked. So to activate any other country sim you must first use an Indian sim for 5 mins cumulatively.I have not tested the other features like camera, fingerprint sensor etc. Will update as soon as I do

title: I have face the problem with audio after 10 days used,
body: The cellphone is good built quality,there id some problem in camera quality and the finger sensor,Most biggest problem that ihave faced in decice in 10 days th calling quality and the audio its not working well,Ex- Your device volume setup in 1 to 10 ,1 is lower and 10 means higher, i have set on 10 but volume listing like 4-5 the same problem in calling if we are on call the same issue i m facing with device.

title: Privacy Concern
body: The phone is preinstalled with some useless annoying apps which collect personal data and no guarantee that these collected data will not be misused. Some apps, you can not delete like Samsung Pay Mini, Samsung Free and Galaxy Store etc. I think, customer must have right to delete or uninstall as per its own wish without rooted the phone and these type of forceful use of app is not justified. After all, customer is paying full payment for the phone and not for the annoying useless apps which collect personal data even without consent.

title: Very nice phone, great value.
body: I am Samsung user for longest time and despite some negetive reviews, I say best value for money. Only downside are its heavy, but you get use to it and the screen quality. Yes, side by side my other Samsung its a let down, but of its own it's absolutely fine. So, if high quality OLED is must for you then get the one of the other models.Rest no hang issues, does not heat, brilliant battery (as a backup phone on extreme power saver mode it lasted over 5 days!).

title: Don't Buy, No Exchange
body: This phone is not listed on Exchange models while buying a new phone which means Samsung has delisted its own product. That's how Junk this product is for Samsung. Amazon says exchange is listed by seller. We buy from Amazon and not Samsung. Add some more money and buy better products then electronic junks on Sale especially Mobile Phones.Sale period defective and faulty units are rolled out otherwise a new product cannot have problems within a month. There are only 2 buttons in a smart phone and that also most important one goes bad or was missing parts. You will waste money even in warranty - they charge pickup drop as travelling 10kms during covid and wasting half day in queue is a disaster.That's why Samsung sales suffer in Mobile phone markets------------------------------------------within 20 days the fingerprint scanner button stops working. initially looked good. it seems they are reselling used phones which can work until return window is closed. Amazon has zero liability post return window and they dumped junk

title: Worst product from samsung and worst services from amazon
body: Do not purchase this phone. This is the worst product from Samsung. I have been trying for a replacment and amazon is simply wasting my time by sending different technicians. Their technicians are fruad too. They detect the issue in front of you and mark issue as resolved in their app. I never expected this sort of services from a brand like amazon.Coming to the issues with mobile, my major dissapointment is with the camera quality. The pixel quality is poorer than ever. Phone doesnt connect to 5hz internet frequency. Amazon should look into this seriously and priortize their customer needs

title: Defective Product
body: It's very bad that the sound in my phone is not working in just less than 1 month of purchase. We have warranty and Samsung may rectify the issue but who is responsible for the trouble we faced for two or three days. Samsung slowly going down and they can lose market share if they do not take an action on sellers who are selling defective pieces. 1 is the highest score that I can give but this phone is deserved for 0 or less.

title: Battery life is Good But not the camera
body: I gifted this smartphone to my Dad. He doesn't use smartphone that much so i was focused on large battery backup category. I found this smartphone and the reviews is very bad about camera and speed.Definitely this isn't the phone if you're looking for gaming or making videos on it. You have to pay more for that but this is good smartphone for parents or children's for study.I didn't like the camera and it doesn't support 5Ghz band in wifi and it also doesn't support Full HD videos because of HD Display.Colors are good and overall my dad is satisfied with the performance. So, if you're thinking about to gift this phone to your parents the you are good to go but if you're buying for yourself and you can expand your budget then go for Better processor and storage type.

title: Just Go For It!
body: ( I have the 6GB/128GB variant and this User Review is on this model ) If you are a NORMAL User like me....who does not play any Games or doesn't use the phone camera much......and just use it to phone call, binge some movies or TV Shows or listen to some quality music, then this phone is EXCELLENT for Usage. Go for the 6GB/128GB variant as some of the RAM and STORAGE is already occupied by the system. The display is good for viewing too... not too bad. PROS I FOUND AFTER MY USER EXPERIENCE:1) Android 11 out of the box, ONE UI CORE 3.1 is awesome and simplistic.2) It has DOLBY ATMOS for headphones which definitely gives a difference.3) The weight and thickness is AVERAGE and you won't even notice anything.4) Fingerprint Scanner is working well and good.5) Some of the Motion and Gestures settings are really cool and useful.6) The HIGHLIGHT of this phone is the Battery, and for me it lasted completely for 3 days straight on normal calls and some youtube.The charging time is worth it for the battery duration. This phone will get updates till android 13 or 14, which is great. The Exynos 850 8nm Processor is working well in terms of speed and smoothness. The 90Hz Refresh Rate is great and I felt the difference in smooth animations. A GREAT FULL ON PACKAGE FOR A NORMAL USER.

title: Dont Buy this or any samsung device under 20K
body: Dont buy this phoneI bought 4gb 64gb in jan 2022 variant but doesnt match the performanceit doesnt show real time internet speed i had to download extra app for itit has no app lock unlike all the other smartphones. you can only lock the phone.face recognition not very fastno efficient call recording feature, it only saves call when you cut the call, if the other person cuts the call it wont be saved. call recorder also records calls in dont know which quality and are of huge sizes.problems while file sharing.gaming - basic games hang when internet is on.some apps run differently than other android apps.annoying apps like samsung market place which will download unnecessary data from you mobile pack.only 2.4g wifi band.camera takes 48mp photos but only size wise, no good quality. portrait mode is not at all good blurs everything.UPI transactions UI is not optimised.many other software bugs.buy any mi realme device within the same range it has more features and you wont have to bang your head on the wall.

title: Okay phone
body: Packaging - Bad (Though the item was fulfilled, Amazon?). After few days of usage; okay phone. New software.The battery does not feel like 6000mah; last 24-28 hours on low to just mid-level usage.A heating issue with 20 mins of YouTube watch and a notification is displayed that the device will be automatically turned off due to heating (while charging).The overall company wants to earn with this without much bothering about the value proposition.

title: If you are a MI user....& travel lover...read this.
body: No doubt it is a good smartphone but I was a MI user before and now facing some problem and some features are missing.here are my reviews on M12:Bettery backup is best ,camera quality normal but front camera is good. Screen size is very big for your pocket,Brightness is harmful for eyes in night eyeprotector is useless, you can add only 3  fingerprint for lock and sensor is wrost place at a very odd position, silence key is missing, 4 camera is a myths, 48mp camera also a myth,  for MI user: no magnitometer it means no compass for North South,  working.  When put earphone no icon show at above you can't know plugged in or not, power button doesn't off the flash light, 3 finger screenshot not working here, C-type charger so you have to take charger everywhere. OTG not supported,  heavy weight, Camera have very limited features like no timelaps video option, no grid view, no screen focus option.  It is a good phone if it will your first phone then it's OK but if you are MI user then in my opinion don't go for this .......

title: Don't buy pathetic phone
body: Don't buys it doesn't support LTE plus , it doesn't support 4G plus , it doesn't support 5HZ.Worst phone ever seen.And major issue is that you can not return it.No use at all even you can not book OLA or UBER with mobile sim network internet as speed of sim internet is in very old technology.

title: Defective Product
body: Purchased mobile on 12th April 2021. IMEI number blocked on 20th April 2021. Enquired with Amazon they just simple told, replacement period over, not able to return the item.Again enquired with Samsung authorized service centre, they told it's a defective product, please discuss with amazon customer care, they only able to replace the item.If this product is purchased from Shop (offline) , maximum 14 days validity for replacement.Now need to change the mother board, it will take minimum 15 days. myself helpless from amazon. Please try to avoid the purchase from amazon.

title: Awesome Battery and Finger Print sensor
body: Bought it for my mom, she uses it for only calling and basic stuff. It's battery is awesome and easily goes around 3 days. Display is also of good Quality. I really like the side mounted finger print sensor, way better than buggy on screen camera based finger print sensors which merly have suceaa rate of 70% and less. I am using S22 Ultra and I found mine as buggy who doesn't work always, this is 1/12th the price of flagship and have much better finger print sensor on the side.

title: Decent phone for someone who doesn't use too many apps.
body: Overall the phone is good...huge screen size and battery life is superb! However, I have been facing issues with the performance of the phone. At times it runs slow, inspire of having just the basic apps installed. There are also instances where when I have to click the send button which in some apps is located on the top, it automatically takes me to another app!The only way to solve this issue then is by restarting the phone...and this happens on a daily basis. I have tried reformatting the phone to resolve the issue but it still remains. Also the colours of the photos arnt as dynamic as compared to the Samsung S10.

title: Good At this Price
body: I'm writing this review after 1 month of use. here is what is faced in this 1month span.cons :1. Auto-restart sometimes without information.2. Messages app having every time.3. Battery is average.4.90 Hz refresh rates stuck your phone.5. Charging Takes 2 hours. the charger is 9w, not 15w.6. Video Quality compromised.7. No App lock inbuilt.8. Installing Google Apps takes a little bit of time.Pros:1. Good and stylish Design.2. smooth User InterFace3. Animations while calling are very descent.Last but not Least At this price This is the best I saw. I know it's so many complications but it's the best mobile at this price.Thanks.

title: budget king is samsung
body: Gifted this samsung m13 for my dad as his birthday giftas he prefers non chinese mobile which is samsung obviouslyand he kind of liked it because of samsung software which can be understandable to senior citizens as wellperformance 4/5camera 3/5battery 5/5 because of 6000mah

title: Average phone performance. The things said in specifications are not true.
body: There is slag in action at every time you touch the screen so you can feel that it has low quality processor, Touch control is average, camera is average. You will have only 2 benifits for this price (1) Big screen size (2) 64 GB storage.

title: Totally disappointed
body: Totally disappointed....After 8 monrhs2PROS:▪︎UI 3.0 is amazing. I like it a lot. It is better than Redmi, Moto, Nokia UI. (Subjective)▪︎Amazing battery life. I am getting more than 24hrs of usage after fully charged.CONS:▪︎Worst camera ever. True 48MP is all bulls**t. Low light pics are also worst.Front camera is also not good.▪︎Seriously??? No Slowmotion, Timelapse & other basic features in camera.▪︎It doesn't support Camera2Api which means I cannot download GCam.▪︎Worst Screen resolution. While everyone is giving Super Amoled display & Full HD display, what happened to you Samsung??▪︎90Hz refresh rate is just gimmick.▪︎8nm processor is also waste.▪︎While all others are giving Snapdragon processors, Samsung is stuck with its Exynos which is basically useless. Phone is hanging sometimes.▪︎Phone is a bit heavy and you'll have a hard time with its weight. It's like holding a powerbank.▪︎15Watt charger?? Samsung...you need to upgrade▪︎Wifi only supports 2.5GHz band and no 5.0 GHz bandFinally dont get decieved by True 48MP, 8nm processor, 90Hz refresh rate and other gimmicks. You will be disappointed. I am very much disappointed.

title: Got more than expected, at this price point.
body: Much better than expectations and that too a brand like Samsung at this cost. Rest time will tell. But so far everything is just perfect. Was not aware that it had face recognition and finger print read. Though the phone is not that sleek and on the bulkier side, but I think that makes it even more durable and solid. And Rs. 1000/- off on ICICI credit card was icing on cake. Forget other brands. Need not say anything else. Totally impressed. Bought another one in black for my daughter and she too is in awe, even though she was using an IPhone 6 S. And it has been mentioned on the box, that it is manufactured in India. Another plus point. One can go for it with eyes closed, if budget is around Rs. 10k approx. If one is ok and satisfied with the features offered. Happy shopping.
