title: LAGGING PHONE
body: It took me an hour to set up the phone as all the pre installed aps were updating one after the other, making the phone lag. After setup, I had to uninstall all the unnecessary app in order to ensure smooth running of the phone. Each time I try and install a low graphic game the phone starts lagging. The RAM is incapable to handle any low end gaming.  The phone is very bulky and the hands start to hurt if you're watching any video content. All in all, its not what I wanted it to be. Thumbs down!

title: Defective phone was sent
body: The seller has send the defective phone since many time whenever the call is made  the receiver couldn't hear. Incoming calls too can't be heard. Have contacted the Samsung customer service and they have made ready and have asked to come again. In a day the same problem arises and have to contact again the customer service . Really feeling horrible to have purchased online. Amazon as well as Samsung should ensure the quality and new phone to be delivered to the customer.

title: Display went dead in 1 Month after purchase
body: Bought on 9th March 2022 The display went dead on 23rd April and to my shock when I went to Samsung galaxy they said the phone was activated in 1st week of ja. by some one else before you bought from amazo.

title: A budget phone for normal users not for Gaming
body: A decent phone but not meant for heavy tasking..Screen is  decent..Samsung UI is working good.Sound is Decent ..Charging time is little bit Higher due to huge battery ( Approx 3 Hours for 0-100%)and charging wire is very small.Camera is good.Fingerprint Scanner is decent.Phone is little bit Heavy but its easy to handle.Phone is for  normal user not for gaming as sometime phone feels that exynos 850processor is not providing full power.

title: Everything works exactly as it should
body: Purchased the phone with an exchange offer provided by Amazon.  For the price that you pay this is a good stable device and does its job exactly as it should along with all the app features that comes along with the device.  Though Samsung loads too many bloatware in this phone some of which you won't be able to uninstall and that is frustrating.  If you are a fan of slim and light phones or intend to do heavy gaming then you should look elsewhere.

title: Disappointed with performance
body: After having used an Mi A2 for about 2 years, this phone was a step down. The prices are similar, and both phones are 4G/64GB.Found this samsung phone thicker, heavier and slower. UI is a bit sluggish. Clear chat on whatsapp is almost always slow (it was very quick on Mi A2). Googlepay PIN keypad does not render properly (some numbers are cropped). A2 has dual speakers with better sound, and a qualcomm processor.The pros of M12 are : display is nicer, the battery is better, and the camera quality is better (don't like the auto play of videos in camera app, haven't found a way to turn it off yet).If I were to choose between the two, would go with Mi A2 (lighter, sleeker, faster, better sound).

title: Meets my expectation of battery and strong performance
body: I was looking for a phone which had very good battery backup decent camera and strong performance that was my only condition I purchased M12 with 6 GB RAM and other than slow battery charging compared to M 50 and m51 I don't see that there is a huge difference obviously the quality of camera is not going to be as good as the higher range phone but I am happy with the LCD screen to conclude I am very happy with this phone as the battery backup is very good

title: Basic smartphone, no frills
body: This phone is a temporary arrangement for me, so my review will be based on that. I don't intend to use this phone for more than 6 months Max.It's a basic smartphone with a decent camera and a long lasting battery. I never liked the heavy samsung UI and the heaviness is felt more on a less powerful phone like this. It takes time to load apps and even basic things like contact search.It's heavy physically too, but I guess it's a trade off for a long lasting battery.Honestly, except for the battery there is pretty much nothing else that I can say good about the phone. For the price I guess it's ok, but the redmi I think does a better job in these prices points.Serves well for me, since this is temp phone and now I am more than anxious to change my phone due to the poor performance of this one.

title: It's a ok ok phone. Packaging is pretty bad from Samsung.
body: There are 3 main things which I was looking for.1. Camera2. Processor3. Looks of the phoneCamera quality is ok. But with wide angle the outer pictures are getting disturbed. It bends on top and bottom side. So not very happy with it. So my rating is.Processor is good. I had gone with 6gb ram so the processing is good. Want to see for few more days.Looks of the phone is ok. The SIM card holder qualify is very poor. I was worried it may break or get stuck while inserting inside the slot. It's more of plastic. I have used other phone's they have a very strong body. It looks more of plastic. Samsung should work on this. Not very impressive with the built.Doesn't give ear phone. Packaging from the company is really bad. Realme or Redmi or vivo covers are far better. In the name of made in India they shouldn't provide such bad quality.At the same price you may find a better phone with similar configuration.

title: One of the great Samsung 5G phone under 20K
body: If you ask me, the phone worth it if you are looking for 5G in Samsung brand. With a couple of great specks like Samsung's #FastestMonster equipped with the blazing fast Snapdragon 750G processor. It comes with a long lasting 5000 mAh battery and a versatile 48MP Quad camera for capturing stunning photos and videosCons: though Super AMOLED Infinity-U 6.6” display gives a true-to-life to mobile, indeterminately display clarity would not that great since it is just HD one. At last even I don’t like the in-screen security as it would not work as expected, that maybe I have not used to it since I am trying 1st time and I am blind person though.

title: Awesome phone
body: Wonderful phone from Samsung. I have purchased for my sister and she liked it very much and very excited after getting the phone. Specially time of delivery was very impressive, received it within 24 hrs after placing the order. Thanks to Amazon for delivering smiles.

title: Again Disappointed with Samsung phone quality
body: I purchased the product on the launch day, got product delivered yesterday. Phone looks decent but the camera quality is not worth a penny. It was mentioned 50 MP. but photo looks blurred both in rear camera and front camera. In case it's a manufacturing defect , I think company should come forward and revert. But one of worst camera phone so far.

title: Great phone pocket friendly
body: Got this phone for my dad who loves YouTube and watching news.Pros: Great battery life (need charging once in two days with moderate use), Supports fast charging, No Androidware thus very smooth UI and no lag, excellent 4 camera in rear and brilliant front facing camera, Runs on latest Android and processor is quite peppyCons: Slightly bigger in length and little heavy compared to others, Future Android upgrades not clear, Not 5G enabledTips: I got this phone under 9.5K so wait for the right deal.

title: Read this before you buy
body: I purchased this phone few days ago because it has got a good rating. But I forgot one universal line that - SAMSUNG PHONE ALWAYS HANG.The fingerprint is in the side button which is not that good and the biggest con of that is if you press the side button just to see the time and notification on lockscreen,. It will automatically unlock the phone. Again you have to click that to lock it and if by mistake you double click it, it will again get unlocked.

title: Economic but great to have
body: Pros1. Big display phone2. Very good battery life3. Not heating on usage4. Good sound/audio5. For my usage,  good processing speed and good RAMCons1. Touch screen is not very accurate- I am having to click on a button multiple times to get it clicked2. Like, MI, Samsung has Samsung apps that though useless to me constantly keep running and updating and occupy memory and cannot be deleted3. Brightness control is not good - max brightness and min brightness have less difference4. Camera is ok

title: Good in budget mobile
body: *Screen refresh rate is good.*Camera is not like premium but good in budget.Camera is decent, more * features are there.*Able to feel weight and after screen guard and back cover it feels so bulky.*Side Fingerprint sensor is not comfortable with back cover slot.*It was difficult to choose perfect back cover and screen guard for this mobile.*As in all other samsung, mobile getting heating up on more app usage.

title: Timeless Budget Warrior !
body: After usage of 6 months, I'm satisfied with the smartphone. In this budget, this is possibly one of the best offerings. In the world of Android,nowadays Samsung possibly has the best offerings in every price range.Camera is OK enough. At least OK for a 10k phone.Sound quality is loud and clear, with display of good quality. Ganes and consumption of multimedia is enjoyable.Interface is clean and multitasking is smooth. Charging is fast enough. Obviously, the best part is it's massive battery and power usage. With moderate use, it can easily go past 2 days and that is a big plus for people always on the go.In the 10-11k category, this is possibly the best I've used so far. This is a phone for ages to keep.Thanks to Amazon, delivery was in perfect condition.P.S. Before buying, even I was skeptical reading some of the negative reviews. I'm a common user, and my understanding is if you're expecting top of the line performance from a budget phone, then your expectations are to be blamed. Or most of the bad reviews are sponsored ones.If you want top of the line, you gotta spend top of the line.This phone gets the BASICS right, and that is what matters in the long run. And no phone in this category will offer a truly top class camera; even if they do,they will compromise in some other areas. Whereas, M12 with its 8nm efficient structure along with a Trusted Chip Set gets the job done in a smooth manner. Overall, if you want Smooth operations with Reliability, trust Samsung M12.

title: Awesome phone
body: Samsung Galaxy M12 features a 6.5-inch HD+ Infinity V display with 720x1600 pixel resolution. The smartphone display comes with a 90Hz refresh rate. Samsung Galaxy M12 is the only smartphone in this price range to come with this high refresh rate. Samsung Galaxy M12 comes with an adaptive refresh rate which means that the panel cannot be locked at a high refresh rate. The high refresh rate display functioned smoothly during scrolling through Facebook and Instagram. For some reason, the refresh rate on the Samsung Galaxy M12 is locked at 60Hz for the notification centre. Also, the 90Hz mode is turned off while using apps like YouTube. Despite the high refresh rate and HD+ resolution, the display on Samsung Galaxy M12 is not that sharp and vibrant. The brightness is also not great and you might face some struggle while using the smartphone under direct sunlight. The display is large enough for you to enjoy movies and also play games. The display also comes with an eye comfort shield which reduces the blue light from the screen and prevents eye strain. The display on the Samsung Galaxy M12 is decent but it is definitely not the selling point of the handset.

title: Battery, overall performance is really awesome.
body: Good buy within the price  range, this thing is powerfull, the one's looking for performance this is the product, 6 gb ram with 128gb to access with is worthy. The system has variety  of settings to choose from, this might get slow when google drive is being used for contacts and other things as it directly fetches data from drive but there are other settings you can play with and enjoy games at a very good speed.. And the charger is powerful.Recommendation for games: try games from ppsspp emulator.

title: Will not purchase anything for my self now from Amazon
body: first of all the delivery of the phone was late.Which timeline does Samsung is living in?No Magnetometer (Compass app not working)The phone seams useless to my Wife,as she needs compass on regular basis.We thought that it must be there in the phoneAs you guys do not show all the exect features of the phone.even auto brightness is not working properly.Not getting any massage for second sim.Now we are stuck with this phone.We can't even return it because of your policy.

title: BLOATWARE BY SAMSUNG
body: I bought Samsung to get less bloated OS but Samsung has gone shameless like it's peers MI and realme. OS is bloated and I hate the skin. I'm going to install a custom rom after a year.I bought it for my mom, she doesn't know how to protect her privacy and data and Samsung is exploiting it. Shame.I disabled these apps(in photo), I use micro g services instead of Google, but I can't disable some Samsung apps.

title: Battery, Camera and Screen
body: Awesome budget phone with all the features that is required for daily use like 6000 mah battery which last upto 1 day after internet serving, watching videos, listening music and lot more.Screen resolution and screen size is really well in this budget and you can't expect better than this within this budget.Processor is also good for normal and average use, its not made for playing heavy graphics game like PUBG, COD, Asphalt etc. You can go for it if you are looking for something with a decent spec and long lasting quality.I'm a samsung user, I am using samsung since last 9+ years and I can claim that samsung gives the best quality product amongst all the other brands except Apple.Camera perfomance is really well as per 48 mp. The only thing is its bit unstable in night time. You may require some extra light for taking pictures in night.

title: It's not even had 5ghz wifi connectivity.its a worse phone ever purchased.
body: Never go.for this phone. It will make u frustrated just after 1 day of use.No 5ghz wifiNot even good camera (no multiple features)Not good fingerprint sensorNot good speakerNot at all good micIn short total waste of money.After use of 6 months- very low range of wifi,Bluetooth and now it started to hang.Worst product ever to buy from samsung.

title: Very Nice

title: Just fine
body: Good--Battery runs for 2 normal days--Fingerprint sensor on power button is more convenient--Video experience is goodNot good--It is not detecting 5 GHz Wifi channel. I can't make use of my high speed internet--Fast charging is not really fast in charging. It takes 1.5 Hrs to fully charge--I checked performance using benchmark app, this is scoring half of realme 3 pro--Heavier than realme & redmi phones with similar battery power

title: Best Affordable Phone from Samsung till date!
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 It is best at this cost from a brand like samsung. Display resolution is HD but it's 90 Hz. Battery life is awesome lasts 2 days. Camera is disappointing though. There isn't any gcam available yet. No silicon case in box. One UI is the best UI I have ever used yet. Fast updates. 15 Watt charger included takes almost 2 hrs for full charge which lasts for almost 2 days

title: Totally Recommendes
body: I bought this smartphone for my mom where my only requirement is good battery and a decent camera. I must say it satisfies my requirements pretty well. The battery life is really great that my mom's usage is quite common like watching youtube and scrolling through whatsapp. The battery sustains for two days with her usage pattern and I'm happy with that. The bigger battery makes the smartphone bulky but thats worth compromising. Totally a decent camera, fantastic battery life and a 90hz screen feels smooth. I'd totally Recommend this if your necessity is pretty basic.

title: Really wrost product
body: Within 6 months Speaker of phone got Damaged and now getting the WROST SOUND, CRACKLING SOUND WHILE GETTING CALLS, PLAYING MUSIC, WATCHING VIDEOS.I SPOKE TO SAMSUNG SERVICE CENTER OVER THEIR OFFICIAL WHAT'S APP CHAT NUMBER ALSO SEND EMAIL TO SAMSUNG INDIA STILL THERE IS NO SOLUTIONAGENT DIDN'T RESOLVE CONCERNS AND UNABLE TO RAISE ESCALATIONS.TWO OF THE AGENTS FROM SAMSUNG GAVE ME WRONG REFERENCES NUMBER MIS GUIDED ME AND ENDED THE CHAT.

title: Only for normal peoples.
body: I prefer this phone only for normal people. In some times there will be small hang. This is not a Gaming phone. We can play candy crush etc. But this is not capaple to play pubg etc.

title: Battery performance improved after latest update
body: I took this mobile for the battery performance.. and it was one of best phone i ever seen.. last month it was taking upto 2 days to drain the battery... then after one update.. it became worst it is taking only 20 hrs to drain complete battery.. and during night time also it is taking around 25 % battery. before update it was taking hardly 1 % battery in night times..worst part of the software it is not even showing which app takes more battery..With the latest update the battery and phone performance got very good..Camera is improved a lot..auto brightness setting is still take lots of time to settle.. sometimes it does not works need to adjust manually..Overall best phone with price point..

title: Overall a very good phone at the price
body: The overall look of the phone is good.The features available at this pricing is excellentThe camera quailty is a bit disappointing specially the front camera.There are very few button option and many are missing which is available in the button menuLot of features are also missing in camera.Battery life is very very good listening to music watching movies and day long games .Overall a good phone at the given price rangeHappy to be a SAMSUNG mobile Fan

title: Not worth it
body: Simply you better to skip this phone I break my old screen so suddenly I need to buy I brought this because I get it in good price but after I receive I realized it's simple useless 🤣 my old 3gb ram phone (I brought in 2018) 100 times better than this it's easily struck most of time touch doesn't working screen just break because I sleep on it you can't play pubg in it no games you can't use much outside in summer or do work much it's easily shut down phone easily over heat many problems .. people who need phone for simple thing like calling watching YouTube better to buy this

title: Terrible connectivity and network both mobile data & hotspot & also UI not user-friendly
body: Having trouble with network connection for mobile data access & hotspot also.User interface also not user-friendly. Heavy to handle for prolonged usege.Call recorder toggle switch also not found during call screen buttons.Not even gestures available for emergency torch light on & off. Only available in notification switch panel.Connection issue faced while browsing, YouTube thumbnail not showing, Facebook buffering to play video & scrolling got struck repeatedly and even browser app update also could not complete even after several attempts in playstore.Battery backup performance was also not satisfied even when 6000MAH capacity configuration with 6GB RAM / 128GB STORAGE available.Very embarrassing experience with this new Samsung Galaxy M12 after 3 years smooth usage with my present device(redmi y2).

title: Review after agressive using for 2 days
body: To be honest i was totally skeptical whether i should buy this phone or not,  seeing so many negative comments, I took the risk and bought it..After using the phone aggressively for 2 days i must say as i read from the reviews that this phone Hangs on operation which is totally FALSE .Phone totally works fine. Having a refresh rate of 90Hz the phones doesn't show any delay, the UI is smooth battery is quite strong . Using aggressively at max only consumed 46% of battery in two days (discharged from 100% to 54%).The only thing that will disappoint you is its Camera Which works like a 6-8MP camera.Macro shots are not that detailed either.Front camera is just like having a 2-3 MP camera.Samsung should have uplifted camera quality when they mentioned it with 48MP camera.This phone will disappoint you in terms of camera quality.Rest the phone just works very well in terms of other configurations.

title: A good mobile
body: This is my second Samsung Android after ON7 Pro and third smart phone in 8 years. I like to continue with my existing device for a long time until it no longer supports essential apps like Banking, Cabs, Utilities etc. I'm not a photographer and hence camera quality doesn't matter to me and neither gaming. Smart phone for me is a device that satisfies my professional needs and household needs. This is a fine device, quite fast and lots of space to keep my essential apps. Touchscreen is good even after having installing a thick screen guard. I am using a thick transparent backcover with extra security at 4 corners and no problem in charging after that. Battery is great and for my kind of usage one full charge is good for 48 hours usage. My bluetooth headset works fine with this device. Hence I'm 100% satisfied and hope to continue it for atleast 4 years.

title: Battery drain on using internet whether wifi or mobile internet
body: I don't have any games on my phone and no sm app apart from twitter. My phone usage about 98 % comprises of reading my mails and attachments i.e. pdf, doc, xls files etc. and voice calls. Overall my phone usage is less since I work from home mostly from my laptops. But the battery drain is visible within just 3 months of use. The use of mobile internet is also low and I usually work with wifi but the power drain is significant while using internet. I have checked if any app is draining battery but didn't find anything. All this claim of 6000 mah is disappointing. I will probably take my phone to the service centre soon.

title: Smooth Experience with this phone
body: I ordered the phone for my uncle, he is very happy to get the 5G phone in a very good budget with all the features he needed to rollout his day to day activities. We do the migration from old phone to this new Samsung phone for him, everything seems smooth and working as per the expectations so far. Also, we got 2K additional discount through SBI card. It was a good deal and worth it.

title: Pathetic Product.
body: Samsung refused to replace screen citing physical damage. As the entire phone is already covered under warranty for any factory defects, there was no need to mention 6 month free screen replacement separately. Had I known this, I would have taken an Insurance. This is clearly a very bad customer experience from a well known brand like samsung. In my eyes, it has already tranished the high brand image for samsung I had. I feel deeply cheated.

title: Best batteryPretty good deal .Luv Samsung and Amazon for fast delivery and deals
body: This phone is the best in this price range with best battery and camera performance. I would have more pleased if it had an amoled display . Surely Samsung had the ability to imply an amoled screen but they didn't . They could have used Snap dragon 600 series chipset instead of the exynos. But still this is the best phone under this budget. Better that A21s of Samsung . It's the best 10k budget phone now. Don't get confused with f12 it's just same as M12.

title: Good phone in budget range with almost all necessary features
body: Good phone in budget range with almost all necessary features .It would have been a great experience if they would have given S secure support in M12 as well ,like M21. Due to core UI you will get basic version of Knox without secure folder and all.Camera quality is decent , good battery backup though the phone is little heavy ,Display also good except I can see some flickering effect while scrolling down webpages with 90hz refresh rate. I did not face any issues with processor or ram for the daily use. USB type c port supports OTG .Speaker is also ok , but it is not sterio.Network quality also good .Overall I am satisfied with the purchase .

title: Samsung cannot make good quality cheap phones!
body: I bought this phone along with the similar priced Xiaomi Note variant and the difference is absolutely noticeable.The fingerprint does not work, at all!The wifi calling feature of the phone is worse than the actual mobile network (which is pathetic in itself)!WhatsApp will not work, all throughout the day.I suggest ya'll go with the usual competitors and ignore Samsung in the cheaper range, altogether!

title: Good phone but disappointed with camera
body: Everything is good in this phone camera is okay in daylight means if your facing the source of light your photo will be good but at night the photos are poor and there is no other problem but I was disappointed because the company says true 48MP camera and it has quad camera setup but the photos are not up to mark the photos of my redmi 9 prime which has 13MP QUAD Camera setup are excellent far better than m12

title: Samsung's worst phone
body: This is by far the worst phone from Samsung. I upgraded from old Galaxy on7 pro to this one because it promised better OS, better screen refresh rate, better storage and better camera quality. But to my dismay, none of these is a wow factor in this phone except for battery life. The phone hangs every 5-10mins with only 2 apps running. The screen response rate is pathetic and camera quality below par, not sure what they mean by 48MP camera. Don't take this phone even if someone offers it to you for free. It's a headache more than a utility. I would urge Amazon to bring down such a pathetic product from their website because it will spoil their brand name as well.

title: 4 stars
body: Samsung M12, Generally speaking a standard phone. If you've used Redmi phones before, you might feel this one is not that great. Not that fast compared to redmi . Camera is ok to this price range.

title: Price Reduced, So Quality Reduced
body: Samsung boasting 48mp camera but really cheated may be due to price reduction..The 48mp camera quality is like 5 mp. Front camera 2mpIf you want to just have a Samsung for namesake it is OK.Battery backup boasted 6000 MAH. But like 3000 mah. 20 minutes photos+10 mins video - battery drained superbly from 92% to 65%.My old blackberry Q10, i thing 8mp rear camera-so so accurate and high quality pictures.Those who require good quality camera better look for other choices.

title: It's been month Amazon has not paid my refund.
body: I bought this mobile in second week of Jan, received on 18Jan. Noticed mobile has issues. Contacted CC they scheduled inspection which they rescheduled 3 times then last time inspection guy called and asked about the issue and said we can replace or refund. We called CC &raised return request . It's now a month we have received our refund and Amazon CC promise always they will help us return the mobile and get the refund. However from a month Amazon has kept my 10000. This is pinnacle of frustration. We have been calling CC to get out refund and all we get is false promises. This is really disheartening 😒. Amazon has lost trust of a customer. First they sent damaged mobile and now not giving us our money and taking their mobile back. Such shame

title: Poor performance  M13 4G 6GB RAM 128 Gb variant
body: I got this phone 6GB AM 128 GB 4G Variant, I didn't install any games or high end software. I used only intagram, it started hanging in the middle performance is very poor. Not good if you use your phone for more time.Maybe you consider gifting for elder people who use minimally.Camera is fine for the price range.Battery life is okayFingerprint reader works fine

title: Detailed review
body: Its a budget phone and I'm using it from this January, phone is bit bulky but its battery life makes it invincible. Look the name samsung is enough to describe its reliability. You will get good camera i just said good don't make any kind of expectation which can fullfill your camera desires. Good screen , huge storage (go for 128Gigs ) and RAM is also helps you to do multi tasking. I never played any game on my phone but it will help you to feed your hunger for gaming. For me thums up for it. You can get M12 if you are considering my review helpful.

title: Battery is the key
body: I bought this device for my mother, and she loved it. It’s great device considering the price at it was available for me.Pros:1. Great battery life.2. Decent display (90Hz is a plus point)3. Decent processor for general purpose.Cons:1. Cameras are not that great.2. Only 720p display. (1080p display could be the best option)3. I hate samsung security updates because they install lot of junks apps with update.Note: I don’t prefer this device for gaming. The processor in this one is not a gaming one.  Also, the device may face heating issues even if playing small size games.

title: Not good model from Samsung
body: Unnecessary apps automatically download on their own. We can't control them. Any number of times you uninstall them, again, they will download and install without our role. There are no settings in phone to control them. Very nuisance.Screenshot is not working.  Overall working and performance is not up to mark even for this price level. Some other model from Samsung or other brands or honor are best alternatives.

title: Value for money
body: The features offered by this device at the price range are fabulous. There is no lag during the usage. The display is good for watching youtube, netflix etc. The camera is decent w.r.t. the price at which you get it. For gaming, it is optimized for no lag.Perfect optimized performance at this price range. Call quality and speakers are good enough.

title: Never buy. Samsung has disappointed. Amazon must have check on spurious products
body: I had bought m21 and m01 before. m01 is better in performance than this one (m12).Either the product is substandard from samsung or from STPL seller.Camera quality not as per specs. Touch is not responsive. phone lagging.This time both amazon, samsung and stpl have disappointed me. Feel like cheated by this spurious product.No return policy either. even replacement has been made cumbersome. Beware now to buy online products from amazon. Recently I have been having very bad experiences.

title: Great budget smartphone from Samsung
body: Great budget smartphone from Samsung.Got a bit worried after reading all the negative reviews about the phone's display and camera but they didn't fail me or Samsung. Great battery life and display looks awesome. Camera is normal; neither extremely extraordinary nor disappointing. Overall camera is satisfactory at this price. RAM and Processor give very smooth performance. Don't get worry about the bullshit negative reviews (by people who want gold at the price of brass).  Go for it.

title: Best budget phone at this Price
body: Writing this after 4 months if heavy usagePros:-1. Very very big battery life. This battery is so big that you can easily use it for 2days with moderate use.2. Very beautiful screen even though it is LCD. Samsung has not used any cheap screen. You can enjoy your Movies and Web-Series.3. Very good camera ultra wide mode is just so beautiful you don't need panaroma mode in this. Selfie camera is just awesome .4. You even get headphone jack.5. The screen is pretty big best for online classes and binge watching.6. I have played games like BGMI, CODM, NFS with ease.My final opinion is that you should buy this phone if you want to do online classes, play games, or if you want a phone with big battery or if you are a binge watcher. You can download almost 70 movies with ease.

title: Too much heavy and performance is not as expected.
body: Good budget phone but not for youngers suitable to low average user.As a multitasking purpose please dont buy.Problem in wifi speed .When wifi and bluetooth both are running the wifi internet speed is slowdown.Screen resolution and quality is really like MI cheap phone not like samsung .This is my 5th samsung smartphone and this time i am really disappointed.

title: Average phone considering price range
body: Average phone considering price range.1. Camera quality: average, no slow motion or time lapse feature available, no zoom when using 48mp. Front camera, below average. Sometimes I take a photo that doesn't get stored, quite annoying.2. Weight: quite heavy, you feel the difference when you take some other phone in your hand.3. screen type: lcd not led or amoled4. Batter life: looks good with normal usage.5. Phone body: back panel looks like of plastic, it would have been better if matelic had been used.6: user interface: sometimes very hard to do something, like taking a screenshot. Could have been given some better option to do that. Also, I use night model, where it gets better into grayscale in night, I can't customize some options like what apps and what type of do not disturb I want, also if had turn it off in some urgent cases I have to go back into settings and then disable it. Not an easy option provided.Face recognition: not fast and accurate.

title: Decent performance. Faulty battery. Poor touchscreen
body: Product is below average performance. Battery is horrible. Takes 5 hours to charge from zero to 100This is unacceptable considering its a a new phone. Seems like used parts have been put. Amazon is sending old phones now apparently as this isn't the performance of a new phone out of the boxEdit- have got a replacement and this works fine, much better in all aspects of performance

title: Wonder phone one must possess for multiple usages.
body: Wonderful product. Power packed. Very handy. Easy to operate. Light weight. Value for mon ey. Excellent phone I have ever come across. Powerful battery lasting very long between recharges. I used it for whole day still battery dropped very little. Amazing. No heating  up of battery even after long continuous usage. Very sleek and thin design. Large RAM  and ROM. Delivery by Amazon was on time. Overall five stars without any hesitation.

title: Jailbroken mobile was sent.
body: while installing certain software form goole play store, it says mobile is jail broken. if possible please ask your customer care to contact me. even if not possible, please dont send such devices to customers. please dont buy samsung.

title: Not a great product
body: The phone fails to match up the performance with my previous phone which I bought 3 years before unfortunately the same maker had started focusing on different segments of smartphone. The most honest let down of this phone is the response  when you click on screen, Time taken to open a app, movement between pages and many more latency issues which I can connect to processor of this phone. I had bought 6 gb ram model still the performance is not upto basic expectations from this segment phone. NOT A GREAT CHOICE.. REGRET EACH TIME FOR SELECTING THIS MODEL WHENEVER I USE.

title: Dabba phone not even supports 5g
body: Samsung is hiding the details and selling this dabba phone. Not a clever move. It's not 5G phone and no where it is mentioned, battery life they claim It's 6000mah but I don't see it as great. Camera quality is not upto the mark. Phone is very much heavier. I am surprised to see that it doesn't have a 5g even 2022 where now we have all the is providing 5g support and you can't even connect to 5g wifi. I am very much disappointed  by this phone and it doesn't have a resale value as well. Stay away from it. I do not recommend this phone. Rather I would suggest you to go for reminders note 10 pro

title: Ok product
body: Overall 3star.. very bulky and a slightly heavier phone. Could work on the bulk and weight of the phone. After a few updates the phone slows down. Samsung needs to work on the performance of the phone. I have been using the phone for 2 months now (6gb ram 128gm rom) and I feel that the performance has slowed in just 2 months. At times there is lag and the phone screen stops responding completely. The pages get stuck and the screen touch also gets weird.Problem areas to sum up1) heavy 2) bulky 3) touch screen is not that great4) slowness of the phoneGood things1) battery life (as of now) 2) camera 3) finger print reader 4) ok phone for basic usage

title: Worthy Mid Budget Phone
body: Pros:1. Looks elegant2. Camera is good3. Budget Friendly4. Battery is really good, stands for days with minimal usageCons:1. Bulky and really heavy for smaller hands2. Bit of heating issues when playing High end games3. Too many bloatwares. I wouldn't expect a Android One experience. But this is flooded with so many preinstalled softwares . but some of them has uninstall option.

title: Value for money product
body: Samsung Galaxy M12 can be a good choice for customers who are looking for a Samsung smartphone under Rs 15,000. The smartphone offers a quad-rear camera, HD+ display and is backed by a 6000mAh battery which can easily last for two days. Camera quality is real good.  Fingerprint scanner is fast and responsive sound quality is betterHowever the phone is on the heavier side ,Does not comes with the clear case and headphones and you might want to add a good screen guard and case .Thank you

title: Great option for general long term use
body: A great device (on the heavy side) for general usage.Ordered for mom who uses WhatsApp, Facebook, YouTube. Battery lasts for at least 2 days easily.The camera quality is good enough for this price range and good to see the latest Android 11 onboard. 4 years of updates makes it worth the investment for long term usage.

title: Samsung Galaxy M12 is a Grand mobile phone
body: Purchased Samsung Galaxy M12 mobile phone to replace an under preforming mobile. Have been using this phone for the last one month.It is lovely in appearance. Has decent storage capacity, quick data retrieval capability, good Battery life. Camera performance is commendable.I recommend Samsung Galaxy M12 mobile phone for those who are looking for a good mobile phone with decent performance.

title: Total Waste of money
body: Product is not working properly got replaced but the issue is still presist and will not be rwolved in near future.I do not that how may buyer are receiving this issue bit I am getting that issue.In phonepe when I enter upi pin that keyboard number are cutting in half size.That is the issue and heating so on..Sound tones are changing automatically.Loud speaker is not working on call. No voice come out in laud speaker on call..:(

title: Worth it.
body: Its a good product.Battery: it last for an entire day. in my case it last for around 36 hrs.Camera: Main camera of 48 pm is really good.Fingerprint: works like a charm.It's a very good budget phone and best thing is the design. It's same as other samsumg phone. Phone looks elegant.

title: I think Best ever samsung phone in lower Budget range..Too Good than Xiaomi.
body: Excellent Battery life, for normal use upto 3 days..Camera Quality is too good, finger print works very fast...No preintalled unwanted apps... Also have option to disable system apps...So u can fully utilise ur RAM...With single speaker Voice Quality is too good... Display quality is also best..Body structure - feels strong and tough.Charging time - 2 hr 40 min approx.I got this in ₹ 10.5k.As compared to Xiaomi's phone...If you are planning for long term use.. then this phone is best for you..... with rough and tough uses.I think for normal user just go for it....👍👍👍👍👍👍👌

title: Latest Android 11 device, as expected in all respects.
body: Good quality Samsung phone for general use (6gb ram/128gb). Android 11 out of the box, which is important for security and software compliance/updates for a londer time. Good camera. Excellent battery life (2.5- 3 days with non gaming, sparse content viewing). Better than cheap chinese wannabes in quality and comes with Samsung reliability amd latest Android 11, even though it may be nominally behind in a specification or two..

title: Not expected from Samsung
body: The phone is excellent. The call quality is good too. Everything is satisfactory or much better than expected.The major glitch, however, is non-operational USB tethering. It simply doesn’t work.So if you want a phone that needs to be taken to the service station the minute you switch it on, if you cannot live with a faulty phone or if you must have USB tethering, keep away from this Samsung.

title: At this price range, it is very good but the features get compromised at some places.
body: I expected a better camera UI from Samsung. You don't get any option for slow motion or hyperlapse. It is a very ordinary camera UI. The phone is quit thick and heavy than other phones. It may cause a hindrance if you are used to with light phones. I have to say that the battery life is really massive! With normal usage you can easily operate it for 2 days. The 90Hz refresh rate of this phone is very captivating. At this range, it is really a good deal but make sure you put a case and a screen guard in it 'cause it doesn't have any gorilla glass protection.

title: Service center is saying it is open piece
body: This is really irritating that I ordered this phone as brand new and within few months now the power button is not working. When I took out to the service center they r saying it is open piece and blaminge that I have opened it. They need money to replace the cap inside the button. Never expected this from Amazon to give me a used piece or Samsung service center is playing a game for money.

title: Pathetic product
body: Undoubtedly this has been the worst mobile phone of my life till now. Writing this review after 2 years of purchase. The processor used in m21 handsets is cheap and has heating issues. Then phone started switching off after 1year and few months. Motherboard needs to be replaced. I mean that is simply fooling people. Hand them a handset of 17k and within a year ask them to replace the motherboard worth 7k. So, please don't buy any phone having the same processor. Check news articles on the same. Samsung m series is a failure.

title: Slower than 2GB RAM mobile phone.. Don't buy
body: Too slow, touch response is very slow. Camera is poor.. Ram plus is a scam.... Hangman lost to M13..... Not worth 10k...... Tecno, Realme, Mi are better options....... Don't fall for brand and buy Samsung........

title: Good mid-budget phone for elderly people
body: I had bought this phone for my father-in-law. He is pretty satisfied with the performance. Battery life is amazing for him (he does not use phone much, apart from occasional calling and receiving calls, and checking whatsapp twice daily), and he is getting 3-3.5 days of battery-life after one full charge.We know that we can get better phones from other brands in this range, but for elderly, the ease of use of Samsung OneUI is really a tipping factor for deciding on this phone.

title: OK PHONE BUT CAMERA QUALITY IS WASTE
body: Pros:1. Perfect battery life...lasts you till 1.5 day with heavy usage.2. 90Hz display is smooth.3. The software is excellent...everything just flows..from school through settings to multi-tasking is smooth 👌Cons:1. This phone is very heavy and thiccc...2. Phone lags while doing heavy usage.3. Camera is just below average 🙄 at 11,000....4. Phone heats up very quickly.5. Display quality is just OK because of HD+....better to buy Redmi 9 Power OR POCO M3Verdict: It is better to buy REDMI 9 POWER IF YOU WANT AN 1. BEST BATTERY2. FULL HD+ DISPLAY3. BEST CAMERA WITH 48MP4. FAST CHARGER IN-THE BOX...22W FAST CHARGER5. 4GB+64GB  -OR-POCO M31. BEST BATTERY2. FULL HD+ DISPLAY3. BEST CAMERA WITH 48MP4. FAST CHARGER IN-THE BOX...22W FAST CHARGER5. AND WITH 6GB RAM 😱+ 64GB

title: A good option to consider in this price range
body: Everything about this phone is good but there are some problems also like processor is bit slow so you will see a very small lag b/w input and output. Too much heavy and width is also too much and it definitely don't looks like 2021 model phone bcz of weight and width of phn specially when technology has so advanced that there are too slim and light weight phns available in the market; it took like phn is from 2015 something. Screen's performance is definitely not upto the mark.I'm a student and I  generally use laptop for much of my work and uses mobile very little, so can't give that much detailed review about everything but yeah I can say one thing that  if you are a student than it will definitely serve the purpose for which you will buy it.

title: Awesome phone, very long battery life, great feel
body: I am writing this review after 3 days of usage. I have upgraded to this phone from a Redmi 5A. Looks and feel are simply amazing. The usage experience is also superb. The battery life seems to be v v long, when compared to my last phone. Overall, I am very happy and satisfied with this purchase. Seems like a real upgrade from my old Redmi 5A... and, to top it all, Amazon gave me an exchange offer worth Rs. 2500 on my 3 year old Redmi 5A... I have nothing to complain.Last but not the least, the delivery experience was also superb... delivered within 2 days !!! And the delivery guy was also very helpful and patient as it took more than half an hour to reset my old phone before handing it over to him.Overall a 5 star experience... However, I would have loved to give a 6-star for battery life as well as the delivery experience.

title: Display issue with in 10 days of purchase
body: Had a display issue and screen lag immediately within the first week, but the return window expired, can't get a replacement told amazon customer care, forced to take it to the Samsung Service centre they got the phone and asked me to wait a minimum of 20 days or more to get the display fixed to cover it under warranty. no options.  even a new release phone doesn't have a spare for India's leading market share mobile company.

title: phone not working
body: i bought this phone from amazon with in 6 months of my purchase , one day it just got heated up in my hand and went blank i went to samsung auth repairs and i was told that its mother board has corrupted and needs to get changed but it is not covered in warranty then what the warrenty is for they asked 9000 to repair it so i have no choice but leave it that way lost 110000 rs will never buy samsung product ever

title: Good
body: My usage is mostly emails n what's app and a few apps sometimes. Have been using it for over 4months. Is a good product. Happy with the battery life till now. Camera is ok types. Good product in this price range.

title: Best budget phone
body: This model has similar features as other Samsung mobiles. The camera quality is not that great but I don't mind I don't click much pictures anyway, it's not the best camera but it's not that bad. In this price range, I think this is the best deal I've got 6GB RAM, 128 internal memory, expandable up to 1TB with 6000mAH battery and I must say battery life is amazing.Since I trust the brand I always go for Samsung.

title: Amazing battery backup. Last 2 days
body: Amazing blue colour,If you need battery backup phone and have extream use of phone stock market trader like me, go for it without second thought. Superb battery. 100% would last 1.5 or 2 days.Processor is not good enough to handle game. So it's not gaming phone.Screen refresh rate is quite good.I returned my third class POCO F1 in 8k by cashify and bought this one. I got good deal.Camera quality is not good enough.. you need to on 48mp always.

title: Good in this budget, but things could be improved
body: Although its a good budget/entry level mobile phone from Samsung, but build quality could be improved, you can also get full HD resolution in other brands in this price range, but this comes with 720 resolution only.If you want to use only youtube, whatsapp and basic smartphone function, then its a good phone.

title: Awesome phone
body: According to me this phone worth for money, each and every money worth for it. It's been 10 days I'm using this phone.. really impressed me a lot. It's camera quality is amazing, but remember it only works properly in well enlightened region. It doesn't take such good quality images in dark beacuse night mode is not present. It doesn't support slow motion. But on an average we can give 4/5 rating to camera. Coming to performance, it lottery so good. You can experience some lag of about 0.5 second in between your work. But it doesn't affect so much.  It has so good refresh rate, which make it looking smooth while scrolling. But display is not so good. According to me I can give only 3/5 rating to display. Not so good and not so bad, it can be in between it. Eye comfort shield in the display settings is really so bad, worst !!! Dark mode in the mobile is quite amazing.. you can experience the darkness level similar to Amoled display. Fingerprint sensor is really so fast. Audio is not so nice and loud as expected. But can be heard if you get used to it, as you use it in daily life. And apperance, looking is really awesome. Even when the weight of mobile is 221 gm, it doesn't make it so much heavy.. you can easily use it.I really finds it really awesome, this phone is good option to buy in low price.. I don't think any phone will be better than this at this price.

title: Average mobile
body: After using this mobile for 2 months I would say its an ordinary mobile for adults who are average users.As i said its an average mobile, good call clarity and user interface.Overall mobile is quite slow (you wont feel like its 4G RAM) even the contact search will take few seconds.Camera is below average 48 mega pixel is not upto the mark (I have used 48 mega pixek redmi note 7 pro) video clarity is very bad, selfie camera is the worst.Macro lens is not clear.Irrespective of the apps you use it will be slow. I don't play games but for sure its not suitable for playing heavy games.Battery is good will come for more than 2.5 days with normal usage. Best for elders.Display is okay.Side mounted finger print sensor is cool.Price is quite high with the above drawbacks.

title: Solid Battery Backup
body: I was looking for solid battery backup phone.. and I found one. M12 is awesome in battery backup,  display is great. Finger print sensor is flawless..Overall a good second phone for my needs..This is going to be a great,Samsung budget phone..I had one incident too , I slipped the phone in a bucket full of water,  I took it out immediately and its working fine...

title: Good product but laden with bloatware
body: In this price range it is a good buy. However, not only this but Samsung in general have a bloatware issue. The phone won't work unless you sign in to all the unnecessary bloatware apps built in the OS skin.. apparently the company knows much more details about its consumers than necessary, and this can pose serious privacy issues for some.

title: Battery good, price is good.
body: The honest review could have been 2.5* considering, performance & camera quality, yet I'm giving it 5* because : when i was about to buy this phone i was on a budget and this was the best option for me, a 6/128 model of a top brand at 13500RS was a good deal and my top priority always was battery back and this amused me with its battery back up. If you are looking for a phone with strong battery back up with limited budget? Go for it... Otherwise you'll disappointed.

title: Was not expecting this.....
body: What would you expect witha battery of the size 5000, that it should be great. Well it okay not that great.I think due to the size of the battery the phone feels quite heavy.Camera: let me say this bluntly that the camera is not great it okiesh time. Didn't expect this from the Samsung company.I know the prize is less but didn't expect the camera to be that bad.If you are going to buy it for battery performance then you may go for it.

title: Samsung's trust and Amazon's support is the only reason I bought this product
body: First, Samsung's reliability and second, I ordered this product by combining them with so much emotion that even if I don't want to understand, then I will return it because I will definitely be heard here and when I ordered it, I understood that I have got a very good product and I am very satisfied with it, I gifted it to my brother, he used it regularly, there is no problem of any kind, you guys must also take it

title: Damage product reshived
body: Damage product reshived hua hai or koi help nahi ki ja rahi haiअमेजॉन से प्रोडक्ट मंगाया था यह अभी तक 20 का कोई सर्विस नहीं हुआ है कोई नहीं पिकअप भी नहीं आर्डर पेंडिंग में और जो अमाउंट थी वह भी कट गया है 20 दिन हो चुके हैं पूरे

title: Incorrect information- Blocked for foreign sim cards.
body: The product detail mentions unlocked for all carriers but I cannot put a foreign sim card in this phone. It means that when I travel abroad I cannot use the local Sim card but need to use an Indian sim card and pay for roaming. It is an error in the description and not very happy about it.

title: Outstanding
body: Great product for the money. Thankfully it's not Chinese and there's peace of mind when using banking apps or other apps which warrants security of non Chinese servers. The camera to screen everything is as good it can get for the money and software is way above what the Chinese offers.

title: Waste of money. Not expecting from Samsung
body: Dear all. I am writing this review very honestly, may other user get benefitted from this.I used this for 3 weeks and I would say it is clearly waste of your hard earn money .Pro.  Only batteryCons. 1.Heavy  and bulky2. Not adjustable in single hand for selfie4. Camera front. Worst quality all time grainy pic, no beautification5. Back camera also produce worst quality6. Processor is not much for heavy user7. Many time screen lag and hangDear it would be batter you purchase resume, dalne or opportunity in this price segment.If you use zoom app then go for snapdragon process over 700 it will be you option of virtual background in mobile . Media tek processor will not do much.I wnna to back this phone but window close by amazon and I purchased it's glass and guard and covers. So no option left. Pl don't buy this phone. Samsung create waste product in camera  In. This phone.

title: Only 2.4ghz band wifi is supported.
body: Except a single band Wifi rest all is fine. I see the product description doesn't say much about its wifi band support. It should have said that it supports only 2.4ghz band.I have no complaints about the others stuffs except that samsung should not bloat the software bundle with so many non essential packages that I can't uninstall.

title: Worst mobile
body: The samsung and Amazon both fooled people.This is the first time I have tried to return a mobile and had worst experience with Amazon.Key Issues with mobile: Quickly device getting hot. Very much irritated during calls Battery drainage quicklyWorst Amazon support When I reached the CS support, they asked me to wait for a technical agent visit.  But the assigned technical agent left Amazon for more than year and I ended up co-ordinating with  CS support and that person.Again the next person avoided a personal visit and put me on a Minspect app and verified for few min. (Worst app at all and they promised for a personal visit but ended up on-call check)Again after a new call to the support team, they have agreed for a refund and asked me to update my pan card. But Again a new CS person refused that policy 🙄 🤔I don't know whether the intention of CS support is yo solve customer query or to time pass with us to feel irritated

title: 50-50 happy
body: Maine ye cell 17 ko order diya aur 19 ko mujhe recive hua. 3days use karne ke baad mera review-Phone ka Camera aur battery super hai, screen size bhi pocket friendly hai, battery backups almost 2days.Mujhe isme kuch basic kamiyan lagi jo is prise range me nahi hona chahiye, jaise aap net ka speed screen me nahi dekh sakte kyunki setting me option hi nahi hai, isme net bhi slow chal raha hai. Speed show nahi hone se pata hi nahi chalta ki problem cell me hai ya sim network me. Mere likhane cell me idea 4g ka speed achha tha leki. Isme nahi hai. Overall mujhe bahut jyada khushi nahi hui is cell se, jabki maine Samsung ka naam dekh kar m12 purchase kiya. Please Samsung dhyan de.

title: Except for Battery Samsung M12 not worth its price
body: Samsung M12 is not worth it's price due to various shortcomings faced by me. (1) FINGER PRINT SCANNER DOESN'T WORK PROPERLY Position of FP scanner on right side (unlike backside of phone in Samsung A21s & other models) fails FP Scanning. And if mobile has a backcover if the one recommended by Amazon at order stage, then FP scanner will fail you. (2) FACE RECOGNITION ALSO DOESN'T WORK Most of the time Samsung M12 doesn't recognize my face. (Looks it doesn't like my face with which no problem on Samsung A21s). (3) CONTACT PHOTO IN RECENT CALLS FEATURE REMOVED Recent calls appear without Contact Photo. With Recent Call feature in other models it was easier to search & Call numbers from Recent Calls List. (4) STORAGE 4.94 GB of Internal Storage & 7.13 GB of SD Card being shown as Used by OTHER details of which no where. No way available to scan this storage usage & remove unnecessary OTHER consuming Internal & SD Card Storage. (5) NOTIFICATIONS NOT APPEARING ON LOCK SCREEN Despite trying my best Notifications from various apps do not appear on Lock Screen. All settings, including of Lock Screen tried without any success. Think before finalizing Samsung M12.

title: Above average phone
body: Phone proformance is above average u can play normal graphic game without a glitch. The drawback of the phone is its too heavy and its display is not eye friendly you can't use the ph for hours ur eyes will pain. Front camera is poor at night time and rear camera is above good so if your budget is low as say 14K then go for it otherwise increase budget and buy other samsung phone. I will also resell it soon.

title: Good Budget phone if not best
body: ProsExcellent Display for the price even if it is LCD (Samsung Expertise)Face ID with Fingerprint sensorOne UI is nice, smooth and feels modernUSB-C chargerLong Battery LifeConsPhone weights too high (more than 200 g)Samsung bloatwares are present and makes continued attemps to trick you for installation.Camera is fairly average, should have been little improved.No fast charging supportOverall good budget buy if you are looking for non Chinese budget smartphone.

title: Mediocre phone
body: It serves the basic purpose but advance features are lacking. Camera quality is too low and not as per given specifications of 48MP. Pixels spread up when you zoom in. Storage space is so low that you'll need atleast 64GB memory card. I'll suggest wait and gather money and have better smartphone than this.

title: WORST BUY FROM AMAZON
body: Bought SAMSUNG M12 after a lot of research from Amazon. Worst Experience I have after using 2 weeks. The phone is getting unresponsive and the buttons are not working. Contacted Amazon and Samsung Service Center. Samsung service center formatted my phone and I lost all my contents. I repeatedly told this may be a hardware problem but still they removed all my data and my phone is still in the same condition. Doesn't deserve this from Amazon and Samsung. I don't know what to do next.

title: Great budget phone 📱👌
body: In an affordable range this is a good phone to purchase. Loved the way it performes with its special features like 90hz display speed 6000mh battery and decent camera quality. If someone compares it with high budget phones and criticize then for them better to go expensive. Overall it's a great budget phone 📱..

title: Phone screen not working properly
body: I have received a beautiful phone but with screen hang problem. I have even used the 7 days replacement policy but the technician suggested me to go to service centre and update the phone but not replace the phone as they means supplier will send you old or used phone. I went to authorised service centre and upgraded the software but in vain.So never trust the technician not will buy a phone or electronic items from Amazon.

title: Samsung No way
body: Very very poor customer service though my handset was under warranty screen cracked by itself within 4 months.But no way my screen was replaced. Asking for 40% cost of the handsetNot worth as Samsung screen is very delicate.

title: overall normal phone
body: I didn't want to write a review because it was ot of stock for a long time and I thought this phone will never be back again. But as now they're giving huge offer I thought I should share my experience. This phone is a plan to capture people seeking "good" phone in low budget. Don't be mislead by the ads or offers.Display- you were using amoled display this display will be frustrating. But it is actually good kind of IPS Display. At daytime outside it is hard to use without full brightness.Battery- Not so fast charging. It takes 4 and half hours to charge fully. but Battery initially changes in 10 minutes upto 25% then slows down charging speed and battery life is awesome. you can go 3 days with full charge And morning to afternoon with 25%.processor- slow processor. forget games it is too slow.camera- front camera is junk, hazy. But rear camera is good. with no auto focus.no heating issue.overall good phone for those who doesn't use phone too much, needs for normal calls, whatsapp, payment etc. can buy it.

title: Phone is good for mid level range
body: Overall phone is ok. I have 6GB and 128 GB variant.Some advantages are there.1. In this Price getting good phone.2. Till now no heat or not hang.3. Till now Battery backup is good.4.  Video quality is also good.5. Good processor.Some drawback is there.1. Data cable is so small.2.  When charging no notification light is showing. When charge is full you have to check manually.3. Camera is not to the up yo mark like true 48MP.4. No notification light is there for missed call or anything.5. No Return policy is there.

title: Screenshot
body: Cannot get screenshot. Pressing the two keys does not help. Internet says that I can activate the side of palm movement but which option is not shown in Settings- Advance feature. Lacked pre installed Bluetooth and some other features which is available in a Xiaomi phone. But main issue is the screenshot

title: Big name & Feature but not worth to Buy
body: I brought initially and that's mistake made,Pros - Good Display & Memory and even body built-upCons -Very Poor Camera , did not expect thatPhone getting heated while charging and UsePoor performance in spite of huge RAM and  projected  high end CPUI Also brought M02s , which was quite good and no issues at all but this one is highly disappointmentchecking if replace or return possible.

title: Alright smartphone
body: Have used this for 3-4 month's. Camera is very poor. Also this phone response is slow when you open multiple apps. Sound is okay but not like some other phones out there who provide better sound quality. Even though it is Samsung Mobile which is a big brand name but in M12 they have not done a good job as I had expected.

title: Not worth the money.
body: Been using this device as a secondary phone for my office purpose. Camera is not good, comes with bloatware every time there is an security update the bloatware apps are reinstalled again, have to delete them again and again.Performance is disappointing, the phone is slow.Display is Ok but there is a noticeable light leak from below panel visible on screen.Device is very heavy, thick and long in length making it hard to use with single hand.I am using it as secondary device, I only use for office apps like MS Teams, Outlook with office admin portal app which gives my company complete root access to device so I am using it only for office communication purpose and I am glad it’s not my primary device.Save your money go for other device not this one. I would not even recommend this to gift to elderly as this is heavy thick and slow phone.

title: It's very Worthy with lovely battery backup
body: It's very worthy within a good range. It's Battery backup is good, camera quality is also good. finger print sensor is good but face lock sensor does not work properly all time. Overall it's a very good product from Samsung India within a very good price range.

title: Don't fall for 90Hz on Budget
body: This phone does it job, but don't fall for 90Hz,It's gimmick, higher refreshing screen are only good if phone works smooth. This Amazon app don't even work properly, while scrolling these apps stutter,And junk! It automatically downloads unnecessary apps and makes phone even slower.Please go by other smart phone in this range.And if you are reading this review in 2021, please never consider phones below 20k for this brand. Go but mi, moto, realme, OPPO, vivo, you will get what you want.

title: Worst phone ever used
body: It's the worst phone I have ever seen. The build quality is really poor. And speakers of the would will give you a night mare. We can't hear the phone even if it's in your pockets . Speakers are toooo low. I would definitely not recommen this phone. Instead opt for mi or anyother brand where you would get tons of features at this price. I feel regret buying this phone.

title: Worst phone don't throw your money
body: Very heavy phone. Peculiar problem of Samsung phone always in hung state .if you want to use in outdoor in day time you can't see anything bon screen.  For screen shot you need to put an extra floating menu on screen which is very irritating. No compass app you can run on phone as it lacks the sensors. Friends don't buy it, Chinese phones are far far better than this. I also purchased it just to avoid Chinese phone and now I repaint it. Since sep 21 I am using it and this is worst phone I have ever had.

title: Good one at this price
body: Samsung m12 gives smooth performance. Its 48 mp camera is good but the quality of image it captures is low quality.It has a long battery of 6000 mah. While charging phones heats up. But within a few minutes,it cools down.Overall it is a good phone in 11,000/-Update: 6 may 2021Now its one and half month is over and it has started to heat up  unecessary during charging.🙄Update : 4th July 2021The phone is not taking charging instead it is draining the battery. I does not expected this type of issue with #samsung.

title: Feasted by Amazon and he's customer service
body: Amazon se pareshan ho chuka hu 16 January 22 se lekar ab tak (25/01/22) mere return kiye hue product ka amount refunded nhi kiya hai.  10 baar customer service ko call kiya wo sirf aur sirf date age badhaye ja rhe hai.  aur 25th jan ko bolte hai refund amount 2th feb ka return hoga.  pareshan ho chuka hu yaar inse aur phone itna faltu ke (camera quality bekar upar se over heating, sim kar dalne pe net work he nhi aa rha tha.

title: Brick! Not worthy
body: I just bought a brick!The phone is too heavy as brickSlow as snail.Camera quality is worstInterface seems oldPrice : avg.Amazon return policy won't allow you to return that is biggest disadvantage.I insist potential buyers to avoid going for such tempting offers on this device n go for MI /Realme for way better features n feel in this price segment.

title: Overall the best smartphone under 10k
body: I know people might say that this smartphone isn't good enough or something but under 10k it is the best smartphone Exynos 850 is much better than unisoc or Helio g80 which comes in redmi or realme under 10k.. battery is stable and long lasting, UI is clean it does not have that much bloatwares as it's a core version of one UI.. Camera quality is average neither good nor bad(have included some samples), so if you want a smartphone and your budget is 10-11k then go for this one, even gaming performance is better than Redmi 10 Prime and Note 10T.

title: Best budget for this phone.

Fastest Fingerprint4. But camera quality is low according to price5. Mostly you buyexpensive phone purchase samsung company6. Little bit hang in BGMI

title: New to exynos chipset..but experience is fantastic
body: Iam not a gaming user...so first of all this review is only for normal users...1.Very importantly  the battery stands so strong from its competitors.2.Display though lcd HD+, is so good from all viewing angles.3. I just love the side mounted fingerprint and power button but may be difficult  for some new smartphone users4.camera though  not great, at this price point it stands stronger than  its competitors with all four cameras5.colour variants of phone can be even more optional for users (as of now only three courses two usual colors and one slightly different colors.6.speaker is usual loud but not so great since it's competitors atleast gives surround speakers at this price point. But clarity of sound is great,but bass lovers wouldn't  love these speakers.7.Actually the expectation  and reality  of Samsung  exynos processor  changed my opinion  on their processor...it was great 👍...u will definitely  love it...8. One UI stands apart from all its competitors(especially mi ui ads on mi phones)It was my own experience and review with the phone...If iam wrong at any points peoples can comment me with correct ones so that users buy a better smartphone...Tq

title: CAUTION : Does not connect to Wi-Fi 5G
body: This model's Wi-fi connects only with 2_4G. I get max download speed of around 15 to 25Mbps with my Tataplay fiber 200 Mbps broadband connection. Tata play technician who visited to help me expressed his helplessness as the problem is with M12 model. My other devices like a 9 year old iPad mini connect to Wi-Fi 5G.

title: Good budget phone!!
body: Been using this phone for Last couple of months.Reception is good.Camera is average at wide angle, good at close range.Battery is awesome with over 3 days standby.Weight is little heavy.Performance is questionable on heavy apps.Overall a good budget phone with all features.

title: SELLER CHEATED. GAVE ME THE PHONE WITH REPLACED DISPLAY AND MOTHERBOARD
body: Being a lay man, I don't understand if the mobile has re-pasted display. I believed the phone is as original as purchased from the samsung store and started using it.For the first 4 months everything was working fine and all of a sudden one day, the display was turning on and off on its own. And the next day display died.I contacted the Samsung original service center and they said that PHONE's DISPLAY and PBA have been replaced somewhere outside.I am attaching the Samsung's copy stating the Defect Description.Will also lodge an FIR against the Seller if not received the new phone in return.Don't worry for a Mobile worth 8,000.. I am Manic enough to spend 16,000 to teach a lesson to the seller.

title: Worth Price
body: (Review it after using for a month)It's battery backup is quite impressive, camera is good but could be more simpler interface, I am not a gaming person but as per my Experience it's working smooth, but yes sometimes for a sec you will it might be slow but overall it's a worth Price product as of now.

title: Unsafe and not a privacy free and a laggy phone
body: I also bought m32 5g model Samsung phone. In all samsung I noticed that location turns ON automatically while we switched to wifi which feels unsafe and also while in driving and walking, drive mode turns ON which blocks all calls sometimes important calls too. Cannot be able to disable both the modes.Also phone lags for every screen.

title: Waste of money, Poor battery performance
body: - Phone becomes hot on using for 10 minutes- Poor battery performance, in around 8-10 minutes 1% of battery is consumed while browsing some app (no music or videos were played)- Phone is thick and heavy to hold and it brings pain in fingers and hand (this cannot be blamed as weight is already mentioned in case description)- Never expected such product from Samsung

I shall appreciate if delayed return is acceptable and I am allowed to buy a 5G compatible Samsung Mobile.I cannot rate it on various parameters as I haven't used it. But as it is compulsory to enter the RATING, I PUT 4☆.

title: Samsung Is Hurting their fans Nowadays
body: I am big samsung fan but nowadays samsung making the phones which are not capable for compete with other phones in this price range and mid range. WIFI 5 is not here , they can give only amoled screen , nowadays amoled is normal. Camera is not good but it's ok for this price range. Only battery life is good. Buy in your own choice if you can add 1-1.5k more then go for other company phones coz nowadays these samsung phones getting hang problem  6 months later, I had m20 which had the same problem

title: Great phone in a budget range.
body: The phone works rather smoothly has a decent battery life where it lasts the entire day with the charge being at 47% by midnight. The camera performs well for the price, except the camera quality in the dark is grainy, and could be better. There is a weight to it which adds to the build of the phone. There is one speaker grill on the right side of the phone and has excellent audio. Would recommend 10/10

title: Not As Good As Advertised
body: - My contact book is not too large, around 700 contacts, yet it takes a couple of seconds to load it. It didn't happen in my previous mobiles even though they were less powerful than this device.- Although it has 4 cameras at the back, the portrait mode is completely nonsense. My previous phone had only 2 cameras on back yet it's portrait mode was a thousand times better.- Fingerprint sensor is on the power button and a real pain to use when you have a mobile cover.

title: Battery, Touch, Display and Camera
body: Writing this review after using this for complete 1 month..1-🔋 Life really good I can say it's awesome which lasts long for complete more thn a day watching videos/movies, playing games, connected to WiFi and Bluetooth all day long..2- Display is big enough to enjoy watching videos/ movies, playing games same as Sony Xperia's lates variants Sony Xperia 1 ii, 1 iii, 10 ii, 10 iii and all which is 21:9 cinematic view3- Touch is also very good it's very smooth and an actual feel of 120 refreshing HZs..4- Though it comes with quad camera 48, 5, 5 and 2 MP it's not up to the mark, camera quality is very poor as compared to other phones which comes under 15K.

title: Avrage mid range phone📱
body: I would say seller needs to do work with packaging 📦 and. phone delivered to me in good condition but over all its goodAbout phone it is a mid range phone if you are avrage phone user so it is good choice for you 1.Camera is ok 2.Phone performance is ok according to this price 3.Build quality is ok its fully plastic material 4.about display do not expact supper hd displays its ok not so good not so badMy opinion if are buying this for kid, mom , dad ,go for it

title: No dual band wifi, only 2.5ghz, very much disappointed
body: What benefit we will get if I have 6gb or 8gb ram. How come this mobile will not provide dual band wifi, means I am getting low Internet speed with that single band wifi feature. Very much disappointed with this big drawback. Even lower price mobiles are giving this feature but not m12. Samsung smartly avoided by not mentioning this in the product description.

title: Writing this post after using the phone for one week
body: Camera quality is awesome, no compromise on the quality.Battery life is excellent, for my usage of approx 20 nos long call of 5 - 20 mins average, and corporate emails.... Usage the battery is lasting for almost 3 full days. Battery is seriously a Monster.Fingerprint reader is an average one... No comments!!!  Overall for the price of 10k (i got 2k discount from amazon and 1k for using icici card) this is an excellent product from Samsung. Also to mention the Android v11 is loaded... No compromise in security related flaws. Excellent phone... Go for it!!!!!

title: Worst phone.. and in top of that pathetic Amazon support service
body: Worst phone.. and in top of that pathetic Amazon support service . Had ordered the phone twice but wifi not working in both the phones.. above of all that Amazon tech team service is worst.. while returning/ exchange of defective item amazon will tell the follow this that process. It took us alost a month to get our refund

title: Budget Friendly phone by samsung
body: My earlier m31s stopped working suddenly, and in order to have a backup during lockdown purchased this one. It is budget friendly if bought in sale. Same as other phones in size (which are being launched lately). speed and memory in sync. However, camera and finger print scanner a big turn off. Dont go for it if camera / pics are main purpose or you use that often.

title: Worst Mobile
body: Seems like Im using 10 years back mobile. Its super heavy. Resolution is no good and I have eye pain. Camera is very bad. Yes they have given 6000 mah battery but it takes more than 2 hours to charge fully. And battery does not work like a 6k mah battery.Does not expect this from Samsung as they have huge market nowadays compare to Apple worldwide.

title: screen replacement issue's solution
body: 6 months screen replacement for prime means, third party is providing replacement for prime members only within a certain prime day offer period.In case anyone want replacement, have to contact or raise a request through for replacement. Third party will do the needful accordingly.

title: Couldn't meet my expectations
body: I expected a lot about samsung mobiles in this price segment, but after buying it I totally regret myself.. But as a reviewer, I would like to post the pros and cons that I observed in this mobile..Pros:-1. Long Battery Life.2. Advanced features which are only available in Samsung ecosystem (like "do not disturb while in driving" etc.,)3. Can fastly unlock the phone using Fingerprint scanner.Cons:-1. Total Weight of Mobile.2. Camera quality is not seems like a 48MP Cam.3. Display quality is also not good.4. Face unlock is just an useless feature in this mobile.5. Last but not least, the worst thing is the processor. A walking turtle would be better than the performance speed of this processor..If anybody like to buy a mobile in this price range, just go with either Redmi or Realme.. Those brands will really satisfy you a lot (I were a Redmi user and I fully satisfied with the features, that's why I recommended this brand). 👍

title: Worst processor ever in a Samsung phone !!
body: I bought this smartphone for my mother as I knew there would be no large applications used, so the phone would not need much processing. But this phone started to freeze and lag even when applications of size 10 -15 MB were installed. I have been a loyal Samsung customer for nearly 10 years, but now it's time to move on I think.I will not suggest this phone to anyone. You can get far better phones at this same cost.

title: Hanging issue and Lags a lot ...
