title: A short review........
body: This mobile has got excellent battery backup it's a beast.The display is also best 👍.The camera is ok-ok quality i.e Average quality as if u zoom a little the pixel decreases.The face regonization is very bad it doesn't work at all, you have to move ur face to 1-2 cm distance from Phone than only it works.No complain regarding fingerprint, it's works smoothly 😌.The sound through the speakers are quality sounds 👌.Overall except the face regonization this mobile is perfect👍.I gifted this mobile to my maa and she is happy with it 😊. Mobile at cost of  only ₹9999 is perfect for me 👌.

title: DOES NOT SUPPORT 5GHz WiFi BANDS
body: Such an awesome phone ruined by a biggest lack of a most important and basic feature, GREAT battery life, camera, UI, lives up to its reputation;Great specs all round, only thing to be vary of is that it DOES NOT SUPPORT 5GHz band wifi “5G wifi”When you buy a phone with such great specs, it’s a real shame that the only thing slowing it down is a lack of fast internet speeds due to hardware limitation. Not having support for 5GHz in 2021 is 🤮🤮

title: Below Average phone
body: Below average phone.Heavy in weight.I missed to note it's not a dual band wifi supports only 2.4Ghz.Camera is just average 48 MP is just for a sake .Phone is slow no doubt about it.Sound just below average.I will suggest if u have couple of thousands budget go for other brands.

title: Just ok for a budget phone not made in china
body: Purchased in June.What I like-Battery power. I charge it only once in 2 days. Being a medium-to- heavy user  it's a big thumbs up.- Storage capacity- Navigation speed- Not made in ChinaWhat I dislike- It's quite heavy!- Eyes hurt within 3 hours. It never happened with any of the phones I have  used so far (more than 10 phones ) . Some of them were really cheap too. I  don't know why this phone makes the eyes hurt. I am not a particular fan of  Eye Comfort Shield feature so this is a big minus point for me.- Camera here truly is just an accessory. Well, anyway, I didn't buy this phone  for cameras, my expectations were already low but the quality of pics are  even lower than what I expected.- Screen resolution.If you have other phones and want a budget secondary phone not made in China this one is good enough. I was sceptical about the performance of an Exynos processor , never used one before, but it seems alright so far.

title: The worst phone i ever met.
body: Battery quality is beyond my expectations .It drains too quickly and when I got the phone only 47% charged shows that samsung company is not aware about his customers.There is no features of screen recording and object remover in this phone i have to install app from playstore.Hardly a week passsed of brought this phone it started hanging and heating + Poor touch response after i put temper on the screen .Overall i suggest you guys please go for another phone in this range samsung is worst .You can prefer vivo ,realme at this range will be better than this one.

title: Not worth. Very slow phone. Waste of money. Do not Buy
body: As a phone just bought and from Samsung it was a complete let down. Phone is very slow without any App itself. Installing an app itself takes ages. Screen resolution is pathetic and so is the Look of the phone. Very very disappointed!!!!! Anyway thanks to Amazon that somehow managed to return it.

title: Affordable Phone with Great Features
body: Beyond expectations, an affordable phone in this budget with great features loaded. This phone has the latest android 11 with a great camera, very good battery life, Exynos processor, IPS display with 90Hz, and is well built. This phone is easy to use for gaming and has a lot of memory to store all your media files and documents. Timely delivered and thanks to Amazon for such fast delivery.

title: 6 MONTH SCREEN REPLACEMENT

title: Worst mobile I have ever  seen
body: I brought this phone for my dad.everything was good at first but after some 4 months the phone is not at all working.when I reach to Samsung service center they are telling like "the motherboard is not working if I go for service also its waste of money".but there is no physical damage from our end not understanding wt the hell going on.and still 2 months emi is pending for this and they r not taking this for exchange also....and also I have brought Samsung m32 at the same time...that also not working properly nowadays...its always hang. So finally my suggestion is not to go for  Samsung products.

title: Don't expect much. Just a basic low end smartphone and does justice for this price
body: For this price - Nothing great to be expected.It's a low end phone. So everything about this phone is below average - except battery.Bad ambient light sensor, decent camera, decent amount output, cheap charging cables - bad quality.Excellent battery!Expensive phones - outstanding performanceCheap phones - you get what you pay for

title: Value for money
body: It's been good so far..and for sure value for money...good battery almost coming 3+days, nice UI, touch is good, decent camera, browsing speed is good...Issues..Some times app gets closed automatically, when u try to open...esp youtube, google maps...might required Some system updates

title: No support from Seller
body: Had a mix up Galaxy M21 with M12 . Both comes next to next when you search for M21 . The price of the 6 GB varient of m12 and 4 GB of m21 is also the same . Only problem is M21 is Super amoled , Full HD with latest processor .  No comparison with both . Realized this only on unboxing when the screen looked very ordinary on running the phone .The lag to move from one function to the next is glaring ( even when it is brand new ). Reported this to amazon . They could not help as the seller support page is just a computer generated one which just runs you in circles . Basically no way to contact seller. Only a postal address - in todays world how is it even going to work?  Tried seller website .No reply . I was more than willing to Pay more since it was partly my mistake . Feel cheated with price of a decent phone which starts off slower than my 4 yr old current phone . If only the seller could help .

title: All featured Samsung smart phone In this budget .... Pocket friendly
body: It's budget phn with all facilities plus Samsung brand... It's a good choice... You can buy it without doubt if you want a good battery life,  good picture quality,  good camera, also its not lagging in game, good processor and ram with no overheating issue... In this budget it's the best budget and pocket friendly phone. You can't expect more in this budget

title: Non slippery Surface👉👉
body: 👂Do not waist your money on this mobile..👍Mobile is good as secondary usage, non slippery surface is the only good thing.👍You can change video quality in apps like u-tube, Amazon prime etc.👎Worst display👎Camera, display and touch quality not good👎Heavy weight 220gmNote✍️Go for another mobile with latest configuration.

title: This is the second time I have faced an issue with the Amazon on buying a electronic product.
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 The phone is hanging and goes off on its own. Not even a week the phone was used and started giving problem, video attached for your reference....Due to lock down I was not able to return the phone as the site was not functional and gave me an error currently we cannot pickup or drop any product at your mailing address due to covid-19 restrictions....

title: It's battery lasts for 48 hours
body: Pros:Great Battery which lasts for more than 24 hours even if i watch Amazon Prime for whole dayBig displayGreat cameraDual VoLTEDual VoFI (Normal calling through broadband internet)Cons:Compass is not thereAbsence of GyroscopeIt has some good weight (222 gm to be specifically)Overall its a good phone for the people who don't play games like Pubg or CODM. In my case I needed a phone with great battery and it works perfectly for me.

title: Not Good, Not Bad
body: Hey so this is an honest review from my side. I thought Samsung phone would be great for my dad but it isn't so great. The battery life isn't good. Once the battery goes below 50% it drains really fast. Talking about camera quality, it isn't as good as expected. The pictures look grainy.. finger print reader doesn't accepts your finger sometimes, and if you put a cover on your phone then its even harder to use the finger print reader. This phone has good features but ya if I talk about the price it was good for 11k but not perfect!

title: Battery backup very good,
body: Battery backup very good. Some features are very helpful, that is tap to wake up & screen off, eye comfort shield, dark mode, Dolby atmos. Transfer massages, contacts, settings, notes, app data are very easy from my old Samsung phone. Overall experience very good.

title: Worth buying
body: Battery is good, though it takes almost 2-2.5 hours for recharge.. camera quality is good. 128 gb rom and 6gb ram is good for any application even for big sized games..Only shortcoming is the fingerprint sensitivity.. its particularly bad mainly because of its position on the side..But all total its a phone worth buying in this price range

title: If you got few extra 1000s, go with upper models
body: Giving 3 stars because1 - It only have got 2.4 ghz wifi card, 5 ghz wifi will not work on this. So if you have modern day fiber internet wifi, chances are it won't probably be compatible with this device.2 - It says 48MP camara but it is not the best camara regarding the specs. I don't understand why it got 4 camaras when other 3 are barley average in terms of quality.If you can have few extra thousands, then go with m30s series.I understand Samsung has to do stuff to do cost cutting and marketing, I also own a m31, that one is better. Also random apps will download from samsung app store until you dont force stop samsung app store.

title: Review depends on beholder
body: 1. Price - Bought during GIF, was one of the cheapest in this config range.2. Camera - Average at best.3. Battery life - Very good.4. Sensors for touch - Good.5. Batteries are heavy and the mob as such is heavy in hand, don't keep them in loose pockets!!6. Browsing - Good, remove all unnecessary apps during first opening and setting up the device.Overall a good device if purchased within 9k.

title: Very poor performance compared to specifications
body: Fingerprint sensor often doesn't respond. Without any reason phone goes in deep sleep mode and go for 3-5 cycle of restarting automatically then start working. Updates are available but not getting installed properly.Called service centers several times but no response received. It appears a faulty product.Camera appears good but if you compare the quality of pic with other models of Samsung it's quality is very average.

title: No after sales service
body: Charger stopped working after 2 months of use. Local Samsung service center denied to repair or replace it since it is purchased through amazon.. So many emails written to Samsung customer care, they always reply with same answer " our executive will reach out to you shortly". But They never do. Shocked with this kind of support samsung is providing.

title: Perfect budget phone for non gamers
body: Fingerprint reader is really good and quickBattery life is good tooCamera quality is decent, since I m not much into photography I am goodProcessor isn't powerful enough to run heavy games , but it don't play heavy games, so this mobile is perfect for meAbsence of secure folder is kinda heartbreaking but nothing that we can't manage

title: Great Phone!
body: Pros:*On the internet, some found the phone heavy a little bit, but for me, it looked like a sturdy mobile*Great Rear camera quality, Good front camera quality*Ultra quick fingerprint sensor*Descent battery life indeed, suggest you use the phone mildly and charge the battery only up to 85-95% for at least 1 week. I use the phone mostly for YouTube and social media and with that using its battery last for about 2.5 - 3 days or sometimes 3.5 days as wellCons:*Face Recognition is slow, but you won't need that if you use fingerprint*Not meant for high-end gaming cause sometimes frame dropsBtw purchased the phone for Rs 9499

title: A very poor quality camera, memory
body: Firstly amazon cc is very inefficient in handling my queries, series of wrong communication from chat support, phone support. My email is not yet answered since 8 days. Now, samsung m12 phone - out of 64gb only 50-52gb is available and remaining 12-13gb occupied by system. Out of 4gb ram 1.8gb approx is occupied by system. Camera quality is very very poor. Phone hangs too much like if i unlock the phone it takes more than 10-15 sec to display clock, navigation icons, notifications panel etc. Phone heats up if we use gdrive, maps, hotspot. Screen and body is very delicate. Plz think much before you go for this. An upset frustrated Amazon cusromer, Sameer!

title: Average
body: I had a lot of doubts before purchase on seeing the negative reviews lying here and there but my experience with the Samsung m12 was really exciting. It has good battery backup, the display, even though 720p is not bad to look at, screen brightness is optimum. RAM management is good for day to day apps. Haven't found any lags.  Haven't tried playing any games on it. The battery last for 2 days on normal usage and 1 day on heavy usage and takes about 3hrs to fully charge.  Over all it is a great phone. The true monster. Update: After using it for nearly 6 months I'm facing proximity sensor issue, which I found is common in midrange samsung devices because of which I'm planning to change the phone and never am I going for another Samsung device. There are minor stutters here and there even while using light apps like YouTube. The battery life is still awesome.

title: Not so great. Regret my purchase
body: I bought this for my mother. I ll just list what I don't like.1. Too heavy. Don't buy this for old people2. Camera is shaky and output is not great. I don't know why they have given four cameras.3. Too much of useless Samsung apps and galaxy items interrupting in between. I cannot able to disable these.

title: Processing speed  very  slow and internet  working is very bad.
body: Battery life is so good  and camera quality  is average  like 13 mp. Front camera is like 2 mp. Fingerprint reader working without touch finger. When we hold in hand then finger  print reader trust to read any part of hand so it was problem. Processing system is very low. And in this mobile internet speed very slow. And in low network  it's  internet  not worked. Only show processing.

title: Awesome battery life, satisfactory screen
body: For my use case, a single charge lasts me around 6 days (charge 100% to 40%, after which I recharge again). Actually it should last me more than 10 days I think, if I allow it to drop to 1% before recharging. My use case is: office related video calls, email, WhatsApp, online shopping, connecting to chrome cast and watching YouTube videos on tv, sms, phone calls, reading kindle books, etc. Screen ON time, about an hour or so a day depending on video call duration. I do not play games on my phone. I keep it on battery saving mode, and 60hz screen refresh.Been using the phone for more than a month now. Very satisfied with the performance. Only slight issue was the slightly heavier weight of the phone compared to my previous phone. But I have gotten used to it and it does not bother me at all now.Regarding the screen being non fullHD, I thought it would be something I would notice. Nope, I feel no difference when reading books on kindle. Maybe teenagers with better eyesight will notice, but I definitely cannot.In summary, I’m very happy with the purchase. I just hope Samsung keeps pushing the updates till at least android 13, and security updates for at least 4 years. That would be perfect.

title: User friendly Indian phone
body: Overall a very good performance phone with good call quality, speaker quality, screen quality, battery life, handling, ergonomic & feature full. The only drawback I faced is that the head phone connector is placed at the bottom of the phone which prevents me from keeping it in standing position on my phone stand. It should have been on the top side like my old Lenovo phone. Otherwise, overall it's a 5 star from side. Samsung, please consider this feedback if it reaches you.

title: Think twice  before buying
body: I am using this phone from past 3 months and I never played any heavy games in this phone. I use it to attend calls and social media, watching videos,  listening music and for clicking pictures.I'm using Vodafone and jio Sim & I'm facing issue with Vodafone signal, whenever I'll get call it use to disconnect in-between.Camera performance is not bad, but I'm not happy with battery performance.  It has a 6000mAh battery but I have to charge my phone everyday it consume lot of battery.And phone is little heavy you have to buy additional cover and screen protector.Only charger and type c cable is available along

title: Samsung display issues
body: Within 45 days display damaged. It's in warranty but asking 3000. Worst decison for buying samsung. I would never again buy samsung phones and will never prefer anyone for the same. I am using another phone of redmi from 5 years no issues as of now. Withing 45 days it's damaged and no warranty on the display too...I am very unhappy with Samsung services. Bad product and customer service too.

title: Decent device
body: Overall, it's a decent device. In one year time however the performance has come down in terms of response. The biggest problem I faced was the loose connection of the finger print module. One fall the finger print cable+power button cable would disconnect from the module and then its a headache to open the backpanel and fix it. My mother's realme c11 was much more sturdier and a better performer even now (bought at the same time). Buy it only if you need a Samsung branded phone.

title: A good battery life phone with Average camera
body: The phone is no doubt a good choice at a given price point. Along with the trust of Samsung brand. The camera quality is average but you will surely not be disappointed considering the price that you have paid.The best part is its 6000mAh large battery. It goes on and on.The only con that I feel is that it is bit bulky but that too is mangeable.Attaching few clicks for those who are wondering about the camera quality.

title: whatsapp is not compatible and camera is low quality
body: I have faced at least 2 bugs while using this phone in whatsapp,1. after capturing image send button was not available on the screen2. I was not able to send messages to anyone while my other apps were working fine which uses internet connectionsamsung and whatsapp developer please look into thiscamera quality is average or near to poor

title: Mobile hang frequently
body: It was very happy when I received it that I haven't spent money on China mobile but within 10 day I started regretting as it has started to hang very frequently and that's annoying. I haven't added extra memory card and using phone with only one SIM. Return policy was 7 days and it started hanging from 9th day :(

title: Average or below average
body: Camera  :  Not Good (not up to mark  48 mp)Battery  :  GoodDisplay  :  Not good (like local )Charger with phoneNo back cover with phoneNo ear phone with phoneMany  problem  with phone  you  can say poor quality  of  product o r  below average Mon youtube and  others  they  are  making foolish  about  phone review

title: Delivers at its price - Highly Recommended.
body: Bought this for my parents and they love it. As I am using A52 myself, I feel M12 delivers at its price range and then some. The fingerprint sensor is fast and accurate. Having 90 Hz Adaptive display is wonderful.Camera is decent as well, with options for Macro (attached) and Wide Angle being good as well. Haven't experienced any lags on medium workloads.Android 11 with updated UI, Smart View, Dolby Atmos, Good Battery Life are some highlights.Very satisfied with the purchase.

title: Pro and cons
body: Don't expect high from this phone its  camera not good, gaming you can do at low settings and medium on high settings it gonna heat up and this improve network connection sometimes you don't get signal in basements of jio vi airtel but in this i got network in basement to and display is avg battery is perform normal as usual on dual sim it give 10hr battery backup performance on donig basic is good 90hz pannel is doing a great job just a single app got open in sec and its a metal body so after few days without cover you can see scratch on back pannel

title: It is good! But not tooo good! As i expected!
body: I am reviewing this after 2 months of usage! It was good ! It is little heavy compared to other samsung mobile! The battery life is good... But not as worth for 6000mah! I don't play games i just use social media! For social media useage its bit Oke! And the camera! Seriously! 48mp is not that good its Oke! Just oke!! But its totally budget friendly!

title: Best mobile by samsung 👌
body: Best low Price galaxy ever.Camera is best for outdoor and day not for Night, mobile working smoothly 👌,All is fine disappointments about USB Cable, About screen  YouTube run on 1080pxAnd pubg on HD resolution, no hitting problems at all. I order two m12 mobile blue and white, white  is good looking, 6000mhz massive  battery backup, I Loved it. Thank 😊 you samsung.

title: Screen brightness flickers in low light while switching between apps
body: 1. Screen brightness flickers in low light while switching between apps. 2. It is not so super smooth though it is 90 hz.Everything else is good. 3. When we try to increase brightness via notification center, it just goes back to the lowest immediately and automatically though auto brightness is disabled in the display Settings

title: Overall Nice Smartphone!
body: Good Phone in this price segment and overall decent performance but camera is not really good as samsung showcase its true 48 megapixel ,even front camera quality not so good.Battery wise thumbs up!Charging time about 2- 2:30 hrs. 0-100, it will give you 1 day battery backup even after heavy usage.Dual 4G volte with dual standby.Screen quality preety good.It an heavy phone.For business purpose I recommend this phone.Overall 8/10.

title: VIDEO SYSTEM NOT WORKING AT ALL
body: VIDEO CAN NOT TO BE SENT TO WHATS APP, EVEN 5/6 MINUTES OF VIDEO, ONLY ONE STILL PHOTO & OBLY 10 MINUTES VIDEO IN GALLARY SHOWING THAT THE STORAGE IS FULL ALSO SYSTEM IS NOT SUPPORTING TO SHOOT ANY VIDEO OR TAKE ANY PHOTO. SINE THE DAY WE HAVE  ACTIVATED PHONE ON 15TH dEC BY AIRTEL SIM, VERY RARELY USING PHONE AS VIDEO SYSTEM IS NOT WORKING AS PER OUR REQUIRMENTS. SO PLZ SUGGEST BEST SOLUTION OF THIS PROBLEM AS I PURCHASED THIS PHONE FOR VIDEO UPLOADING PURPOSE.

title: Think once before you choose to buy
body: The phone has good battery better than most other phones.The performance is not upto the mark. Camera doesn’t look like 48 pixel.Writing 48 pixel camera, 6GB RAM and not experiencing such level of performance based on specs raises doubts on Samsung.Definitely compare with other phones in the before marking a purchase decision

title: Worst mobile company  and worst handset ever
body: I bought samsung galaxy m12 6/128 on 20/10/2021. Since then on last month i have to change mobile motherboard mobile screen was not working properly and was hanging alot during calls it was difficult to talk in a single call i have to end the call and again call to same number same problem i was facing again and againWhile the mobile was in pocket it was automatically going into out of networkPower button was also got inactive. That was also repaired from service centre alot of issue faced after purchasing this handset.NEVER GO FOR ANY SAMSUNG SMART PHONE

title: Good budget phone
body: This is a good budget mobile. If you are not power user and do not play game, this mobile can last upto 3 days on a single charge. It also has micro SD card slot , so you can expand the memory. Screen is nice and bright, big enough to watch videos. I have been using this phone for 3 weeks now and have not faced any problem

title: The features are good, but slightly hardware is heavy and OS is slow
body: The features are good with a good display, but the OS is slow sometimes. The phone is heavy comparatively. The numeric keypad is not working properly for some of the frequently used apps such as GPay.

title: Recommended but think again!
body: The phone is great. Good display and UI. Comes with 6000 maH huge battery. Charging is quick but 1 thing that comes as negative is the camera. The camera doesn't seem like 48 MP. It struggles in low light & the Front camera also suffers the same problem. You can certainly go for it if you are OK with below standard camera. Amazon delivery was excellent

title: Value for money smartphone
body: While Samsung boasts about the 48MP camera, the picture quality is not up to the mark. I was looking for a smartphone for my mother with a price range of 9-11 k and was confused between Resmi 9 series and Samsung M12. I finally decided to go for samsung since it has a good resale value. The battery life is just amazing, since my mom uses the phone for basic functions like calls, watching videos on youtube and social media, the battery lasts easily for 3 days on a full charge

title: It's OK for non regular users.
body: 1. To begin with battery life is pretty good, however it takes little longer to fully charge the phone.2. Front came is pathetic. Rear camera is some how ok for basic usage.3. Fingerprint will work whenever it wants to (not everytime you need it) so remember phone pinlock to be on a safer side.4. Phone got hanged twice within 15 days of normal usage.5. Overall this is a phone for elderly person or for someone who is low to minimal user on a daily basis.

title: U cannot wish to satisfy everyone
body: I bought this phone to last 5years(thus OPPO or Vivo was not an option).........my first phone was Samsung metro.......now it's Samsung galaxy m12..........user interface is good.......the phone barely looses any charge when idle or used via wired earphones..........satisfied till now

title: beast under 12k
body: samsung m13 is budget king1)samsung never disappoints in software wise2)performance was good battery lasts for 2 days 50mp camera clicks very good3)side fingerprint was very quick and it unlocks even we realise it4)phone charges very quickly eventho it was 6000mah5)themes were good in android 12 with samsung one ui

title: Good Phone, Does the job in this price range.
body: I am using this phone for almost 4 months, Experience is good so far, Everything is decent in this price range,Main reason for me to purchase is because of battery, Which serve its purpose, But it made phone little heavy.Overall i am satisfy with the purchase.

title: Mobile quality is average
body: 1) Look and feel of the mobile is good but little heavier due to 6000 mAH battery.2) Camera quality is good but slow - takes more time to save the picture.3) Fingerprint reader is good.4) Overall performance is slower.5) Battery support - 2 days under normal use.

title: Not Bad
body: First time when i used, it saw heating alot. I was worried too much but later it was fine. One of the best quality is that it has an awesome battery backup. Camera is not up to what i thought. I faced bit sound issues for whatsapp and no gestures for screenshots. Still it seems fine, not bad choice.

title: A good phone for binge watching your favourite shows and scrolling through insta or facebook
body: It is a good phone for the price (i got it for ₹9500). Have a very good battery backup ,display is good with 90hz refresh rate  (would have been better if it was FHD+) good main camera and decent wide angle camera rest two cameras are trash, front camera is also decent gets the job done, the processor is good for day to day usage and light gaming, not for heavy gamers and don't expect it to run BGMI at balanced settings the best it can do is low, software is good and ad free though it still runs android security patch of december 2021.Overall a good phone for parents or as a secondary phone.Edit:- got feb security patch update yesterday on 23-05-2022.

title: Best Phone in Budget
body: It's best budget phone for daily use purpose. Pls don't expect premium phone's level camera quality but it suffice whatever it has....The best thing is screen resolution when you go out in sun unlike cheap Chinese phones which gets fade..

title: Doesn't recognize 5G bandwidth of wifi
body: Such a modern phone but doesn't recognize 5G bandwidth of wifi. Fingerprint reader on lock button is in a very wrongfully place. Phone locks and unlocks because of it. So now have to register a different finger for unlocking and use different finger for locking the phone.

title: Excellent camera, good battery and awesome fingerprint reader
body: M12 is fulfilled my expectations completely, hats off to Samsung. Quality camera and fingerprint reader are best of this range. Especially big battery gives good support for online classes without interruption, totally we are well satisfied with product.

title: This one of the best budget phone
body: I bought this phone 6 months back. Battery life is the strong point of this phone apart from that big screen and white bright light also appealing.Camera quality is not that good but if you are looking a smart phone in this segment so you dont much expect from camera.All in all best phone in this segment a complete package.

title: Defective mobile Amazon selling don’t buy

title: Most cost effective phone for a brand like Samsung
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 The fingerprint reader is very sharp.The battery life is the best. It last for almost3 days with less use.The camera is great the macro camera isn't good but the 48 MP camera is the best it works very nicely. Jus the phone is a bit heavy. Otherwise good. The screen resolution is great.

title: Can go for better with addl 2k
body: Good battery back up.Sound and picture could have been better at this price.Unable to make credit card payments through this phone, states version should be above 18.3.My prior phone was doing it bought 4 years ago.Within weeks timePhone at this cost hasLow camera qualityHanging issues unfortunateTechnician checked and advised for replacement. Agreed with issues.Don't see options to return, please stay away folks.

title: Don't like it.
body: Camera quality is very poor and display quality too. This model is not listed in the exchange models list also. How funny that Amazon sold a mobile and they aren't considering the same model for exchange what kind of business ethics is this where as the same model is listed on Flipakrt for exchange models.

title: Think🤔
body: First of the phone was a worth purchaseand best budget promise by samsung.For a normal user epecially for middle aged one's and new android experiencing one's it is a better choise, why because of the branded non chinese mobile.Perfomance :1.Camera quality : primary camera is best and give awesome clicks but not impressed in secondary, but i repeat its a budget based handset by samsung..2.Finger print reader: take a few seconds some times, but in a wide range it is fast.3.Battery life : its awesome no word to say...And fast charging 15wA negative portion is weight, its weight is about 221 gm it's heavier i noted this here because, samsung introduced m21 model with more specifications and perfomance carrying the same monster typical battery 6000 mah but weighing only around188gm is very lite weight and easy to handle (remember the prize difference).Overall my conclusion is the product is worth for money. I am completely satisfied, why because i had that much money....So no over expectations, thank you samsung.And especially thankyou Amazon for best service again.

title: Bad bad bad phone
body: I am writing review after using almost 1month of using this phone, so please take serious before buying this. There is no return policy only replacement available. So think twice.Please dont fall in offer, worst phone ever, always ask for software update.Heavy in weight.Camera Quality poor.Battery life poor.Sound Quality poor.Don't fall in rat race.

title: Bang for a Buck
body: People who are judging this without realizing it's price needs to calm down. I bought this for my cousin during Great Indian Festival at Rs. 8600. Excellent product, Clean Samsung UI which is the best in the world, 90 Hz refresh rate which is working fine without any lag, Battery backup is real good. People who are saying camera needs improvement, they are not gonna give you Flagship level camera in the phone which is less than 10000 Rs. If you want cleaner UI, you can definitely buy this. & it's stupidity to judge a phone by Gaming performance. This phone is a daily driver & not a gaming device.

title: Don't buy this Phone 😞
body: 1-Camera Quality too poor back & Front both2- battery life is too short 8 hours3- unable to take screenshots4-phone hang while typing5- for PUBG lover Don't Buy not working in properly6- Display Quality is so ugly while playing game 🎯🎮7- mobile heating while charging & using tym both8- It's taking 3-4 hours for charging

title: Speaker output is very low. Has bugs out of the box
body: Speaker output is low. You will notice this if you consume media using phone's speakerIt has a bug in touch screen out of the box. Gets fixed with first update.It doesn't have proximity sensorBattery life is the biggest positive. On normal usage I get around 2 days battery life with around 11 hours screen time

title: Heavy in weight
body: Mobile have a decent look,For this money range we should not expect high,It will flexible to our parents for youth, you should think twice,Battery life was good, Fingerprint was perfect,Face unlock when light was sufficient it works good,In low light bit late but works.Main drawback was weight of mobile it was bit heavy.Front Camera have decent image in daylight, but we will observe Noise in Image.Something with back Camera.This review is purely my experience with M12 mobile.

title: Not worth buying
body: Bought this new phone for my mom on 5th Oct.. the day I recieved the phone I had issue with camera quality (checked and confirmed by Amazon technician as well) also faced issue with dialler tone while making call.. there was no sound of the dialler tone.. Amazon replaced and sent me a new phone on the 9th Oct.The new phone had no issue with Camera but issue with dialler tone was still there. I raised the issue with Amazon and they provided me an appropriate solution with amazing service and initiated the refund.I don't think Samsung phones are worth buying at the price range of below 10k.I might prefer going for Realme, MI, Vivo or any other brand over Samsung.

title: Basic knox secured Samsung phone
body: Decent phone at 9,000 (after bank offers). The processor and display are not upto the standard. But given that this phone has knox security, I have little to complain about. This phone is strictly for old people who just needs a secure phone for day to day usage like messaging, calling, etc. Not recommended for any user who wants to do a lot of multitasking or gaming.

title: Ear piece speaker not working from day one.
body: The ear piece speaker is not working from day one . I had gifted the phone to a senior citizens. He was using the phone on speaker mode. He did not tell me about it until I found him using speaker to talk. By the time I came to know about the issue 7 days had past. Now no return option available. And I went to samsung authorised service centre there they don't have spares to rectify the problem. So still we are using the phone with speaker on. Did not expect such a quality from a big brand like samsung. Feeling very disappointed.

title: Don't buy it..worst ever experience with Samsung13 product
body: Not up to mark performance.Not upto mark battery life.Not up to mark sensor.Very dull audioThird class camera quality.

title: fake commitment
body: battery 6000 mAh But in actuality, That is equal to 5000mAhCAMRA quality is very low. I have a Realme 3i. that phone has a much better camera. the selfy camera is a pure C grade.90Hz Refresh Rate but it doesn't seemI checked these 3 things carefully, then there is no quality in all three. As said. So there is no guarantee that the rest of the things that are being given in the commitment will also be correct.

title: Nothing
body: As far as my opinion is concerned, the over all features are Ok. The drawback features are:1. M12 is out of Super Amolrd Screen.2. Back Fingerprint is more covenient than side3. Camera quality is not so hifi than other models4. S Bike mode should given, which will be helpful ehile driving..5. Charger model is different  than other M series Mobiles with battery of 6000 mah.

title: All good, except fingerprint sensor
body: For its cost, I believe the phone is worth it. Till now, it hasn't shown any problems. Everything works fine. Battery is magnificent. Only problem is the fingerprint sensor. It is on the side on top of the power button. So, the space is very small. Most of the back covers or flip covers cover this fingerprint sensor partially and the device does not unlock.

title: Go for other option
body: Not up to the mark too many cons1)phone ram management is not good it hangs too much 90hz screen is only for show whenever u set screen at 90hz its start hamging2) VGA camera is better than this 48megapixal camera3)when i start mobile and setup it hang and restart more than 2 time so i will suggest  dongo for this phone

title: Could be better
body: Main demerit is noise cancellation. It cancels MY VOICE in video calls. NOISE CANCELLATION SHOULD CANCEL BACKGROUND NOISE. HERE IT DOES JUST THE OPPOSITE. Very annoying. Battery life is good. Camera is below average. 48mp works like 4.8 mp.

title: Best At 9499(6GB /128GB ) From Samsung
body: Very Good Cameras , Decent Day To Day Tasking , Better Sound Quality with Dolby Atmos , Screen Is TFT With High Quality . But Colour Not Much Natural Or Saturated . little Bit Faded Type . Mobile Goes Smoothly When It's on 60hz Refresh Rate . Battery Is Beast . Lasts 8hrs SOT . Charges With 1hr 30min with Standard 15w Charger

title: Don't buy go for Samsung M21
body: I have been using Samsung M21, also my 2 family members using same model.So thought to buy this M12 for my father.1. Biggest disappointment DisplayLooks like a old age mobile2. Camera is ok ok3. Only good thing is battery 🔋.4. Cheap plastic body5. Heavyweight6. Go for Samsung M21 it's more better.

title: Budgeted phone ever
body: Its a budgeted phone. 6 GB/ 128 GB storage variant is good. Battery backup is awesome. Took 3-3.5 hrs to full charge. Not happy with front camera quality & Awful at night. NO slow motion capturing feature. Rear camera is better in daylight & good at night. Not happy with side touch sensor. Took so many attempts sometimes to unlock. But, overall I am happy using it because navigation sensor, battery backup & performance of phone is good compared with other brands.

title: Mid range good quality.12 hajar ke andar acchi mobile h
body: This is good product battery life is awesome internal memory is good 128GB good for gaming is mid range mobile.lttle bit heavy weight. Acchi mobile hai 12 hajar ke andar game khelne k liye v best hai.battery v bahut chalti hai.but camera utna accha nahi h.baki sab thik h wajan thoda jyada hai

title: good
body: after using the phone almost 4 months1. phone is not super fast what company is claiming infact it is slow sometimes.2. If fully charged battery stays 24 to 30 hours even after heavy use but problem is with the time taken for the battery charging is toooo long. so people having busy schedule will always face low in battery, and searching for where to charge 🤔. 15 amp charger kaun deta hain re Samsung?3. M series has bad reputation for software essue but I Did not faced yet except Bluetooth sometimes turned off automatically while listening music.Overall price has dropped 1000 Rs now. I bought it at 10500 Rs. You can buy it, sexy looks. works well.

title: The phone keeps showing a black screen with logo
body: The phone keeps showing a black screen with logo. And doesn't allow to use the phone even after multiple  tapping on screen or trying to use the fingerprint sensor. It takes almost 2-5 minutes for it to allow to use the phone. The issue persists while tge phone is in use or even when left idle. Hence the battery keeps draining. I tried restarting the phone but it didn't help. But the worst of all was that I switched off the phone, but the phone just turned on on its own. So their switch off doesn't work.

title: Nice phone at that range
body: Nice phone....having long battery life upto 2 to 3 days on one charging... because of 6000mah battery its a bit heavier but fingerprint scanner is on lock key that is awesome thing I have seen......camera is decent too... special selfie camera bright and clear...overall nice phone

title: An average phone.
body: An average phone. I was in a hurry to get a phone for my mom on the same day. Hence chose this model. It's an average phone.Main camera is good.Battery is awesome.Display is 720p. Looks decent but could have been 1080. The 90hz makes the phone smoother.Processor is very slow. Suitable for calling , taking pics, important apps like gpay, WhatsApp , etc. Very basic games works fine. Not for heavy usage.Phone weighs too much cuz of 6000mah battery. It is on the bulkier side.Overall an average phone.Compare Poco m3, redmi note 10 before buying. And could go for it if you don't want a Chinese product.

title: Super buy
body: Face recognition is slow. otherwise the phone is super awesome. My 4 months old iPhone se 2020 ran into some hardware issues, due to pandemic I couldn't service it. So I brought this m12 phone, just to be in budget for obvious reason. This phone is under 9999 and if your expecting performance similar to a 40k, then your review needs a think over. This phone exactly does or does more than what it's priced. If you are low budget and want more out of it with some limitations, go for it.

title: STPL SUPPLIER SEND WRONG ITEM
body: 8 ന്റെ പണിAmazon നെ ഉം പൊക്കിപിടിച്ച് നടന്ന എനിക്കും കിട്ടി നല്ല സ്വയമ്പൻ സാധനം BBD ൻ order ചെയ്തത് Samsung M12 6/128GB ഇന്ന് കിട്ടിയത് 4/64 GB varientഅപ്പോൾ കൂടെ Backcover ഉം screen gurd ഉം orderചെയ്തിരുന്നു😭Replacement ന്കൊടുത്തപ്പോ 6/128 സാധനം ഇല്ല😓(vidum order cheyan aanel kanikund Athena agane😒) കൂടെ വാങ്ങിച്ച Backcoverഉം Sreengurd Return അടിച്ചു അപ്പളാ പണി screenguard ന് Return ന്ഇല്ലത്രേ 😡എനിക്കെന്തിനാ Screen gurd അച്ചാർ ഇട്ടാനോ 😏വെറുതേ BBD പറഞ്ഞ് orderകൊടുതട്ട് എന്തായലും ആ 150 Rs പോയികിട്ടി😢😶

title: Got used and seal opened product
body: I ordered samsung galaxy m12 in blue color. I got used product with open seal. I called the Amazon and they agreed to return it. Thankfully!What I noticed about this model was it looks cheap.. As back is made up of cheap plastic. It's very heavy, which is not comfortable to use. Camera quality was awful for a 48 megapixel camera (Redmi camera is much better in same pixels) . It's shocking and disappointing.I did use this mobile so can't say anything about performance and battery life. Overall it's a series of disappointments.If you have a low budget(8550 after bank discount) then go for it! Else I recommend micromax in 1 or any other brand with good ratings. It's for normal usage, best for old parents who don't need much Features. Anyone other then that, is a BIG NOO.

title: Head Phone/Ear Phone and also back cover is Not available in box ,it very disappoin
body: Head Phone/Ear Phone and also back cover is Not available in box ,it very disappoint ,Pls provide both in feature new module .Mi and OnePluse they will provide Head Phone/Ear Phone and also back cover is available in box.Why Samsung it not providing these Both -Head Phone/Ear Phone and also back cover is available in boxIn feature if is available custmer is mor happy and satisfied .Please provide in feature ..

title: All is good but camara is not a 48mp cam
body: According to me everything is fine and good condition and exlent but  I need to tell one thing the camara  condition is not a 48mp  I think 30or35mp camara  except exspeally battery performance is maindblowing that over all product is good as far me notyetall disappointed me productI saggest u buy in amezing Amazon only because comparing to outher online platform Amazon is the best price selling to customer as far me samsung m12 I buying price is 10500 I compared in Flipkart it was showing 11500  thats why saggest u buy in Amazon onlyMy rating is out of 5 I will give 4Thanks

title: Basic phone with basic value
body: Wanted a second phone with good battery life- Good value for money in the 10/11k range- great battery life- camera quality is average- dual sim feature is a bonus- can be used as a primary phone if the usage is not heavy, or works like a charm as a secondary phone

title: Worst Samsung mobile : Amazon should have to product grading from own professionals before launch
body: I was strongly buying Samsung phones and advise to friends also because of its robustness. But I have worst experience with Samsung Galaxy M12 as its screen picture and camera quality are third class. Even my old Mi redimi 4 phone has a better camera and screen picture (although I am not promoting it).  It was also the fault of amazon as they launch Samsung phones at the festival without assessing the quality and grading of products from its own professionals to check their worthiness. We people buy it with the name of co's such as samsung and amazon. See, how we are easily deceived by amazon company.I strongly advise people that before buying products of such range, pls check its quality from the market

title: Overall good phone but Some features they have removed are...
body: The phone is overall good but you should know that what they have cut from the features to reduce the price. Firstly the phone's GPS is worst. Secondly you cannot connect to 5 ghz band wifi. Third, the phone when it came was bloated with 3rd party apps and galaxy pay was a real pain to remove from home screen. I also noticed that you cannot change internet access to a particular app in settings(which is possible in other androids). These are minor things and I don't care about it that much but the company should clearly provide details of such removed features, especially the GPS.

title: Not bad at these price
body: Loved this color.Cons:* heating issue*screen heating while charging*doesnt feel fast charging ( adapter provided is not 15w)* Not feeling 90 hz refreshing rate* battery drain fast ( not feeling 6000 mah battery life )*weight is little high*sound quality is not good (sometimes cant hear phone ringing) Pros:Camera quality goodVideo quality goodNice colorGood at this price (brought @10499)On time deliveryHope build quality of Samsung will be good

title: Great Battery backup
body: First what I like1. Great battery backup. I charge the phone on morning and just need to realx. It goes whole day without need to recharge.2. Good camera phone in the price range. Fair3. Good for games that I play. But yes, not the best gaming experience.What I didn't like:1. Hang sometimes.

title: Software is just too bad
body: There are lots and lots of bugs in this phone.Initially the permission module was not working that means you cannot give any permission to any app. How can they even launch with such a critical issue.This was solved after a software update.But then I am facing issue with mobile hotspot. Mobile hotspot automatically stops working and then does not gets turned on.You have to restart your mobile to turn on mobile hotspot which is very annoying.

title: The only Good One in M series🙄
body: Pros-•Good Battery Life•Good Camera (Back)(Better than M11🙄)•Z Plus Ram(excess ram more than 4GB IF NEEDED)•90Hz adaptive refresh rate•Smooth PerformanceCons-•Front Camera is Average•Too Many Useless apps When you First Buy it•Back Camera not suitable for Night condition•Saturation of Camera is Too High

title: Awesome phone within 10K budget, a sure shot Redmi killer
body: Simply an amazing smartphone from Samsung within 10k, a rival killer launched. Bought this for my dad and he is extremely satisfied with the performance, camera is decent enough, sound quality is pretty good and battery life is awesome!! Grip is good with the combi finish at the back. On the cons, a bit on the heavier side and slightly thicker compared to its rivals, but definitely not a deal breaker. With 90 Hz refresh rate, the pros surely weigh high over the cons, just go for it.

title: Not a good phone in this price range
body: The main reason going for samsung is amoled display but my bad may be I should have read specifications but it's a miss.. blindly went by brand Samsung...two major dissapointments1. There is no amoled screen...the screen is not so good where we get lesser rate MI phones with more good specs.2. There's no dual WiFi band... My wifi is set as 5ghz but this phone doesn't show up..I believe there are cheaper phones in MI and Realme with more specs than this Samsung

title: Phone to achcha hai but….
body: Phone to achcha hai. Main Sri lanka se, par India se mangvaya. rs9499 mei to value lagta hai. Lkn camera 48 hone par b dooor ke fotos ki pictures quality to theek nh. But selfie aur normal distance ke fotos  to theek hai. Meine ise online classes ke liye kharida. So iske liye theek laga. Face ID to andhere me kaam nhi karta. Battery bhi theek hai. Abhi 5dinon se classes ke lie use kia. Aur kya kahun? Amazon me jo b details dekha use dekh kar kharida. Ummid thodi si thi ki camera ke bare me. Iske alawa overall theek hai.

title: Wonderful phone for so low cost
body: Wonderful phone for the provided price. This was bought for my father .I was using one plus 7 pro and due to repair I was forced to use this phone for a week and to be honest other than camera I was more than satisfied with this mobile and its performance

title: Good product.
body: Product is good, a bit too heavy because of its 6000 mah battery. Rest is all good.Saw lots of negative reviews on amazon, hence was sceptical about buying this one. But so far no such problem have I encountered. Hence I am feeling happy about the decision I made.

title: Audio Output Too Low
body: I have gone through many reviews for this phone. But, I've not seen anyone talking about sound quality. Maybe their handsets are working absolutely fine.. Maybe my particular handset is troublesome. Anyways, since I got the phone on my hand, I couldn't explore as much as I should but overall my experience with Samsung is not up to the mark. I purchased Samsung's phone hoping to get some amazing performance which the company and other reviewers (mainly YouTube reviewers) claim.I am not that technically sound person to digest every single term the phone companies (manufacturers) use these days. Still, I've gathered a little bit of knowledge and experience after using various smartphones over the long 11-12 years.I got this model (Galaxy M12) exchanged with Redmi 8A Dual which was not that much worse.. The sound was pretty loud be it media sound, ringtones, call sound, etc.Frankly speaking, I've not checked gaming, camera and other features the way I did with sound quality. I'd recommend experience yourself before you buy this phone if at all possible.

title: Mobile is getting struck, hangon and is not getting updated
body: Slow in finger print reading and mobile functioning is not quick as shown.Also approached the service center. Many customers r facing mobile hanging on issue and screen struck issues. This is my second mobile in Samsung. Waste of money.

title: Good for consuming data not for creators.
body: After 1 month use, some serious sensors are missing which will make google maps almost useless on the phone. Camera quality is good only for day time that too depends on mood of the camera. Sluggish phone you can see phone saving photo even after quiting the camera app. Serious processor problems. I bought 6/128 variant and felt sorry for whoever bought 4 gig version. Good for minimal users and for saving tonns of photos via apps but not from the phone's camera. BGIM was surprisingly good on the phone thanks to its large screen. Also good for online classes and OTT viewers.

title: Budget phone for 5g but speaker quality is bad...Phone vibrates if u play some song.
body: If one wants to buy a budget 5g phone Made in India, it is the one below 15000 rupees.Bad cameraBad speaker. Phone practically vibrates if one plays a song...I think speaker's location should be changed in Samsung mobiles..

title: They mentioned that their is a headphone with phone but there is no headphone with mobile phone
body: After using more than 6 months ...I can give the batter review....in this phone I faces sound issues... it's not good on sound basicsAnd if we  come to calling from this mobile ...it's not good sometime the sound is not auditable even you can't hear other person voice and calling voice

title: Wring the review after 6months of usage. Poor performance.
body: Wring the review after 6 months of usage. The phone is good if you are a normal user but if you are a gamer and want a high end permormance then don't go for it. For normal day to day usage its good. The phone is good for budget only. I am a first time samsung user previously used lenovo and motorola brands but after using samsung I will again switch to my previous brands that are far better in terms of performance than this. But samsung has its premium phones also at higher range that may be good but not sure about that.

title: If you're not a selfie person I would recommend this.
body: In this price range for the moment one of the best deals. 6000mAh battery really does the job. Fingerprint reader is sensitive but if you using mobile with cover it becomes difficult due to its position. Camera not great not terrible. Touch sensitivity is not that great sometimes it slides when I want to open an app but not that major problem. If you want something with high battery and RAM and storage this is the mobile.

title: Touch is not working properly.
body: I have only given low rating in this 2 parameters just because of touch of this phone is not working properly. Video or photo is also not telling all the truth. Physical verification is required, kindly change my mobile, I require same product. Also the person who will visit tomorrow to check my mobile , didn't connect with me till now. facing lot of difficulty by purchasing this phone, Amazon is big brand need some urgent solution.

title: Apps not supported
body: Lot of apps are not compatible. I am surprised. I know the phone is cheaper and the expectations should be accordingly but I never thought that it will have restrictions on the app's. We'll if u really want to know which app I'm talking about, it's Insta 360. I have a camera and I want to use it but connecting it to my phone but the app doesn't support .Fingerprint doens't work properly. Need to try couple of times to make it work.

title: Worst Phone i have purchased
body: I have made worst purchase of my life by buying this phone through amazon!! Its screen doesn't  respond to my lock screen password & even some times does allow to enter full screen lock password. Please think twice/enquire yourself before buying  this phone. In fact don't buy this phone. I had made a mistake & purchased this phone.

title: Dam waste product, i lost 13,499 Rs by choosing this phone
body: Please do not buy this phone because Samsung Galaxy M12 phone generating too much heat with this I can not operate the phone in normal condition. I kept the order in return and the authorized technician came and he decided, the is phone working normal but the compliant was too much heat generates when it's in the handset, in this case, how I could not take calls and operate the mobile. there is no return policy and only replacement but that also not happened. I was very much disappointed with amazon's service and I lost 13499/- and my requirement not fulfilled.

title: Worst Mobile - bad display, processor, camera and heavy
body: Waste productits very heavy cant hold for 5 mins6GB ram cant even play fruit ninja gamewaste camera6years old just HD display.Samsung bloatwareswhat would i say be best apart from battery,returned.!

title: Not  a phone that I would recommend
body: Quite disappointed with the phone. Recently bought.The camera is mediocre. It lacks night mode and the picture quality is average. Also Colours are not true to colour. Will not recommend this phone. And no glass protection provided for the screen.

title: I an not happy.
body: The phone I ordered was a Samsung Galaxy M12 manufactured by Samsung Electronics India, as REPUBLIC DAY OFFER, but the one supplied was manufactured by UIL Electronics. I wonder how Amazon could arrange a phone (manufactured by an unauthorised company) at the original quoted price.  Amazon will thus lose its credibility by cheating its customers. Since I needed the phone urgently for online classes of my children, I retained and not returned.

title: Don't buy
body: Camera quality and performance too bad plz don't buy samsung m12

title: For a normal user, this is the best option.
body: One UI 3.1 and 90hz display makes the user experience heavenly. It has a 8nm processor and really power efficient. Without compromising in the perfomance it gives me more than 2 days of battery life. Camera is decent and the colour reproduction is very good.No hanging or heating problems.It can run high end games in low to medium settings as well but I won't recommend this for gaming purpose.Lot's of features included with the One UI 3.1 core which I liked the most. Overally a great phone for Normal users 👌

title: Poor network
body: Every thing is OK for this phone, but the network sucks, suddenly 4G connection goes down, I have to change some network settings auto to manual or vice versa, it works for next 5-10minutes. Again network goes down.

title: A budget friendly MONSTER!!!!!!!!!!!
body: I ordered it on 2nd of may and got it on 5th of may. I am pretty much with which which the phone comes. This phone has really exceeded a lot of expectations regarding the features that its loaded with. But the only thing with which  I am disappointed with is its size🤔, its quiet "fat"😅to say. But really.... I am astonished with its battery backup. It's a huge for phones in this price range. It comes with 6000mah battery which I felt, a #monster precisely😳. The camera....OMG!!!!!its just too good. It comes with 84mp quad camera . It has a 10x zoom, which is super clear. The fingerprint reader is mounted on the side,down the volume button. It's too awesome. It  senses the print, even on a thin plastic sheet is placed on it. Other than all this , to say, it a great budget friendly and a must buy on the other hand. It should be in one's list , if he/she is looking for the #monster in 10k bracket💯👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼

title: Pathetic technician support
body: Faulty product... Touch not working it gets unreaponsive multiple times...Technician only called instead of doing visit and didn't even done the complete inspection with inspect app... And asked to me to inform the customer care team that visit was done . Also assured that replacement will be done. In the evening closed the query stating no issue was found in phone .  Thats really pathetic ...deifinitely m going to post on social media and ceo

title: Weak point
body: The weak point is camera both side is really not so good an average quality of camera but Okey!Second one is charging speed is tooo slow 15 W 😂 about 3 hours + take to full up!But I brought for my uncle so I think this was the best smartphone for him..Under 10k superb smartphone.(Grate indian festival sale offer)

title: A Non Gamers perfect Buy!!
body: I bought this phone for my mother as a secondary phone.Gamingbwas our of question, needed good battery life and goo calling support.Pros -Battery Life is amazing, the phone never heats up. No matter what.It's a sub par processor. But does the normal job. Don't play or install any games on this. Use it for calls, media.One UI is clean. But make sure to delete all the junk apps and disable swing seevices.90Hz is actually visibleCamera bump is non existentThere is WiFi calling, unlime a lot of people suggest.ConsHeavy and thick phone.Stutters when you give it some intense job.No 5GHz WiFiColours aren't the best at this price. Display could have been much better. But won't notice Unless you compare it side by side.For 10k it's a good buy for a light user.If you're a heavy user. Go for Poco M3 or Redmi Note 10 or Micromax In1 if ur budget is 10k.

title: Phone touch and slowness
body: When i started using the phone its touch was not working properly. Sometime i had to touch some option multiple times still it wont work. Note i just started to use so there were not much apps installed. Amazon replaced the phone within a week but the replacement phone had other issue. Although touch was working okay but it was very slow, hanging and heating up. Again this was right after i started using phone after unboxing.Finally i asked for refund second time and Amazon did great to refund me. So 1* for phone but 4.5* for Amazon service. Thanks

title: A value for money device
body: Everything is good except sound output & front camera. The sound output is not loud enough in full volume and pic quality is not good with the front camera. The phone is a bit bulky but stutrdy.

title: Don't fall for the price. Lot to look into details
body: It does not come with back cover, screen guard, sim slot pin.Charger wire is very small.Display is averageOppo & Vivo displays are far better comparativelySoftware is bit laggy and not so ease of use.Software features are not great

title: The Best In The Market
body: I have been using Samsung Galaxy M series for over 2 years.  Never had any reason to complain.  You get possibly everything you look for in a mobile phone at an affordable price.  Plus the much needed durability.

title: Good for mobile savvy and general users ,not addicted to games only
body: Nothing  found against except it is  a little bulky ,and plastic on back is ordinary ,but it is budget phone and can not be compared with S21 or I phone .It is good for above ordinary use with occasional gaming, Battery easily last for more than two days,I can say you get more than you pay photo. In day light is very good ,uploaded photo is in low light at around 6 pmMovies on Netflix were enjoyable with good sound and colour

title: Monster 3 day battery
body: Bought it for my mother, its a good phone with monster battery backupPros:Battery 6000 mahAndroid 1190 hertz display8 nm processorRear camera 48mp sony imx sensorDisplayCall quality4 years ota update supportNo lag issueCons:Speaker is not great it gest louder but too shrillProtection cover not included in the box8MP average front cameraPs its a good phone best phone to gift your loved ones

title: Solid overall performer
body: The fingerprint reader is placed at an ideal location and works without fail. The battery life is really good even though it takes a long time to charge so in all good. camera quality of the primary camera is good for everyday use. The design of the phone is such that it does not wobble and there are no protruding camera. The built quality feels solid. No fingerprint smudges.I have experienced some jitters but nothing to complain about. Calling over WiFi facility works very good and the earpiece quality is decent. No issues with proximity sensor. Though it lacks the bells and whistles of its competitors, it does well. There is nothing extraordinary to write about, but it is actually good as there are nothing extremely negative to write about. Buy it and it will work as its supposed to. Also trusting on Samsung brand name for data privacy.

title: My old phone is better than this
body: My old phone is very old and i purchased it in 2017 and it hangs less than this phone its camera quality is not good its battery life is ok but its performance is worst i cant play game it lags so much.

title: Not up to the mark
body: I have been using samsung mobiles ,different models for a long time.This one,side key I have to press 3,4 times to switch on mobile when I purchased it.Difficult to take screenshots too..Within 3 months side key is not at all working and mobile got switched off.Such an unfortunate experience as I am a Samsung user for a long time.I couldn't check the side key as it is online purchase and for the initial period I thought may be because I am not familiar with new mobile and the product's fault.So I couldn't return it too..

title: Avarage budjet phone.
body: After four month i m writing this review. After four month my phone power button is not work. Then i bring service center they replaced the button now is working i don't know how long it will be work. Other function are good. Sometimes cellurar net work problem also i faced.. Samsung its very budjet phone

title: Affordable, Battery lasting, and a Camera Gem!
body: Pros:Great Battery Life. Upto 2 days minimum.Great Camera.Superior smoothness in usability4GB RAM for multitasking.Built and feel of the phone.I use the phone primarily for clicking product photos for my website, and business calls. On a personal level, a powerful battery and camera saves me time and gives me a hassle free experience.  I use all sorts of video and image editing apps that requires a lot of ram usage and the phone has never crashed so far. Also does well for gaming. Hard core gaming may be sluggish. But for the price perspective, this phone is all you ever need.Cons:Face Detection  for unlocking — takes atleast 3 seconds to react. The fingerprint sensor is comparatively faster. But both is a little annoying at times.

title: After using phone for a Year
body: For price  5/5For battery life  4.5/5For performance  4/5For storage  4.5/5For Camera  4/5But for Sound  3/5Now u know it's good phone in this budgetI bought this in 10,000 /-Apart from sound range... it's well to do phone

title: Good battery life but not good for reading
body: Good phone good battery life good for everyday use the only problem I see is even when you turn on the eye comforter your eyes pain I have sensitive eyes and I can't use bright screens ! Display of my old Redmi is better than this in all other areas this is better than the Redmi budget phone

title: Heavily built. Overpriced for this below mid range smartphone.
body: Mobile weighs heavy. And it's below mid-range segment . More over over priced while purchasing. Not recommended at all.. camera performance genuinely below average. Best thing is only it has wide L1 Certification. They would have gone for atleast for super Amoled screenNot worth for money...

title: Internet Problem (Value for money)
body: There is only 1 problem I observed that  the internet is not working properly. Videos are running intermittently even on high speed Wi-Fi. Web pages also does not load as expected.Other than that working fine and all the expected feature in this range. Its fingerprint sensor in power button.

title: After 1 week of use
body: This product is fantastic for this price! I tested the Battery life and for a heavy user, it can easily last you and day or a day and a half. And for a light user, it can last you 2 - 3 days! Also, the cameras are decent, the front camera is ok in low light or in some cases indoor lighting, but the front camera is pretty good! I have seen phones with these exact same features for double the price! The screen is respectable it's not pixely, but it's not the best ofc. The screen is pretty smooth, its 90hz is really nice and smooth. Gaming on this phone is ok. I mean like I told you the battery can last you a long time, and the same thing applies to gaming now ofc the battery will run out faster but not significantly faster. Playing the actual game its self is decent only the VERY high-powered games is a bit laggy on this phone but most of the games work smoothly. I would give this phone a 4 star just because the front camera could have been better.

title: Worst phone to buy
body: I brought this product 2 months before (May 2022) and trust me this mobile is so worst thst you will feel that you should throw this away in drain or sewer nearby. Company has cheated me and in India we dont have proper laws to complsint against these private organizations. If you value your money please dont but this phone or you can contact me if you want my samsung m12 for free .

title: Best Smart phone in Economy price
body: After doing a lot of research I have chosen this phone which is one of the top branded. You can get in good price with awesome Specs. Most of the new Companies will give you a different and huge configurations. But they never meet the expectations. ... But Samsung is the one in best they will give good quality hardware and with awesome specs as well.

title: Phone is decent but it's camera and processor is way bad
body: Pro's1 battery life stands full day2 90hz display3 back camera is goodCons1 very poor front camera2 hangs sometime3 bad processor can't handle heavy game4 slow charging5 no features in camera , even only 3 feature in pro mode6 no gyroscope , bad for gyro playerConclusionPhone is good for normal user , gamers stay away from this one it's really bad in gaming experience and also hangs sometimesDon't buy this one go for another one in this range

title: Super one..
body: If you are looking mobile at this rate ....the best choice is this m12....really loved its features..prons:1)battery life 6000mah it would come for 1 1/2 day with average use2)display was really amazing really loved this huge display..colour,sound was simple good3)camera are nice i took some good shots from them4)it comes with nice os operator +andriod 11.0 v is good in it..5)Soft touch and fringer print and face detection sensor also works well.cons:1)The processor can be better...this processor is good for average usage and average graphics games2)The weight is some what more....finally good phone for this cost compared to all other phone at this range...

title: BELOW STANDARD SMELL

title: Samsung M12
body: Samsung’s M12 of a 90Hz screen is a budget phone. the giant 6,000mAh battery and clean UI make up for it to some extent, making the Galaxy M12 a decent buy.The Galaxy M12 feels rigid and offers a firm construction. There is no fingerprint sensor on the back with Samsung choosing instead to integrate it with the power button.good to see Samsung using a USB Type-C port for its affordable devices, and that is present at the bottom alongside the 3.5mm headphone jack and speaker grille. he display on the Galaxy M12 is a 6.5-inch HD+ (720 x 1,600) TFT panel that has a 90Hz adaptive refresh rate. In its price range, the Galaxy M12 appears to be the only phone with a high refresh rate. the display is a standard panel with healthy peak brightness, controlled saturation levels, and minimal colour shift when viewed at an angle. A quad-camera system is present on the Galaxy M12 which comprises a 48MP primary sensor with an f/2.0 aperture, a 5MP secondary ultra-wide lens with a massive 123-degree field of view, a 2MP depth, and a 2MP macro sensor. As far as budget phones go, the Galaxy M12 does a decent job of capturing details  At night, the camera is a bit inconsistent and a slight shake can induce blurriness in the shots. I keep my expectations about low-light photography in check from a lot of budget phones, but the M12 is above average and good. Lastly, you get a beefy 6,000mAh battery that is very likely going to last you two days on moderate usage.

title: Best for normal use
body: This mobile is best for normal use. If you use more apps then go for 6gb ram bcoz more apps are going to lack this phone. I have around 28 external apps which I use on daily basis,but my mobile is lacking,so I have to delete some apps for smoothing.
