body: This is the best smartphone Samsung has launched in this segment, I received it @12.5k with card offers, and its build quality is Ok, you will get the best features in this range, the camera is gooe, its very smooth in day to day normal use.It has a 6000mAh battery, which almost lasts for around 13-14Hrs in my case. It takes some time in charging, but if we see the battery size, it's normal.cons: you cant use s secure app to secure your  apps and folder, as its not compatible with this phone, and Samsung has compromised in many features.If you dont play heavy games, you can go with this.

title: 3rd class phone, this devices hangs a lot even after having 6 gb of ram
body: and the most imp thing when u give it in service the just take money and do nothing I m fed up of this phone, now this phone is a liability on me the camera quality is not good at all for close range it's ok but for distance it's 3rd classI suggest u guys never buy this phone.

title: Poor quality.
body: All the specifications mentioned for this item are wrong.Camera output seems like 8 MPFront camera is like 2 MPDisplay shows poor color. Feels like using low cost phone.Not recommended at all.

title: Not a good phone as expected
body: I bought this phone before 2 months, Camera is very poor 48 MP it is poorer than 13 MP.I wanted to login my company email, before that device needs to be enrolled with Microsoft Intune company portal. The company portal will only allow when Device encryption feature will be available in phone, but it does not have.This is very important hardware features that secure your phone,s data. So this phone is use less for me to configure outlook.So Guys..Be aware if you are buying any phone and which phone's price is falling day by day...

title: Screen resolution is not at all good.
body: I bought this considering 48 mp camera and good batery backup but when i used it to zoom my screen when attending meetings, its zoom picture quality is worse. You cant read properly. Also being 48mp camera, it doesnt looks like 48mp. I will not suggest anyone to buy this m12. Better go with other options.

title: best phone, inalmost every way.
body: The camera is very excellent, better than every single phone in this budget and even higher.Battery is best!!!!!, its battery is THE BEST BATTERY, it works for 3 to 4 days - even though i use it for big tasks like running games and etc.Screen is as good as Iphone's, screen works very fast, refresh rate is V GOOD.never lagged, very good proccessor.

title: Don't order phones from Amazon, worse service
body: I ordered a phone Samsung Galaxy M12 phone. After installing sim, phone is very slow and getting hang. When I tried to return, a technician came from Amazon side and could not resolved anything and said you should not buy Phone online and I'll update feedback online. I am not getting any response from Amazon side. Feeling cheated.

title: Lightly stuck the phone
body: The fingerprint sensor is on mode button. it is not comfortable. Lightly stuck the back touch button. Camera quality is not in 48 pixel and front not good.It is over the look not good and fully not bad. But I am not satisfied the amount of worth

title: Phone is good for daily use but i speed of the internet  is worst on the device
body: I buy my first ever & may be last Samsung Phone because mobile phone is good for daily use only the issue which I was noticed when I trying to connect internet  & opened mobile hotspot & connected my laptop or other device  the speed of internet showing below 100 kb/sec it’s very worst & even I connected my same laptop & other devices with another mobile and same network it’s showing speed above  500kb/sec the thing is only disappointed me.

title: Camera quality is very poor and disgusting..
body: I am using this phone since 5 months and overall performance is good but camera is not like 48 mega pixels..  when you take a picture, the picture is cracked.. not clear visible..Battery life is very good.. 2 day backups in normal use.. and day in gaming use..

title: Received defective mobile literally very much disappointed from amazon services
body: Received defective mobile literally very much disappointed from amazon services, hope amazon has not thoroughly verified and onboarded seller, frustrated with return policies , as spoke with the CC team have to visit to Samsung services center and a get a job sheet or denial letter  from them to get replacement , one thing i cant understand why the hell i have to invest my time to get things done , beware of online shopping , worst ever experience, how come we trust big giants like amazon

title: A budget Phone with decent specs.
body: I am writting this review after using the phone for few hours. This is budget phone with decent specs.Pros;Latest Android 11Side fingerprint scanner with power button90Hz Screen6000Mah BatteryCons;Basic design and plastic bodyBasic cameraOver all it gives value for our money and satisfied with the performance.

title: Best Budget Segment Device for Samsung Lovers
body: I got this as gift for my parents. Quality of this product is uncompromised, that doesn't surprise me cuz its Samsung.  What stood out in these few days in the battery life, it compliments their usage very well. Value for money deal for sure.

title: Okay.. not great.
body: The touch is bad. The mobile is heavy. Battery is good. Also, fast charge. Camera is good outdoors. But, low light and indoor quality is not great. Overall, not bad. Okay for regular use. Not for photography or playing games

title: Hang and display was extremely worst
body: After using 2 months my Samsung M12 phone stop working without falling down and without any kind misshappeningI put my phone in almirah in morning then i went to school after returning from school i saw my phone’s display is not working …Saste ke chakkar me ye phone mt lena … bahut pachtaoge

title: Charger head is not working
body: Dear Help desk,This is Joel Deepak, I ordered Samsung Galaxy M12 mobile on 10th April 2021. The product was shipped on 12th April 2021. I received after 3- 5 days. Mobile is 1 year warranty and In box accessories is 6 months warranty.My mobile working fabulous. But, My charger head is not working.I cannot raise any complaint against that fault. That's why I posted here in review section.Please do the needful to replace or service my charger.- Joel Deepak J

title: A mediocre Made in India phone
body: I have been using this phone for last 2 weeks. I will start with the likes-Like:1. Made in india2. Looks decent3. Good battery lifeDislike:1. Irrespective of 6 GB RAM the phone feels slow with day to day usage. Even the basic contact search is slow.2. The phone is super heavy and thick.3. No dual band wifi. That means you are stuck with slow 2.4 GHz wifi.

title: Horrible Camera
body: Very Horrible Camera , was totally disappointed with the camera , very poor camera and bad service by Amazon. which made my life miserable in exchanging this product. I have bought many mobiles earlier and now i will not buy from this site as exchange replacement is very difficult.

title: Nice phn at this price...!!
body: Overall the mobile is great at this price, although screen is not as bright & speaker is just above average, not as loud as required. battery is very good and goes on for  more than one and half day easily..., camera is good and you can click some very good and bright photos. Overall good option in this price range ( best feature is it has 6gb ram, 128 gb internal memory at this price.)

title: Samsung M31 worst display, never buy this phone
body: In almost one year, 3 times display screen has color leak issue (without any handset fall/physical damage) which company never covers under warranty. 3 times paid from my pocket Rs.4800 each time to rectify the issue. Highly disappointed with company poor development policy. Planned to never buy samsung products in future.

title: Value for money Mobile
body: I am using this for more than a month as of now ....This is a very good Product at the price which Samsung is selling. It says it is MADE IN INDIA.I really like the Battery Backup for me it is lasting for more than 30 hours with moderate uses. Like ( Youtube ,  calling and Hotspot uses)COns : -It is Bulking and feels heavy in pocketFinger print scanner is not up to the mark .. some times it is unable to unlock .

title: Don't go for exchange trick.
body: Don't go for exchenge, it's a trip. They are expecting a brand new device which you could exchange. The intention of the Amazon delivery boy is like to found anything wrong in device and the price will deduct 70% to 80% from its original exchange ammount even it is well running. The attitude of the Amazon delivery boy is too rough and tough. It's my second horrible experience from Amazon end.

title: Worst ever from Samsung
body: Touch is extremely bad and is irritating as it doesn’t recognize and hangs up.Have to lock and unlock several times to get other apps working.When phone is locked, despite double / triple tapping the screen, it doesn’t light up or show option to unlock, we have to press the side button yo light the screen which is more frustrating.Extremely slow even though it’s 4 gb ram

title: Amazon hides that this phone does not support 5Ghz wifi.
body: Samsung hides the fact that this phone doesn't support 5Ghz wifi. The camera quality is terrible.My product arrived 1 hr ago and I am writing this review after setting up the device. The phone hangs and crashes when nothing other the default apps are present in the phone. Save yourselves the trouble and don't buy this.

title: Pathetic Product from Samsung
body: I had bought this phone for my mom and it had severe call quality issues from the beginning and within 6 months of using it the fingerprint stopped working. I checked with the service centre and they told me that the phone had liquid damage although it never had contact with water or rain. Stay away from this garbage.

title: Budget phone from Samsung
body: Back to Samsung again after 8 years.Advantages-good handybudget good featuresbest UI user friendly..phone security system is good.Disadvantages -Samsung max app popup on lock screen while charging & Samsung pay mini app. We unable to UninstallFront and rear camera's are not good as expected 48mega pixel,charger cable length is very short compared to other brands.

title: Not worth of money
body: 13 to 14 k you will get better than this Samsung m12. The day I started use, phone started hanging,I should honestly give the reviewGo for other phone it doesn't give 6000mah woser than my old Lenovo phone 3500mah.Camera is average they give lots number of MP but not suited at all , only good thing is finger print senso even that too I doubt about it how long days I can have without problem.Finally I m not satisfied with M12, 6GB Ram phone is not working as the attractive description given below the list. Hopeless product

title: Please do not buy this mobile like how I wasted my hard earned money
body: Please do not buy this mobile like how I wasted my hard earned money you also Please do not waste your money camera not good mobile starting to hang for 5 min after buy it for nearly 5 months from now and I have never dropped it down even a single time I have protected and cared for it very much at the end it is a waste to buy Samsung M12

title: most pathetic purchase ecer
body: i feel like cheated by amazon and samsung its not even a month and my phone stopped working with no reason this was not expected and visited to samsung centre as well but they were saying that only non warranty sets are getting fixed during this lockdown period then i asked them to fixed my set out of warranty (i was ready to pay as well) then they said that your mobile display is need to be change and there is no display available in India for my phone and from that day i am not having any smartphone as i am saving money and trying to bear this pain n loss.amazon hats off to u cheaters.

title: Touchscreen issues, Display issues, Bad Hardware and Delay in Mobile.
body: Touchscreen issues, Display issues, Bad Hardware and Delay in Mobile. When brough mobile normal apps looks finme still slow display but few apps like phone pe etc these keys are not matching and responses are slow overal display issues and touchscreen issues are there . unfortunately i installed phone pe and found this issue after return window and now not sure what needs to be done very bad display and touchscreen not worth to buy this mobile. I tried all updates etc within 7/8 days have issues .

title: Just another smartphone under 10k. Nothing special.
body: Amazing battery life. Discharge is only 1% for overnight.Display can be much better. Expected a better display from samsung. Vivo and oppo have a better display interms of brightness and pixel density.Finger print on power button is good and quick.Plastic back is kind of disappointing.Overall performance is ok but not what the ADS on amazon show you.

title: It still glitchy and not that good , I hated using the phone
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 This phone display is weakReally week ...it falls one time ...and there it breaks ...now I don't believe in Samsung's quality at all ...it is worse than a Chinese phone ..

title: Great buy at the price
body: We have recently purchased two of these phones, one by my brother and another for my father. I do not think there is a better phone than this for the price. Battery life and camera quality are standout features. I wholeheartedly recommend this phone to anyone planning to buy a new phone in this price range.

title: Awesome monster
body: Review after 20 days use,Phones battery life is awesomeCan last all day, I charge once in couple of days,Wi fi calling working perfectly fineFingerprint and face unlock is fast enough,Overall it's Good phone in this price range

title: It seems Samsung  has delivered  what they have been promoting in Galaxy M12
body: I got this phone for my second contact number as my primary handset  battery  runs out very fast and I usually have very long days. But this phone's battery  really  amazed me . It's only 3.5 days I am using  but I can tell you that the battery  backup  is really  good . My first full charge ran for full 3 days with moderate usage. Looks good . UI is simple with Android 11.  Weight and grip is good . Screen is responsive . Haven't faced a real show stopper as of yet . Initial opinion is full value for money for those who are looking for descent  phone with a very good battery  life.

title: Good phone
body: The phone is very goodBattery life is goodCamera is very goodTechnology is goodSamsung service is good for this good phoneOverall it a nice phone  but display quality is very poor  so this phone is good for in its price list.

title: Slow phone even with 6gb ram.
body: Phone is slow even with 6gb ram.Camera quality is okBattery good quality.Fingerprint scanner is very bad. 50percent times wont detect.Brightness is ok.Must apply screenguard. Otherwise feels dull.Basic budget phone. Nothing special.I got the 6gb 128gb for 11.5k so its ok

title: Slow touch response and hangs frequently
body: I bought a new phone from Amazn and right from the time of setting up, the touch of the phone becomes unresponsive frequently. This is happening more on the lower side of screen - the back button and home button. Requires more than one touch to go to home page.Also there is a lag after touch - it takes some time before the screen appears. Poor quality

title: Little bit more expecting from Samsung
body: Good battery and good fingerrint  sensor It's a average mobile almost important sensor are missing.Camera performance average actually i expected more quality from samsungDisplay also average..Storage 128GB and battery 🔋 6000 mah amazing...Also I'm  facing some heating issue when I am using mobile data on BSNL and while charging time💥💥💥.....

title: Not buy
body: I hope it is not a new one. It is renewed product. After  5 months  it's  performance is not good.  Phone is not running  smoothly and stuck some  times.  Screen apps also changes without  operating. Weight is high.

title: Review of this phone after using 2-3 months
body: Everything is very good, specially display is very strong. Only two problems I am facing; 1. When I read some contents on a site for one or two hour, it often hangs. 2. When I use any UPI ID like GPay, Phone Pay or Bhim UPI, I don't face any problem when I enter the app first time by entering the passcode, but when I enter my passcode second time for the transaction, the numbers of keypad in blue colour, appear partially. These issues must be resolved.

title: An "also ran" phone.
body: Nothing extra ordinary about this phone. There are much better options in this price range.The battery is definitely good, and lasts more than a full day.However on the down side, the phone is very heavy, camera is ordinary and it feels sluggish to use.

title: Battery was super...
body: Everything is good, battery backup was fantastic,but few problems need to fix. one is more weight, and while using phone pay, Google pay, key pad was showing broken numbers... I don't understand why it is happening.Remaining all are good and best phone in thus price range...

title: Excellent product within this price range. Battery back up is unimaginable .
body: Samsung Galaxy M12 is an excellent handset. I am writing this review after of using the mobile for three weeks. The battery back up is unimaginable . Once it gets fully charged it runs for around 40 hours with frequent usage of internet. This set consists every unique feature that Samsung offers. The camera is good but not excellent. Nevertheless the sound of loudspeaker is little down. That is to say if the volume is not highest then it becomes a bit hard to listen.To conclude i would say that the configuration which this handset consists within this price range is just beyond imagination. This is an excellent handset Samsung launched.

title: Worst phone
body: Please don't buy this...The data conctivity was really terrible...And I tried changing Sim card to my old phone..In old ph the data was connecting good and speed also good....And while I am in voice call, when I turn on the speaker only the other can hear my voice if I off speaker, they are unable hear my voice.Worest product!!!😢😢😢Please don't go with this!!!No screen recorder, no shortcut yo screenshot, but unwanted apps will download without our permission from galaxy store.Back camera is also not up to the mark!!!Very very bad experience!!!

title: Super slow and bloated software
body: Overall phone has too many bloated apps and the interface is super slow. Brand new phone seems like 5 year old phone. Battery is decent but doesn't give more than a day even without any work. I bought this phone for mom, after 4 months I'm buying a new phone her.

title: not even for a single star
body: Samsung is simply cheating customers by booming the non credible features , the given features are just a paper tiger ( only for advertising ) don't misunderstand it will perform. it is just a budget phone nothing rather thanDon't think against the given features by Samsung . if you need a budget phone , can buy it else if you want a performance phone please Don'tOnly battery is good

title: Phone quality is good.
body: Camera is okay not very good.Side button for finger print is not suitable when put inside a cover.As  the cover need to be opened everytime to place it on finger print reader.On an average the phone is working well.

title: M12 needs improvement otherwise J3 pro with 2 GB RAM was much better around 6000 price
body: Pl improve quality of this phone as after purchasing this phone people will not purchase Samsung Phone again.Phone is good for initial purchaser as speed is not upto mark. 4 GB RAM is not looking strenghting phone working. Also speaker sound is very bad as compare to Samsung other phone.

title: Absolute waste of resourses.
body: Regretful encounter wth this M12 order , dated 14 th Aug '21.Gifted this product to my sister, it's been just 3 mths today. Display not working, unable to start n poor battery performance.Showed at Samsung gallery for review they said mother board needs to b changed whc will cost 8 k.Please do justice to the lil investments we make around.Kindly oblige, acknowledge n respondNeed full replacement to consider.Team Amazon n collabs.

title: Worst front camera quality
body: Please dont buy if u r expecting good camera quality in this phone...i mean its below below below average...not at all good...Overall phone is good in this range but expected a lot better from samsung.. this mobile should be sold in 7k not more than that...

title: Monster
body: Battery backup super,Camera quality well... But the macro option worst... Selfi just low quality..Processing speed good...some specification are like to 6000rs mobile phone...Face lock, fingerprint lock are very quickly working...Overall it is monster...

title: Good mobile phone in this range
body: Good mobile, But sorry to inform you that at the time of the order I thought that the model is F12, but the picture of the mobile is same as M12.  That was a mistake to understand about model. So please ignore the privious review & forgive me.

title: Worst experience of smartphone
body: Writing this review after 3 months of usage. I bought this for my mom. She is not a heavy user. Only handful of apps installed. Touchscreen becomes unresponsive very frequently. Imagine you are trying to type something or click on some message to read it and then you ha e to press 10 times for it to work. Never expected samsung to make such cheap quality smartphone.

title: Does not support higher WiFi band width 5.0 Ghz, so users won't get higher Wifi speed
body: There is no option for WIFI 5.0 Ghz in this phone. Now-a-days almost all of us have dual band Wifi router in our homes/offices. But this phone will only work with lower speed and lower bandwidth 2.4 Ghz. It cannot detect the higher bandwidth 5.0 Ghz, so you won't get higher Wifi speed

title: Good phone in this price range . Better than Chinese phones
body: Nice product from samsung . I purchased it a few weeks back from Amazon with nice offer and exchange offer . Phone is great for daily routine task . I am using banking with Knox security and never felt any disappointments regarding this.It is not for gaming purpose . It's a value for  money ,good battery life , nice big screen , moderate camera for daily purpose.  Overall it's 5 out of 5 from my side.I wold like to say thanks to Amazon to give a reliable service .

title: WORST CAMERA CLARITY AND WORST MOBILE PERFORMANCE.
body: Samsung M12.  Camera clarity is absolutely worst and bad normal Camera phone is better than  ,And  mobile is  getting over heated  badly  in all times when Iĺ operate, over all Samsung M12 performance is not good.i purchased this mobile for camera purpose. I just blindly trusted Amazon before buying Samsung M12, now in not happy with this.One of "Best Worst mobile" in Samsung series.Amazon thought me very  good lesson, purchasing mobile from them, never ever I won't purchase anything in Amazon , By these Amazon heir trusted  and confidence.  🙏🙏🙏 Thanq.

title: Great brand. Great buy
body: Good quality from a very reputed time tested brand. Purchased inAmazon sale. Got a bargain. Add to this - credit card discount, and interest free EMI.Thank you Amazon.  Thank you Samsung.

title: Very Good For Normal Users
body: The Phone is best for middle range buyers,Negative in phone means 1000/2000 price has to reduce because of their given features .And remaining over is fine with mid rangeFingerprint is fastBattery is very goodCamera back is okay but front 8mp is some what good (because of this price has to reduce)Processor is not good for gamers.,This phone is very good to who use very less .,or normal users .  Like only calls msgs and social networks chatting.If you want camera good means don't buy this phone.Screen resolution is less due to that HD videos were not in original some what blur or like below HD.

title: Worth evey penny, good budget phone
body: I like the focus mode, that helps to keep apps that are needed active to avoid unwanted notifications to distract ones work. Dark mode and eye protection is also good feature that protects eye. Inbuilt Smart mode helps detect the fraud/spam calls without any external app installation. Camera quality is good with good zoom capability. Phone is light and slim with good responsive touch sensor. Overall Phone is very good for my purchase budgetof Rs9500.

title: Unhappy
body: I have received the product today but as mentioned box in the details while purchasing in the box available hand set,manual, ejection pin,adopter. In the box only I have received hand set and adopter, not received the manual and ejection pin. Without ejection pin how should I put my SIM card in my mobile. I am very unhappy with that. Still I am not checking the other details in the phone. I am rated 1 star out of 5 bcoz of above issue. First impression is best impression here I am not seen very in happy.

title: The brand caring for all ysers
body: This is my solid rankingafter using Galaxy M12 for a fortnight.Ovweall performance is quite good and comfortable.It would be better if atleast 25 w charger is provided with a big battery.Some critics on you tube had informed " 4 to 5 problems" in all(?) M series phones but I have found none of them in this product although it is of very reasonable price.I am 85 today and yet enjoy my ph. Without any difficulty.SAMSUNG has never any excuse|!

title: Good phone for basic usage
body: It is a good phone if usage is limited to calls, whatsapp and YouTube.. battery life is excellent.. actually lasts for 2 days.. camera qualityis reasonable..Fingerprint reader is in the power button, which takes time to get used to.. haven't tried any gaming apps

title: It doesn't have dual band wifi
body: What the Samsung India it doesn't have basic dual band wifi in this price range even smartphone around 8 thousand in the market have dual band wifi these days. This is ridiculous that you guys haven't even mentioned this on the product description page. It shows your insecurity and disloyalty against your customers. This was not expected from samsung ridiculous.

title: Overlall Good Phone in This budget  range against Chinese phones 👍
body: The Phone is Nice, Mai 3 din se use kr rha hun ye phone aur ye phone thik thak kaam kr rha hai Maine heavy games  bhi khele isme high graphics  me wo bhi thik chale, overl all mai agar dekhun to iss range me ye phone samsung ka hote huve bhi Chinesebrand ko iss budget me takkar deta hai aur  android  11 ka experience  bhi dekhne ko mil rha hai jo ki badhiya lga mujhe.》》But ek cheez mujhe jada disappoint kiya aur wo hai eska 48mp ka camera isme eski quality  aur behtar kr skte the jo ki true 48mp ki tarah pic ki quality  nhi deta Samsung  brand hote huve bhi aisa thik nhi hai.

title: Truly Worth to Buy This Reloaded Monster - Samsung M12
body: Samsung is truly a Monster with 6000 mAh battery with 8 nm processor. 128 GB Internal memory is really good to have along with 6 gb RAM where the games r loading very smoothly. True 48 Mp quad camera is truly wise to capture the photos. The phone is very slim and 90 hz refresh rate is really awesome. 16.55 cm infinity V display is cool. In total this mobile is one of the best to have at this range of prices. Moreover the backside of the phone is having a matte finish which is very good and not slippery.

title: Performs much better than was expected after reading the reviews.
body: Camera quality is good if compared to other phones in this range. Phone feels really fast, thanks to the 90Hz screen and 6gb RAM with a fast processor. I bought in under exchange offer for 10,000 ( 6gb variant ) and I am quite satisfied with my purchase. Go for it if you are tight on a budget yet want a phone with good specs. Much better than similar budget Chinese phones. But note that front camera could have been better, although it is 8mp but still gives grainy images. Phone was delivered in perfectly new condition.

title: Touch, Microphones Issues in 2months of usage.
body: Touch, Microphones Issues in 2months of usage.Low quality.I love samsung flagship phones which have good quality make. But budget phones are so bad. Low quality make.

title: Phone not working
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 I sold a phone last month but there is some problem in this phone, I requested to pickup this phone but didn't pick up. I called to Amazon customer care many times frequently says pick up next three days but vain. So I am disappointed 😞. I didn't phone or money refund.

title: Fully satisfied with the Mobile
body: Buy for My Father & He is Soo Happy..,Better than Chinese Mobiles in the market..., Go for samsung,Overall mobile looks to performance 5/5#Avoide Chinese Mobiles (Realme,mi,Oppo,Vivo,OnePlus,....)

title: Wrost Product, Please  don't but this

title: Best phone with Samsung security and no  blotware. UNLIKE Redmi which is full of blotware
body: This is a great product from Samsung. Really Monster. Battery is huge . Response of phone is very good. Touch is smooth. 90 hz screen give a smooth look on fast changing graphics . Camera of the phone is excellent  in the prize tag. Battery and display deserves 7 stars.

title: Not a great phone
body: Not sure If its a good phone....I have bought it but its not working properly... throwing a lot of errors....many times calls are not going through even with full signal sometimes after call disconnected there is a strange sound which continues to ring and i have to switch off the phone....If anyone has some idea please suggest

title: Battery life Awesome
body: Battery life is very good. Built quality is also very nice. Camera quality also very good. Fingerprint reader work perfectly and also fast. Overall the phone is very good. Value for money. One of the best choice this phone in this price range.

title: Budget mobile
body: Its Samsung branded busget gudget ...camera is so so...little heavy..2000 per month for 6 months...again i will purchase a new one with some good feature..its not having any unique feature. Very simple but dimple...

title: Good phone but cheap plastic. Back panel vibrates on phone.
body: 3 months use review - no voice recording tool, no screen video capture tool, it's usually available on any cheap phone. Samsung says these are available on higher end models, who is a snob?Given 3 stars overall just because of the plastic at the back, during the call it vibrates  cheap plastic casing otherwise phone works fine. Other phones cheaper than this have better casing but then....

title: Worth Money Smartphone
body: Using it from last 8 months, worth it totally 👍 used iPhone earlier and then bought this phone, one thing noticed is battery life, no comparison at all with iPhones, way better than iPhones and many smartphones of this range.Second one is Screen resolution, top quality.Third pro is storage, better than iPhone.Camera is average compared to iPhones and other smartphones so if you want good smartphone with good battery life, storage, screen resolution then must go for this phone. Totally worth it in this criteria

title: Good value for money
body: Got this as a replecement for my samsung M11. The M12 is way better than M11. Better photo quality, better performance and faster performance. I got the blue phone which looks decent as well. I feel it's worth the 13500 I paid for it.

title: Best device under 10k segment from SAMSUNG.
body: Display is HD+ with TFT panel but it doesn't feel like TFT rather it feels IPS LCD HD+ panel! Good move Samsung! But other brands providing IPS LCD FHD+ 90hz in this 12k segment from Other brands! But initially it's good.

title: Good battery backup
body: Good phone for those who use it only for calling and other common use. not suitable for those who wish to take photos as its camera quality is just ok. Good battery backup as it claims

title: Nice product worth buying
body: I ordered this product on 20 July 2021 and immediately it got delivered within a week on 29 July 2021.Mobile camera is good.Battery is betterPerformance and storage is goodOverall it's good mobile for normal android usersThis review is not for  users who play high end games (like ping, free fire etc) in mobile

title: 15k features in 10k amazing...
body: Phone is fabulous and it is worth for those who r looking the budget phone .All features are loaded un customise manner in this phone. One should nit go for 15k range phone of all features are available in 10k..Think wisely...

title: Mic Quality in video is extremely bad.
body: Mic Quality in video is extremely bad. Cannot explain how bad it is... I ordered 2 phones at my home... both of them have this same issue. Samsung needs to address this immediately. I don't want to talk about other features as this is budget phones. But never seen such a bad quality from this or lower price range.

title: Samsung brand
body: Only bought it for the samsung brand value .My nephew was very adamant about it . And he is happy with the phone. And he dropped the phone like 2times already.

title: Average phone at this range
body: Average phone at this range, phone gets hanged while using some basic apps. Battery life is ok doesn't seem like 6000mah which makes phone heavy , camera quality is average. Only best thing  about the phone is its look.All together I feel you can get a better phone at this price

title: Camera quality is so pooooor
body: I don't know why they have mentioned as 48 mega pixel , I am big fan of Samsung.Prior to this mobile I have used Samsung j6 its just 13mega pixel camera quality is just awesome. M12 camera quality is very poooooor.One more issue is Amazon not accepting return until if you receive a defective piece.

title: Battery Backup is awesome. Straight 2 days for only calls.
body: I liked the battery backup of the phone and performance is so far good as it is being used by my parents. BEST phone for parents. Takes 2 hours to go from 0-100%. And please don't buy this phone if you are photogenic or require gaming efficiency

title: Worst Amazon service and samsung product
body: We received mobile on 11 Jan 2022, we raise an issue with the mobile on the same day..The veecare technicians inspected the mobile and found issue with  gprs, slowlesness , touch screen ...They said thy ll replace the mobile, because they don't have any option of refunding it.No refund nor replacement yet ..Our money for more than a week with them ..no proper reponse nor info provided an appI demand Amazon to refund the money

title: ACKO's Screen Protection Plan
body: ACKO's Screen Protection Plan!- When i purchased this mobile for my mother, i got an email from ACKO Team that "Your mobile is now protected by ACKO's Screen Protection Plan!" After a month mobile fell down  from my mom hand unfortunately.  I contacted ACKO team after that, they told me to send my Screenscratch /damage video with details and credited money to repair my phone screen. Really appreciate Amazon and ACKO team on this.

title: This one really affordable and great facilities.
body: I used in and really the feelings was great. It is smooth no hang or down occours. Storage and new camera facility was just good and little bit mora upgarde to the camera needed I think 'Slow motion operation '. Over experience was great. You all have to try it once. For gamers it may little not good as the processor is getting some lapse while using heavy games.My experience was best because with this amount the mobile provides a lot.

title: Raw phone, Processing speed is really low
body: The processing speed is pathetic, even when i didint i stalled most basic applications. Not a Worth product for this price range.

title: Worst Seller, Fake offer
body: I have purchased this phone with 6 months screen replacement, but when I need to use the offer neither amazon or the seller (Savex) it responding, amazon saying to contact seller but seller not responding at all and samsung saying no plan is activated on the phone IMEI. Dont go with this fake offer by the seller

title: Good
body: The phone is very good, the phone's battery is very strong, which gives a battery backup of three to four days, if you only do calling and RAM management is good, fingerprint sensor very fast.Overall quality smartphone.

title: असंतोषजनक
body: इस फोन में कई कमियां है जैसे इसकी नोटिफिकेशन ट्यून बंद करने पर भी नोटिफिकेशन आने पर बजती है।इसको चार्ज़िंग पर लगाने और फोन के चार्ज होने का कोई भी संकेत नहीं मिलता है।नोटिफिकेशन से सम्बंधित प्रकाश संकेत इसमे उपलब्ध नहीं है जिससे स्क्रीन लॉक होने पर नोटिफिकेशन की जानकारी नहीं हो पाती है।भार में भी ये अन्य फोनो से काफी ज्यादा है।कैमरा तो चार चार है पर पिक्चर की गुणवत्ता संतोषजनक नहीं है।वाई फाई की रेंज बहुत ही कम है एक दीवार के बाद डाउनलोड की स्पीड अत्यंत कम हो जाती।

title: Good Mobile within its price range
body: Bought the Samsung M12. Good purchase. Worth the price.Likes:1. Exceptional Battery backup2. Fast processing for Game Play3. Good Display clarity4. Very responsive Biometric sensors, especially Face RecognitionNot so Good Camera clarity especially during night time in artifical light. Also, the speaker sound could have been louder.

title: For slow user it is a good phone
body: Camera ia average, but for decent activity this is really a good buy. Current 6gb varient is available for 10500 after applying offers is a great deal you can definitely buy it. But not for heavy users.

title: Good Mobile in Low budgets , but still have some Issues.
body: Well It's Good Budget Mobile, Display Quality Good , Battery life is long , performance also ok, Even built Quality Are also fabulous.But Camara Quality is Average , Even camera have less option to Capture Images, means this samsung mobile don't have a Slow Motion video, micro camera , HDR etc.So this mobile is Failed in Camera quality.

title: UI Totally waste.
body: Worst UI experience from samsung.1. Basic app lock setting missing.2. Data disconnected while in a call.3. While using Amazon custome care chat keyboard hide the typed content.4. SMS selects the recent caller option missing.5. You can't off the alarm for one particular day. You have to off then on the alarm again.5. Unnecessary samsung apps occupy the space which you not even open in your lifetime.

title: Great user experience
body: Using Samsung smartphone after many years. But have to admit samsung smartphones improved a lot as compared to TouchWiz days. Performance, camera are very good on this device. Battery life excellent. All features functions as intended to be. No bugs in software. User experience is really great. Delighted with this purchase.

title: it is good👍👍🏻
body: Good in this segment because of more RAM & storage, but it's very heavy and thick, i mean it's not light weight. it can also hang if you don't follow the peoper rule of using mobile phone

title: Rough ang Tough model
body: Writing this review after using three weeks...Samsung introduced superb model, quite heavy.... battery life superb... finger sensor work exllent but not true HD display....camera is average...but okay...for simple users it excellent and also recommend for rough users.....all over it is value for money...

title: Good phone at 10K budget
body: Its a decent phone for basic use at 10K price point. Screen & Camera quality are excellent. Overall little heavy in weight phone though.

title: pathetic buying
body: Amazon didn't allow to write a review until they sold most of the stock, something very fishy.Heating problem. It doesn't work with 5.0GHz WiFi frequency. 2.4GHz is very old school.Camera quality is pathetic (both front and back). Forget about 48MP, pictures are all blur, poorer than a 4MP one.

title: Best buy
body: Wonderful purchase. I got it for 9499. Amazing budget phone, camera is decent and touch sensitivity is good. Battery life is good but it starts to slow down with usage.There is not lagging yet. Fingerprint is prompt in action, but they need to work on the face unlock.If you have a normal usage, with no gaming, this phone is for you. Its a steal deal!!!

title: Value for money, Brand value
body: The purpose behind my purchase is accidentally my Samsung A10 fell down and lost the display, so immediately I have selected this model without any second thought, because of the brand value, value for money, features, user-friendly what not all features.  We are happy with this purchase and the way we received our order very timely.

title: Worth buying. Value for money
body: This phone is having all good features and it's finger print reader and face recognizing is working super.Sound and battery  life is goodCamera superAnd all other phone feature are compare to 30k+ ir provided in thisA big thanks to Samsung...loving it.

title: 30 seconds of high lag
body: One star for SUPER LAG. Phone becomes dead slow. Camera, calling has lag of atleast 15 seconds. Tried all types of antivirus, booster, even restarted the phone several times. Works fine after restart for couple of minutes.Might be a defective piece. No return policy available.

title: Not worth...don't have enough basic features...6000 mah I doubt it
body: Biggest disappointment is this latest phone  ,not able to connect to 5g, even my old moto phone am able connect to 5g wifi...also see the numeric pad display ... battery life average...check if I can replace it with other model

title: An awesome budget mobile
body: I am using this mobile for more than 3 monthsEverything is perfect for this priceAn awesome budget mobileIt can run all the games on high settings at 60fps I have played call of duty free fire and bgmi of max settings with 60fpsVery good mobile

title: Mobile performance is above average 90hz refresh rate? If u r buying the mobile
body: Got the mobile on the launch date,Battery must be appreciatedCamera is just averageMobile performance is above average90hz refresh rate? If u r buying the mobile for this feature then I'm afraid u may get disappointed, it's just normal.The USB cable is too small in lengthIt's a good mobile in this budget, there are no returns for this, only replacement is available, hence choose wisely before buying

title: Mobile for parents
body: Good bettry life so mobile is bit heavy.Not a best camara but fine in this range and its not 48MP totally fake.Overall good for parents who needs bettry life and not photoholic.

title: Not worth the wait
body: Old school storage type with a interior processor. Phone is heavy and weight distribution is not that great. Charger is slow. Definitely u can't term a 15W charger as a fast charger. Phone is good for general usage.

title: Not a Bad Phone at this price Range.. However expected better camera quality from Samsung
body: Expected better camera quality from Samsung.. Camera Quality is total waste.. Battery life is good. Side Fingerprint not so good, quick and responsive. But manageable..Not a Bad Phone at this price Range.. Neither satisfied , not too much disappointed.I felt I could have bought Techno 7000 Mah phone because of big Brand Samsung I bought it during the Prime Day Deals..

title: Camera Quality and Colour +Performance
body: Worst Samsung Mobile Ever. used so many different Samsung mobiles. but M12 is just cheating by Samsung. The camera quality is so poor. It's just a VGA camera, not 48-megapixel screen colors are very low. I have a galaxy j8 its camera is lower than m12 but it is sharp. don't take they will not return the product. worst Samsung phone ever. lost 13500, and amazon service is being poor day by day.

title: Budgeted phone
body: Camera quality good but photo click krne me time bahut lagta.... what's app pr 1 sath 2 camera photo send nhi hoti....10 photos send krni hai(camera wali) to 1 -1 krke hi send krni hogi...battery life super se uper....jb ko mere mobile me na to memory card na hi koi Jada phone data...Phil bhi camera slow.song full volume pr 1dm se high ho Jata hai jb ki 1 point km Kate hi sunai hi nhi deta

title: Average experience
body: At this price, I expect atleast a little better phone. First of all, the processor is slow and lagging. The camera quality is very bad. I mean "very" bad so think about what are the essential things you definitely need before buying. Battery life is fine. Look is average because its quite thick than other models. Overall, I think its okay for general purposes but not a good phone to have.

title: M 12 review
body: Speed is OK for working, since it is 6 GB RAM. Battery is very good. Display is  also, OK. For doing normal data processing work lime share trading, for using excel, Word.., small types of editing,  ...., this system is enough, but if you intend shooting , its not enough.  Camera is not seems 48 MP. Front camera is OK.

title: Worthy, but very heavy and some issues with this product
body: Worth for money, but this is very heavy which is very uncomfortable for me, but it have best noise cancellation which i like more....... And if you can use UPI then its keyboard button cut halfly which is worst of this phone........ Due to Its heaviness and UPI problem i can't recommend you to buy this phone

title: Best for Gifting
body: Lovely 4 camera design though no 5ghz wifi and 90hz don’t know what’s the difference between normal or this. But overall at this price point loaded. Better than Chinese. Yes of course Unnecessary apps could be reduced that come preinstalled.

title: A total package with limitations
body: At this cost, this phone is awesome. Camera, Screen, Battery everything is awesome. However, on careful inspection some sensors are missing when compared to Xiaomi and other Chinese brands.

title: 6 months free warranty is a fraud, don't buy it from amazon
body: I have purchased this on 6th sep with 6 months free screen replacement. My phone screen broke in a month and when i go back to samsung service center, they denied for screen replcement. Also samsung customer care is saying amazon will do it. Amazon is saying samsung will do it.They are making fool of customers.

title: Best M series phone till date!
body: It’s a beast phone with a huge battery.The UI is also very simple and the screen is very lively.Camera is good ( but could’ve been better)At this price point, can’t really complain though - performance is also really for a phone priced under 15,000.

title: Great budget phone
body: Overall it's the best phone for the price range. Battery life is a blast, sometimes I can go without charging for 2 days on a 2-3 hour screen time. If you start the day at 100, after heavy use you will still be left with the battery at the end of the day.The camera is pretty good too, but not great. I'd say a 4/5 for the camera.The phone is kinda heavy if you are not used to heavy phones then take care for the first 1-2 weeks.

title: Warranty issue
body: I have purchased a samsung M12 mobile and 6 months free screen replacement warranty added for prime member at that I am also prime member so this benefit added.After 2 week mobile was Fall down and screen was damaged.So I went to samsung service center and claim the warranty but my mobile insurance plan was not activated so you will be bay and change the screen.Last 25 days I am try to activate my plan but problem was solved upto date.So please solve the problem quickly

title: It's ok ok at this price range
body: Am using M21 from past one year then I ordered this can say M21 is better then M12 design and display but it's also good not bad

title: Great budget phone
body: Great phone replacement for my 30k Oneplus 3T with only few issues like samsung bloatware which I tried to uninstall/disable as much as possible, a little on the heavy side (probably because of large battery) and the phone itself feels too big for one hand use but there were very few small phone options in budget section. Overall, great phone.

title: Amazing smartphone with great battery backup.
body: Display is not that great.Battery is awesome.Camera quality is better than other chinese handsets.Samsung one ui coupled with android 11 experience is superbb. You will love it.Fingerprint reader and face unlock works fast.Speaker is loud also.Exynos chip is underperform slightly than the competion but considering it's a Samsung budget phone so overall it's worth the purchase.

title: Good phone for user with less speed requirements.
body: A phone working good with all app except high end gaming app or some high processor occupied apps. Phone get switched off automatically on high processor usage when multi app functioning. Good at 8.5k price.Camera quality very good without zoom. Very bad with full zoom. Same with selfi cam.Networking : zero problems till now.Rest is good till now in last 1 month from i bought.

title: Awesome battery
body: After a long usage of this phone almost 7 months, battery is very good, phone is little bit on the heavier side. But for this price it's a wonderful product

title: Beast at best price

 Good phone at this price segment... We love samsung from the beginning and hence choose to get this mobile again as usual samsung is best for its camera, battery and processorKeep giving such budget phones to people

title: Awesome Mobile
body: After one month of using . Phone is too good . Apps can be shuffle so fast i.e speed is good. In price range it's best . Samsung touch sound camera almost fine .No prob. Till Now

title: Best mobile in this category at 12k by every angle.
body: Best mobile in this category at 12k by every angle. I mean display,  camera,  sound,  connectivity,  features, updates & securities etc.Overall you could assume "Indian IPHONE "

title: Very heavy...thick ...brick
body: UPI payments are slow as keypad doesn't fit in the screen and touch is very slow....I've a S10+ and iPhone both hv no such issues..

title: Best Phone from samsung in this range.
body: Go for this if you want samsung brand and trust.Don't waste your money on chinese phones, samsung nis far better than other brands..Also In this you will get One UI core version but samsung doing amazing job with it's UI and implementation..Battery life is awesome..Recommended phone..

title: If you want battery phone this is the best phone
body: Phone touch is smooth doesn't hang and heat battery life is best and charges fast problem with this phone is camera quality they say it's 48mp but it feels like 13mp fingerprint sensor onside is very inconvenient they must have placed it on the back and the phone is very heavy

title: Useless Service from Amazon
body: I always think 10times before I order anything expensive from Amazon because I have got a bad product. But this time dont know why I didn't give a thought. This model of Samsung M12 was available in Amazon only and guess what I received manufacturing defective piece. Seems like Amazon is pleasing customers by making things available in advance which turn out to be defective. Samsung also does not take responsibility of replaceling their defective piece with a new one.

title: overall good phone
body: does not have bloatware which are found in other brand like Mi. but have its own bloatware. overall good performance, not very fast, battery life is great and camera is also above average.

title: Not as expected
body: Think twice before you buy the same. Redmi/Realme phones offers much better specs in this price bracket.Samsung mobile having Exynos processor is known for its lagging performance when compared with those having much lower spec SnapDragon processors. Here same case with M12 also.The only reason for which I recommend M12 is, It comes with Android 11 out of the box and latest One UI also it's built quality.

title: पैसे की बर्बादी है ये मोबाइल
body: घण्टा true 48 megapixel कैमरा है !!!🔔🔔🔔🔔कैमरे की क्वालिटी 2G के समय जो चाइना फोन आते थे उसके 2 mp के जैसी है ।फोन में दमदार बैटरी के अलावा कुछ भी नही है ।इस प्राइस रेंज में दूसरे मोबाइल इससे ज्यादा फीचर और अच्छी क्वालिटी में मिल जाते है ।पता नही क्यो अमेज़ॉन कस्टमर रिव्यू में ज्यादातर लोगों ने 1 स्टार दिया है फिर भी अमेज़न इसको ओवरऑल 4.5 स्टार क्यो दिखाता है !!

title: Failed in 3 weeks, Service centre do not have requisite parts
body: I purchased M13 on 23rd July and its ear speaker stopped working in less than 3 weeks. Today when I took it to authorised service centre, they confirmed the problem and held it until the part is available with them for repair, with no definite timeline. I so wish this problem had shown up a week earlier, so that I could have received a replacement.

title: Average Mobile
body: Download is very low , when you pouch fingerprint is working some difficult. When you restart the mobile is show's android is starting like first power On. It's average mobile. It's fine for normal use.

title: Faulty product delivered
body: Faulty product has Black and white screen.Returned on next day but after 8 days also the cash is not refunded. Customer care says wait fo 15 days!!!

title: Awesome Mobile 📱 from samsung
body: One of the best mobile from Samsung. They named it as monster battery, but it's a truly monster battery lasts upto 2 day's. Look wise it is beautiful, mobile is some what it is feeling heavy due it's monster battery. Though senceor is smooth. Handling the mobile is very easy. Camara quality is awesome. Overall the product of the Samsung is a top notch mobile.

title: Disappointed
body: 1. Some features, importantly 'Screen shot', not available.2. Poor battery life.3. Slow.I will never recommend Samsung mobiles.

title: DEFECTIVE PHONE DELIVERED
body: SCREEN GOT BLANK JUST AFTER 9 DAYS OF USE.  AT THE TIME OF PURCHASING(25 SEP 21) IT WAS A AMAZON'S CHOICE PRODUCT, BUT TODAY(05 OCT 21) IT IS NOT. SO, IT'S CLEAR THAT amazon's choice TAG IS BEING USED TO CLEAR THE DEFECTIVE PRODUCTS WITH THE SUPPORT OF LUCRATIVE OFFERS. I HAVE BEEN CHEATED.

title: Phone is Extravagently cool and strong.
body: Everything is very good som people said processor is not good but it's absolutely very epic it can handle any task also I didn't use it for gamingoyher than that video editing is great and battery can stand upto 2days if not use very hardly, it has a great battery , camera is fabulous also galaxy apps give u boost in every way hence this phone is very fabulous under 10K, Hence Proved.

title: Not up to mark
body: 6Gb,128 GB phone was much slow than my old phone of 2Gb, 32Gb.Don't go by specifications only, performance not matching for this model.Thanks to Amazon for returning the product.

title: Not very impressive
body: Below average phone in this price range. Battery lasts only 24hrs with very normal use. Camera is below standards. Processor is not very impressive. Mi Note 10 would have been a better choice.

title: Battery charge time is 2.5hrs. This is extreme.
body: Battery is good, camera is decent, display is okayish because of 90hz refresh rate, processor scores pass mark if the user is senior citizen.Battery charge time is 2.5hrs which is insane. Too much of apps in background will slow down the phone dramaticallyOverall if you are buying a phone for your parents and have an ease of mind in having a samsung phone, then go for it. It won't bite.

title: Value for money
body: Best features in this range of a trusted brand, but if you need the best bunch of back cameras and a good selfie camera(it has 1 48 mp camera with 5,2,2 mp complementary cameras and 5mp front camera which is not best), go for galaxy m32 with 3-4k rs more, also it was made in india

title: Good mobile in this range
body: As Samsung shows its quality in every launch, this is also a good product in mid range mobiles. All things are good if u r an average user, for high performance gaming & photography other high end models are preferred.

title: Overall review
body: A good buget phone with great battery life.I usually use it for gaming because I can't buy a gaming phone it to expensive. But I can play seemingly all kind of game without lag(I dont mean games like genshin imapact).Overall goodValue for money:8/10 (reason low resolution  comparedd to other  budget smart phone  under 12000)Camera:9/10 (under this price tag the camera  qualityy is good)Chipset:8/10(under this price tag)Battery:10/10(best in this price tag)Overall:7/10

title: Great for home use or small office. 4gb ram is bit slow for processing.
body:
The media could not be loaded.
                



 Everything is Ok for me, Processor atleast need 6 gb ram as the multiple application will not slow down the phone. Otherwise great phone with huge battery, I almost use it for 3 days without charger (my use is for office use).

title: Worst Phone
body: One of the worst Samsung phone. It should be called "Brick" instead of phone. So heavy and bulky.Camera quality is third grade.Most of the effects from Instagram won't be supported. Truly a waste mobile. Do not buy this brick.

title: So heavy weight..
body: Now am writing this using after 20 days Samsung M12 phone is  not smooth little slow, Camara like 5mp.. not clear screen tuch not good feel like used mobile.. am suggesting don't buy you this one you can get other good phones in this price range.

title: Very bad
body: Fingerprint doesn’t respond well.Battery life very good.Net very slow, sometimes net is totally disconnected  automatically although its not fault of network system. Overall,  a very very bad phone. Dont buy it.. If you bought it,  it will make you mad and irritating man.

title: Overall Satisfaction with M12 phone
body: I wanted to have a phone 6 GB RAM and 128 GB ROM and 7000 mAH battery with large display and good picture quality in budget. This phone has satisfied me a lot, however this phone has 6000 mAH battery. I am much satisfied now. After one year or more than one year, It should not be slow and hang. I will rate this phone 8 number out of 10.However it's a better deal.

title: If you are taking money, you need to be honest on your product promises.
body: Handset is likeable, no doubts. But the quality of display, camera and processor are not full in criteria as mentioned. I have sent a picture captured by 48 mp resolution, you will see that is not clear and  proof that the quality of camera is not good. Display resolution shows to see the diaplay you need to tilt the phone. Sometimes phone went hanged also so that the processor is not good. I have exchanged my old phone which was in well running condition now I am missing that was best against this one. That was solid in his promises. Thankyou

title: Best with all feature at affordable price
body: At the price of rs.9499 this Samsung Galaxy M12 is am superb smartphone with the features of 48mp camera, 6000 mah battery,  90 Hz refresh rate, processsor based on 8nm, type-C etc. Because of affordable price this smartphone help to new begginer to reach at the world of technology. Due to other brand offer more price and also gives less features this smartphone comes a step ahead.

title: Excellent mid range budget phone
body: The phone is a good one to use. It is a 6.5 inch but is handy to use for its balance. It has a 6000 mah battery which gives it a great battery backup with a decent fast charger. It has also a good UI( One UI 3.0). Overall it's a good smartphone which can beat some flagship phone too.

title: Google pay ,phone pay are not compatible  with this phone

title: Slooooooow 👎
body: You will get frustrated by how slow it is. It's slower than my 3 year old MI phone I no longer use. Don't go for average 4 star rating on Amazon, take my words, any ₹6000 phone would perform better than this.

title: Heavy
body: Using it for about 4 months now. Heavy phone although has plastic body works fine storage is great charges fast Not yet facing any difficulty.

title: Worst phone . Amazon please return this phone .

Totally use less product.Doesn't meet any quality as advertised by samsung. .I don't want to give even 1 star to this phone.This is worst product of samsung.I want to return this phone.Amazon please return this phone

title: Grab on deal while the sale is live!
body: In the sale, the phone was being sold for 10,500. With the exchange of other phone I got this phone for as low as 8,500.For that price it is a grab on deal. The Camera Quality is great when compared to phones in that price segment.Coming to rhe performance I also played COD mobile and it played seamlessly in medium settings.Overall the phone is good for the price 10,500

title: Very low quality from Samsung
body: Fingerprint scanner is too slowTouchscreen doesn't respond 5/10 timesNeed to long press many times to get responseNetwork issue..This is review after using this phone for 5 days.Totally disappointed.

title: My product is not responding properly. Facing too many problems .Will u replace the product?
body: SAMSUNG GALAXY M12 is not responding properly. (1) Suddenly switch off while on call (2) Most of the times ring tone will not come. (3) During transactions, the numbers in the key pad appear only half. (4) While calling, it will take too much time to connect (5) During work, suddenly goes back to home screen etc.Will u please replace the product?

title: Buy Samsung M12 at you privacy risk
body: The mobile comes with lots of bloatware. Needs to be trimmed. Also the contact list is not easy to use when a name has more than 1 contact. Most importantly, searching thru various notifications is difficilt. Privacy is at risk because the pictures keep changing everytime one presses the power button to start - which means all our actions are being recorded somewhere.I do not use thw Fingerprint reader but still it is asking to rate. So gave 1 star raring.

title: Delivers for the price range but please don't compare it with Samsung's high end offerings
body: Haven't used it for too long but from the current usage these are the observations1. Battery life is good,  used it to stream movies and music but still worked out fine.2. Camera is ok, again based on specs for the price range.3. Would have liked better packaging and a back cover atleast.

title: Good phone with a weak battery
body: Battery is pathetic.  It's not 6000 mh battery. it drains very fast. Phone is ok for 10000 budget. Samsung quality has dropped.  Earlier Samsung phone had a superb quality.People buying this phone can go ahead. Good phone only battery  draining fast.I am using vivo y12. It's 5000 mh battery  but it last more than M12.

title: External warranty system is very upseting
body: I bought external warranty but till date it is not activated. I called Amazon but they say for external warranty issue call to Samsung, I have called and also send many mails to Samsung. In last they say to send video of warrantity activation. Very upseting uncmplete process. Why Samsung not activate warranty from their side while purchasing new mobile.

title: If you expect to use WIFI in 5GHz band at home , then Dont go for it; it supports only 2.4 GHz
body: If you expect to use WIFI in 5GHz band at home , then Dont go for it; it supports only 2.4 GHz.  Really disappointed after got to know this. it was not highlighted specifically in the retail sites, info is available in Samsung site only.You cant full enjoy an internet speed at home, even if you have 5GHz band router

title: All good to have rocket on pocket
body: Well if the question comes what I dislike  about  the phone is absolutely  nothing  it is a proper handy phone allows  to have a well grip. The quad camera  allows  to take  a full depth  of a picture enrich  in color and to take a true tone photo. The finger print is fast like thunder like a touch of your finger and opens in front  of you. The battery  is cool to use you could  say a PowerBar with phone and the make and feel of the phone is like your bide on the wedding night. A cool phone to use and recommend  others.

body: Phone camera is not worth the quality mentioned and the device is also having more weight... Rethink if you want to buy this... Not sure why amazon removed return policy it's better to check phone locally in shop and buy

title: Review
body: Though it has 48 megha pixels camera.Reality is this it is equal 5megha pixels. This is series draw back.Secondly it is very heavy in weight.Fingure print is not upto the mark.Does not have image/pdf size reducer.

title: Plz don't  buy this phone
body: Horrible..bought  this phone on launch date.camera quality is worst..and the performance is below average. Don't waste your money by buying  this.Since I brought  it under replacement policy not able to return  it now. Worst phone from samsung

title: Not value for money
body: Bad in charging ( not a fast charging  phone take 4 to5 hours for charging)Also battery back is not good enough  drained in 8 hours similar as my earlier  phone .Screen display also not up to mark. ( pixels  are average)Sound quality  in both speakers is bad ( voice clarity  not good)Also phone is slow while operating ( taking pause while using)There are  good option other brands at similar  prices

title: Not bad for the given price
body: I bought the phone the 6GB ram version and have been using it for three days now. Tge functions are smooth and the camera and screesize are great for the prize. It also gets fully charged in an hour. Will review again after a few more days. Can accomodate 2 sim cards plus a sd card simultaneously. Also the finish as the back is textured and matte, not glossy like it seems in the pictures.

title: Okay for the Price. but Bit Bulk
body: For the Price Range, its decent Phone. Display & Camera is Average. Battery is Good. Its weighing 220 Gram. Even budget Redmi, Oppo Phones are in the Same Weight Range. So We can Buy Considering Samsung's Service and Quality.

title: Not expected  this poor service from such a big brand
body: I purchased this after lots of analysis  and excited to use it but facing  such a cheap experience.I purchased few days back only and not able to hear incoming  voice, screen recording  is not available,  screenshot is not working.Defective Item.My brother also purchased same product  last year and he has same issue.He always  talk on speaker.Please do not buy samsung  product

title: VERY BAD and WORST CUSTOMER Service. Just STEALING MONEY from the TRUSTED CUSTOMERS.
body: I have placed an order on 21st May and I could see the touch is not working properly. Initiated return request on the same day but till now no response from the Amazon on the return pickup. I raised a inspection twice and return pickup request twice.AMAZON started doing VERY BAD and WORST CUSTOMER Service. Just STEALING MONEY from the TRUSTED CUSTOMERS.

title: It is better phone from Samsung at this range.
body: It is good looking and great user experience  with os is awesome. Display looks great.As I was redmi note 7 pro user, initially the phone seems bit slower in terms of performance ( launching apps, searching apps, unlocking using bio metric sensor).It feels bit heavier than my old phone.After all it is a worthy deal for 12000 rupees.I have exchanged it against the old redmi phone.Can go for this samsung product.

title: Good
body: Performance is very good. Battery is awesome. Can handle many applications at a time without lagging. Camera is good and video quality is also very impressive. Worth buying .

title: Average phone

title: Hi friends read this before oŕder
body: Hi friends don't purchase this phone with any expectation.Problem.1. Phone over heating during while charging2. Camera not equal to 48 MP3. Finger print reader not upto mark.It's on ordinary phone under 10k.Really disappoint with this product. Samsung failed to maintain their standard.

title: Sturdy and long lasting Mobile
body: A sturdy phone with good battery and storage for rough and tough use. Camera is good with good quality front and back cameras. The 6.5" dimension is very good for viewing videos. This at an affordable price makes it a paisa vasool mobile.

title: Worst Product and Display by Samsung
body: Poor product from Samsung. Even Xiaomi and other Chinese smartphone are faster than this. Very slow UI. Don't go with 90Hz refresh rate. That is useless. Most of the YouTube reviews are Paid. Don't buy this phone if your expectations are more as it doesn't match.

title: Excellent All rounder
body: 1 month since I bought it, excellent all rounder. Great performance, fast, nice camera for d price.Battery is too good, easily lasts 2 days with medium usage.I don't play games, so can't comment on Game performance.Camera is not d best, but for this price, I didn't expect much. Daylight pictures are really great. Video quality is also good.

title: Bulky and too much thick not looking like modern phone
body: Mobile is too bulky.. and thickness is too much 9.7 mm. Not looking like modern phone. Samsung pls work on weight and thickness. Customer won't require big battery give 5000mah is enough. Give some modern look with max 8.5 mAh thickness.. talk about procesdor its entry level processor of 6-7 k phones. But u give in 11k phone.. atleast use G35.

title: Waste of money
body: Phone hangs several times and restarts automatically. Raised issue with Amazon customer care, but according to them, issue is not capturing in smartcheck app, hence can not be return or replace. Total waste of money.

title: Value for money

title: Superb phone and good design
body: The newly lahnched phone is packed with everything that can come blow 13k inr. The camera The battery and The design of The phone is perfect in every manner. I recommend this product if someone wants a good smartphone under 15k.

title: Overall performance is good
body: I am using this phone from 5 days, on this basis I am just giving my feedback.1) Fingerprint reader is different as compare to other Android phones, and it's take some time to detect Fingerprint.2) Rear Camera quality is good but it's not like 48 mega pixels.3) Battery backup is good but its charge slowly.4) Overall performance is good with this price.

title: Not recommended at all
body: I thought of buying Samsung thinking of its brand value and brand name and quality. But it really sucks.. the phone hangs every now and then. Camera doesn't function properly. The handset is too heavy.

title: Junk Phone
body: Their is no negative rating option, so i have to give 1 rating to this junk phone.  DON'T BUY this device, after 5 day only its screen become blank tried all possible trouble shooting available online, but this junk phone didn't recover. Finally i have to go to service centre and from their also pathetic response i have to visit 3 different service centre to get this repair. Didn't except such a pathetic product from Samsung.

title: Budget smartphone
body: If you are looking for a phone with minimum features and just able to deliver day to day task like calling etc, then I would recommend this. BUT this phone lags behind in many features like always on display,screen color mode etc, so this phone is not for someone who is looking for good features in a phone. Front camera is horrible. Instead go for Realme 8i, its a beast with tons of features.

title: Worst device
body: Initially when I purchased I had a problem with it's speaker after the instructions followed for fixing now the device is overheating while charging , also when I'm using for even small applications like Google meet its not even a heavy application like COD . I advise you to not buy this device it has so many issues like this, Worst experience ever and it's only been a month since I have purchased it from Amazon.

title: Value for price. Better finger print reader expected.
body: The phone built quality seems good. The weight is a little more than expected. Battery life and camara is good. Latest version of Android is also provided. Better finger print reader was expected. Bigger size scanner on back would be better.

title: Just average phone.
body: Samsung is providing better phone now but this m12 is less than average. Average display, average battery and charging. U can buy it for your father or mother, means who don't use it more would love to buy it.

title: Don't Buy!! Humble request

body: Phone is otherwise good but the most important task of any phone, which is calling has some issues. Call feature sometimes hang. Camera sometimes become out of focus and so image gets blur.

title: Excellent Mobile & looks Slim and Stylish

title: Value for money

Phone is heavy because of it's massive 6000 mah battery. Every thing is fine if you don't play heavy games we can play games under 400mb smoothly.Smooth device writing this after 2 months of usage loving it. 🔥😍

title: Headset not in box.
body: The description said in box headset, charger, and manual will come in box with this phone, but headset is not there.

title: Pretty Good.
body: If you are interested in a budget camera phone, this one isn't for you.This phone is pretty smooth. Works for people who don't use phones much like me.Battery life is awesome and I'm enjoying it but cable is a bit short.Overall good phone, would recommend this one if u are really low on budget but if you can spend a bit more, just get the Samsung m30s or m31.This phone just needs improvement in camera and otherwise this is a decent budget phone.

title: Nice phone to use if your usage is very low
body: Nice product to use if your usage is minimal basically this phone is for people who is not interested more in gaming if so it will lag some

title: Budgeted phone with good quality features.
body: This review is after using phone for 1 week.Likes-Under 10k budget  this phone is very good to use, it's having  almost features like a 14-15k phone,camera quality is also good.My usage of phone is more would say whole day so by the EOD I left with 20-30%batteryDislikes-what I was in need of I dint get that is Wifi-calling option in this phone.Main drawback is if battery reaches below 40- 50 it takes really long time to get fully charged up.

title: I got Display problem after 1.5 month.

title: Mobile getting heated
body: I have been using the mobile for more than six months. All the features are satisfactory according to the price. But from past one month, my mobile is getting heated very frequently when I am using any app, browsing, watching video and while charging.

title: Good Phone.
body: Light weight, lovely colour.UI is good.Camera settings had to be changed as the default picture quality was set to 5MP. After a software update, I could change it to the right MP.

title: Ok..ish budget samsung phone under 10k!
body: Ok..ish budget samsung phone under 10k... camera is average...design is ok..battery is satisfactory for now...not a big fan of Samsung user interface and  samsung preloaded apps coz they are uncessary and can't be removed

title: Ok In This Budget.
body: Overall in this budget the phone is ok.Primary camera is good, but doesn't seems to be true 48 mp. If you're a selfie lover then dont buy this phone, because the front camera is worst.Decent battery life, can lasts upto 1 and a half day with average use.Processor saw some improvements, asphalt 9 and call of duty is running alright but not smooth. 90 mhz screen is a pure lie by the samsung, the TFT display is poorly managed on the hardware. Fast charging is there.

title: Camera quality is not very good
body: Camera quality is not as expected,  we can consider a low budget phone. Finger print reader doesnt works some times. Battery backup is great, built quality is nice.

title: Bluetooth connectivity issue in Samsung M12 mobile and it also not supports 5G.
body: There is a Bluetooth connectivity issue in Samsung M12 mobile and it also not supports 5G. Big drawback for this product. I never expected from Samsung that this type of issue will come with phone. I don't know why bluetooth is not supporting to all device. Please provide the Bluetooth connectivity solutions.

Sometime u cannot disconnect the call.3. In a span of 15 days the phone has hanged for 4 times4. I feel there is a software issue.5. there are few small problems while using the phone but cannot explain.

title: Notice the best one👌👌👌

title: good one, not a great one

title: Used just 15 days so can't give full feedback but will mention few key positive and negative
body: Good about product- battery  is superb- camera is Ok Ok not so good as expected from 48MP camera- easy to operateNegatives- processing is concern , very slow response of touch , even my three years led phone give better touch response- hindi typing is tedious process which must be easy like other phones- charging time is 3 hours so not so quick

title: Very Bad seller and Mobile

title: What is the performance of the phone
body: Nice product! I like it so much, battery life is too good I do not drain more the 50% of battery after heavy usage. Camera quality is good, processor is so amazing for day to day usage, fingerprint works pretty well, charing speed is normal. Overall, nice product for day to day usage. And thanks flipkart for so delivery very! I ordered it on 18/03/2021 and get it one 20/03/2021! Thanks flipkart again for fast delivery and a value for money and budget phone in only 11,000 rupees

title: Not for me!!

Touch screen is worse. Started lagging in the first few days. Finger-print and face-detection sensors are just for show.

title: Value for money
body: It is a good mobile at price of 10k. It is not for heavy usage like gameing or rendering but can be used by elderly people or people with less work on it.

title: Not bad
body: Not bad for my needs as I'm not a PUBG fanboy... good for elderly people.. go for Galaxy F22(G80) or M21-2021(Exy9611) if you're looking for a better gaming XP.. Camera suffers in low light but pretty solid in daylight.. Software is well optimised unlike Mi and Realme.. Quite a bit overpriced..Not Bad but certainly not the Best.. Galaxy F22 has better XP.. M03s has better Value

title: Vivo ,oppo is better than samsung

title: The worst model from samsung.

But for this model, by day 16 the display is not seen and I can't replace the mobile even in Amazon and also in samsung. The battery is getting heated up. title: Voice issues in device
body: within 5 months of purchasing there is voice issues in mobile. Not able to hear talk from other side suddenly and need to switch off and on mobile frequently, after switching on the mobile there wont be any voice issues for couple of hours but again the issue will arise after some time, after restarting the device, again for some this issue will get resolved. Currently restarting the device min for 10 times in a day.

title: Better battery, poor camera..

title: A toothless tiger
body: This phone has amazing specs, awesome battery life, mind blowing ram and processor, but I feel disappointed with the sensors. The phone lacks gyro sensor. You can't even play games on this phone. Forget games, the simple compass app will not work as the phone cannot sense rotation vectors. Therefore it's a toothless tiger.
